Job Description:
Appkart Studio Pvt Ltd. is a dynamic and innovative software and game development company specializing in creating cutting-edge mobile applications and games. We are currently seeking a talented Unity Developer to join our team. As a Unity Developer, you will play a crucial role in the development and implementation of our projects, ensuring the delivery of high-quality and engaging experiences to our users.
Success in this position means being able to collaborate effectively with our team, translating ideas and concepts into practical solutions, and delivering projects on time and within budget. Your expertise and contributions will directly impact the success and reputation of Appkart Studio Pvt Ltd.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the development team to design and implement high-quality Unity-based applications and games.
Develop and maintain clean, efficient, and reusable code.
Implement game functionality and mechanics based on project requirements.
Troubleshoot and resolve software defects and technical issues.
Optimize game performance and ensure smooth gameplay experiences.
Collaborate with artists and designers to integrate assets and create immersive environments.
Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in Unity development.
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality.
Document and communicate technical specifications and implementation details effectively.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
Strong proficiency in Unity3D and C# programming.
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming principles and software development lifecycle.
Experience in developing and optimizing interactive applications and games.
Familiarity with 2D and 3D graphics, physics systems, and animation in Unity.
Knowledge of mobile platforms (iOS and Android) and related development frameworks.
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.
A portfolio of previous Unity projects or games is highly desirable.
If you are passionate about creating exceptional user experiences and have a strong background in Unity development, we would love to hear from you. Join our team at Appkart Studio Pvt Ltd. and be part of a dynamic and talented group of professionals dedicated to pushing the boundaries of mobile applications and games.
To apply, please submit your resume, cover letter, and a link to your portfolio showcasing your Unity projects or games.
Keywords: C#, Unity3D, Unity Engine, Game Development, Game Engine

Job Description:
We are looking for a game designer with a passion for all genres of games, a knack for coding and storytelling, and an understanding of the industry, market and target audiences. Game designers can expect to manage teams of programmers, artists, animators and sound engineers, as well as plan schedules and work with budgets. Their responsibilities also include developing design and gaming protocols, defining game-play mechanics, coordinating with other game designers, ensuring quality, and meeting with company executives.
To be a successful game designer, you should have exceptional coding skills, no problems with working long hours under pressure, a yearning for making games that is original and groundbreaking, and a love for the process. Ideal candidates will have experience in game design, knowledge of computer systems and languages, excellent communication, and collaboration skills.
Responsibilities:
Creating innovative games for entertainment or education purposes.
Conceptualizing and developing characters, rules, settings and stories for new games.
Pitching new game ideas to executives and clients.
Managing multiple teams and projects.
Prototyping new games.
Following industry trends and good practices.
Monitoring work and cash flows.
Developing design and gaming protocols.
Doing quality control.
Requirements:
Bachelor s degree in game design, computer science or computer engineering.
Enthusiasm and knowledge of the industry.
Relevant certification in programming languages.
Portfolio of sample projects.

Job Description:
Job Description

Senior Game Producer will be responsible for the existing and / or new games in development which includes delegating tasks to a team of designers , programmers and 2D / 3D artists. He / She will be doing market studies of competitive games and continuously improving our games.He / She will be involved in discussing features , deadline , content with management. We would specifically appreciate Game Producers who have a domain experience in RPG (Sniper , Dress up , Narrative , Home Decor) , Racing (Drag & Regular) , Sports (3D Cricket) Games

Responsibilities

Researching the WHY for a new game and creating a matrix of competition and our game that justifies the effort.

Ideating and presenting deep & innovative ideas for new games , new features to improve our existing portfolio of games.

Be completely involved in the Level Designing of the games (with game designers and direct intervention)

Be the owner of the GDD and closely monitor art , animation quality to ensure perfection and smooth user experience

Understand Game Economics , monetisation strategies and the concept of creating rewarded ad incentives.

Plan analytics events and iterate on the game by using data analytics (Firebase)

Studying market trends and iterate quickly with moving trends

Check the progress of the development of the games throughout all production stages.

Ensure communication with the Games2win management for project follow - up.

Lead a passionate team of artists , animators , analysts , creative writers , programmers and quality controllers.Qualifications

An eye for perfection

User empathy with an obsession for user experience.

In - depth knowledge and passion for mobile games.

Highly motivated and drive to improve and innovate.

Shipped at least 3 games on Play Store / App Store with a complete understanding of the end to end production cycle

4+ years of experience in Game production and market knowledge

A game designer with lots of game designing experience.

Experience in Data Analytics and the Freemium Business Model

A degree in Game Design / Fine Arts / Creative field would be an important asset.Benefits

Join a leading global mobile games publisher

Join a team of young passionate gamers in a highly profitable established business providing exponential career growth and learning capabilities

Be proud to deliver the prestigious products that are top - ranked , globally

Be proud to receive tons of love and thanks from game players!

Convert your idea to game that millions of consumers would love to play

Be a part of Games2win well established , global leader , in Mobile Games backed by a business group in existence for 20 years!Next StepsIf the role interests you , then we have an assignment for you:

Data: The game generates 10 - 12k Organic downloads day. It is ranked amongst the top 150 Racing Games in the Android Free Play ranks in the USA. The LTV of the game is about 30 cents (US)

A) If you were given complete ownership of this game , what would you do and why

In your plan , share:

Product enhancements , features , UI , UX suggestions , Monetisation ideas , Content plans

Team members , you would require and their timelines to produce the game as per your specifications

How would you improve the game s monetisation Racing is a very high LTV genre in Mobile Casual Gaming. What you do to leverage the same (You could play competing games and share revenue idea and inspiration.

B) At a later date , if you were given absolute independence to produce a game (assuming 6 months that include yourself , a game designer , artists & a programmer) , which hame would you like to produce and why

Substantiate your pitch with monetisation , ability to generate downloads , the differentiator and the long term value the game will create! If you need more details from us , we are more than happy to provide them to you.
Keywords: Economics, RPG, Animation, Data analytics, Management, Research, Gaming, Monitoring, Android, Fine arts

Job Description:
Game Design: Collaborate with the game design team to conceptualize and plan game mechanics, gameplay elements, levels, and overall game flow. Ensure that the game design aligns with the target audience and project goals.
Game Programming: Write code to implement game mechanics, user interfaces, and interactions. Use programming languages such as C++, C#, or JavaScript and game development frameworks like Unity or Unreal Engine.
2D/3D Art Integration: Work with artists to integrate 2D and 3D assets, textures, animations, and visual effects into the game engine to bring the game to life.
Audio Integration: Integrate sound effects and music into the game to enhance the players experience and immersion.
Game Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough testing and debugging to identify and fix issues related to gameplay, performance, and compatibility.
Performance Optimization: Optimize game code and assets for smooth performance across different platforms and devices.
Cross-platform Development: Develop games that can run on various platforms, including PC, consoles, mobile devices, and virtual reality (VR) headsets.
Collaboration: Work closely with other game developers, artists, designers, and audio engineers to ensure smooth collaboration and successful project delivery.
Game Deployment: Prepare games for release on different platforms, including app stores, online distribution platforms, or physical distribution.
Game Updates and Maintenance: Continuously update and improve games based on player feedback, bug reports, and new features or content.
Game Documentation: Document the game development process, code, and project details to facilitate team communication and future development.

Requirements
Proficiency in game development programming languages, such as C++, C#, or JavaScript.
Experience with game development engines like Unity, Unreal Engine, or others.
Knowledge of game design principles and mechanics.
Familiarity with 2D and 3D art pipelines and tools like Photoshop, Blender, or Maya.
Understanding of audio integration in games and audio development tools.
Problem-solving and debugging skills to address game development challenges effectively.
Creative and innovative thinking to design engaging and enjoyable gameplay experiences.
Keywords: IT services, SAN, C++, SOC, Debugging, Javascript, SMS, Photoshop, Project delivery, CRM

Job Description:
job description
Game Developer (Unity)
Remote
Software Engineering
Software Engineer, Manual QA, Automated QA, Solution Architect
Backend, QA & Testing, Game Development
Table of Contents
About Slash
Slash is a Build Studio. We build remote, autonomous teams to help innovators develop software, products and hi-tech startups. We also build and invest in our own startups and commercialize them through joint ventures in ASEAN and Europe.
Slash has headquarters in Singapore and community-oriented R&D hubs in Phnom Penh, Yerevan, Jakarta & Bandung, Yogyakarta and Bali. We are a team of 50+ entrepreneurs, engineers, hackers, and full-stack developers with unique capabilities in web, mobile, AI, and Blockchain.
Role and responsibilities, and how will the role impact Slash?
Slash is looking for a dynamic Mobile Game Developer, to build powerful enterprise-grade mobile games. If you are a Unity code wizard and dreaming of building a fun exciting game with smooth interfaces, this is for you!
You will be a thought leader in the company:
Work closely with your team to implement features, and supporting those features through tooling as needed
Implement user interface screens, transitions, animations, (and VFX is a plus)
Support content creation pipelines, tool development, and workflow improvements
Build performant, sustainable, and maintainable technologies and code
Iterate using customer feedback in an Agile environment to optimize for simplicity, comprehension, and function
Deliver a top-quality product that is defect-free, on time, with excellent customer service
How do you know if you are a good fit?
Positive attitude, independence, inner drive to become successful
Good verbal and written communication skills in English. Ability to talk to international clients.
Tech-savvy (up to date with latest trends)
Proactive, confident, doesn t shy away from responsibility, take full ownership
Exceptional analytical, debugging/ troubleshooting, coding skills, problem-solving
Interest to work on multiple global corporate and startup projects, across different industries in an agency.
Ability to coordinate and communicate with diverse teams and individuals (e.g solution architects, product managers, scrum masters, developers, customer service, clients)
The ability to understand different business models and applications is a bonus
Minimum 3 years of professional work experience with 2-year experience in Unity
Knowledge and/or experience of C# programming and/or other relevant object-oriented and type-safe programming language
Have a good understanding of connecting to third-party APIs platforms such as payment gateways, mail services, SMS platforms, etc.
Have a good understanding of backend for APIs integration (via RESTful, JSON, XML)
Proficient with backend development and agile concepts is an advantage!
Keen interest in learning about other technologies is a plus
Experience with working with clients is a plus
Experience with working in a product or software agency is a plus
Experience with QA, automated testing, and have a university degree
Why Join Us?
At Slash, we re proud of our collaborative culture; everyone is ready to lend a helping hand, whether it s your first day on the job or your thousandth. We also embrace a trust-centric culture, flexibility and accountability first, and a work-life integration mindset. Check out our culture and meet our legendary !
Projects/clients: Get the stability of a larger group and the excitement of a startup. Work on interesting global projects, challenges and technologies for top brands, fast-paced startups and governments. Experience working with a mature SCRUM team and day-to-day Agile mindset project implementation. Check out our !
Team and working environment: Join our diverse remote builders community and hubs oriented in Jakarta, Bandung, Yogyakarta, Bali, Yerevan, and Phnom Penh. Learning: We focus on the growth of both parties. You will meet communities packed with intelligent peers and attend events with regular speakers, so you don t miss out on the latest tech trends. Job Description:
We are looking for a talented and creative Unity Game Developer to work at the highest virtual and augmented reality level. You will be responsible for implementing metaverse/game functionality and translating design ideas, concepts, and requirements into a functional and engaging module.
 Our ideal candidate will have 3-5 years of experience in Unity Development technologies, strong programming and coding skills, a keen eye for detail, and the analytical skills to identify potential issues with a design plan. Working across many different departments, this role requires a candidate with excellent communication skills, a proactive attitude, and a good team ethic to unify a common vision.
Key responsibilities:
Some of the key responsibilities include, but are not limited to:
Take ownership of entire features and components of the metaverse/game lifecycle and lead the product design and code elements.
Collaborate with other members of the team to deliver large and complex features on time and to a high standard
Be part of the development process and contribute improvements and suggestions, driving the quality of the code throughout the entire production cycle
Mentor other developers in the team and help maintain code, product, and process quality
Partner with Art, Design and Production teams to ensure schedules and goals meet business and project needs
Conduct code reviews and be part of the hiring process for future colleagues
Bring meaningful contributions to our product and the entire team
Skills, Experience and who you are:
Key skills required needed to succeed in this role:
Plan, design and implement high-quality game features working as part of the wider studio team
Transform design specification into functional game assets
Establish an effective strategy and development pipeline
Quickly create and iterate on prototypes showcasing new designs and interaction patterns
Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code
Ensure the best performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications and games
Identify process and application bottlenecks and implement solutions in a timely manner
3-5 years of experience with Unity 3D/Content Development
Strong 3D math skills
Strong C# object-oriented programming and scripting language skills
Experience working with game assets (meshes, animations, materials etc)
Experience profiling and optimizing game and render performance (GPU and CPU)
Experience working on a physics-based game project, source control systems such as Git in a multi developer team environment.
Understanding UX design process and experience working with UX design team and/or development team.
Keywords: Analytical skills, 3D, GIT, Coding, augmented reality, Product design, Process quality, Gaming, Object oriented programming, Content development

Job Description:
What do you need to do (Role and Responsibilities)
Work closely with the Product Manager in conceiving and creating game levels
Design Levels for Various Genre of Games
Be able to design in-depth and structured Game Design Documents using the best practices available in the industry. Provide with ample and correct references/guidelines in the document for the art and development teams. Constantly update oneself and the game design/product teams with new innovations in game design practices.
Work with the Product Manager and analytics team in understanding the game update cycle and requirements, and create the necessary design documents accordingly.
Involve actively during the production phase and work with the creative, art, development QC team to assess that the design objectives are being fulfilled.
Design missions and prototype different gameplay variations during production, play test them and take feedback.
Create user-friendly controls which are easy to master; for touch-screen mobile platform.
Constantly play and research other games for ideas regarding smart game level design.
Who could you beBackground and Experience:
DEEP KNOWLEDGE OF UNITY and designing levels in Unity.
Experience in designing games for iOS / Android.
Experience in working with F2P games.
Experience with creating game design documents from concept briefs. This would include defining game rules, level progression, and defining the user-interface in the game.
Ready to explore any given game genre at any time as per the requirement.
A passion for casual and mobile games, and should be playing iOS or Android games on a regular basis.
Good Communication Skills.
Good English Writing Skills and presentation skills: It is really important that your design and documents are conveyed to the readers.
Skill to create easy and clear game flow and UI flow.
Knowledge about successful games in the mobile games market, what is currently trending and know-how about design elements that made those games successful.
Should be able to relate to the emotion of the game and understand the game audience.
Any art or technical skills will be an added bonus.
Educational Qualification:
Graduate/Diploma Degree holder in Game Designing or any other equivalent educational background
Location-PAN India

Job Description:
Experience required: Someone with 5+ years of work experience
Whom do we need
Game Producers work closely with Product Managers at Games2win and their Game Designers.
In order to get these games published on time, as per our quality expectations, Product Managers will rely on YOU, to execute the Game Design Document (We call it CBC Click by Click ) for each game version release. This means understanding the CBC, and working with all the participants involved in publishing the game including analysts, artists, game designers, engineers, marketers, and quality control to get the game out!!
What will you need to do(Role and Responsibilities)
Work with the Product Managers and Game Designers in finalising the Game Design Document basis the requirement of the release and then making sure it ships on the defined day!
Work with the Delivery Head to ensure each game project has a plan in place so that tasks for engineers, testers, artists, analysts, and marketers, are understood by them and they have a clear roadmap
Provide each stakeholder with all the data they require. e.g. Game Design Documents for engineers, Style Guides for artists, Communication guys for Marketing teams, etc.
Play competitor games, benchmark our games to the best in the world, and suggest improvements and enhancements! This is one of the best jobs to become a Product Manager in the long run (If you want to!)
Maintain up-to-date Project Plans
Do daily meets on each game you are producing
Report problems/issues to the Product Manager, and relevant Heads of Departments
Coordinate closely with Delivery Head to ensure your resource requirements are met
Who could you be(Background Experience)
A deep passion for mobile games.
Ideally, have produced at least 10 mobile games in the recent past.
A background in game engineering or game design will be very beneficial as this will help in planning projects and understanding critical components of the game project
An ability to plan in detail especially the projects that are given to him.
An eagle eye for detail, with a passion to deliver on time.
Educational Qualification:
Graduate/Diploma Degree holder in Game Designing or any other equivalent educational background
Keywords: Publishing, Intellectual property, Project Head, Production, Project planning, Delivery Head, Manager Quality Control, Advertising

Job Description:
Appkart Studio Pvt Ltd. is a dynamic and innovative software and game development company specializing in creating cutting-edge mobile applications and games. We are currently seeking a talented Unity Developer to join our team. As a Unity Developer, you will play a crucial role in the development and implementation of our projects, ensuring the delivery of high-quality and engaging experiences to our users.
Success in this position means being able to collaborate effectively with our team, translating ideas and concepts into practical solutions, and delivering projects on time and within budget. Your expertise and contributions will directly impact the success and reputation of Appkart Studio Pvt Ltd.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the development team to design and implement high-quality Unity-based applications and games.
Develop and maintain clean, efficient, and reusable code.
Implement game functionality and mechanics based on project requirements.
Troubleshoot and resolve software defects and technical issues.
Optimize game performance and ensure smooth gameplay experiences.
Collaborate with artists and designers to integrate assets and create immersive environments.
Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in Unity development.
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to improve code quality.
Document and communicate technical specifications and implementation details effectively.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
Strong proficiency in Unity3D and C# programming.
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming principles and software development lifecycle.
Experience in developing and optimizing interactive applications and games.
Familiarity with 2D and 3D graphics, physics systems, and animation in Unity.
Knowledge of mobile platforms (iOS and Android) and related development frameworks.
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.
A portfolio of previous Unity projects or games is highly desirable.
If you are passionate about creating exceptional user experiences and have a strong background in Unity development, we would love to hear from you. Join our team at Appkart Studio Pvt Ltd. and be part of a dynamic and talented group of professionals dedicated to pushing the boundaries of mobile applications and games.
To apply, please submit your resume, cover letter, and a link to your portfolio showcasing your Unity projects or games.

Job Title: Senior Game Programmer - Casual Mobile Games
Job Description:
Hybrid working - 3 days in the office, 2 days remote/ WFH is the norm

Profit sharing scheme - we win, you win
Private medical cover - delivered through BUPA
Life Assurance - for long term peace of mind

As a Senior Game Programmer you'll be coding and developing hit mobile games as part of an experienced and successful team.

Self motivated.

Creation of concepts and project plans

Sound knowledge of data modeling, ETL and system architecture
An analytical way of thinking and working as well as very good and distinctive organizational skills
Fluent written and spoken English skills

Market-based payment

Demanding and creative tasks

Job Description:
Company Profile: (Light & Wonder (lnw.com))

Light & Wonder (erstwhile Scientific Games) creates technology-based products and content for land-based casino gaming, social and digital organizations worldwide. We are the global leader in cross-platform games and entertainment.
Through our amazing game content, technology platforms and Systems applications, we delight our players with what they want, wherever and whenever - be it online, mobile, or at their favourite land-based casino. We are excited to go all in on creating great games and a seamless player experience across all platforms.
At Light & Wonder, all our team members are known as Creators. We empower our creators to innovate, create, and bring fun to the workspace. The core principles that unite our team, guide our actions, and drive our growth are.

Dare to be bold - We always bring courage to work to reach for the unbelievable
Celebrate perspectives - We combine diverse talent to look at the familiar in unfamiliar ways.
Never settle - We relentlessly push forward to create the extraordinary in every detail.
Uphold integrity - We promote accountability and respect to raise the bar for ourselves and the industry.
Win as a team - We bring out the best in each other to share collective success.

We have 9000 creators working across in various regions globally. In India, we are a team of 2000 creators sharing the passion to excite our players and customers by creating the world's best game experiences. We strive to walk the walk and show that we are inspiring wonder and building magical worlds with endless possibilities.
Light & Wonder is committed to offer very competitive benefits that are aligned with our values and inspires employees to drive innovation and contribute to the organizations performance. Employees are the most valued resources and we always look to improve their well-being with a wide range of benefits befitting every individual. Not limited to monetary benefits, we have robust learning and development opportunities that help them to grow professionally.

Job Location: Commerzone IT Tech Park, Yerwada Pune


Senior QA Engineer Job Description

Key Responsibilities
Fulfilling responsibilities as a Manual tester
Ensuring close collaboration and communication between various teams/studios
Reviewing requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide a timely and meaningful feedback.
Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structed test plans and test cases.
Estimate, prioritise, planned and coordinate testing activities.
Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs.
Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved.
Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs.
Liaise with internal studio teams (e.g., Developers, Product Owners, and Designers) to identify system requirements.
Monitor debugging process results.
Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and training users to implement solutions.
Identify test requirements from the Specifications.
Design test plans and scenarios covering features under development to determine product quality or release readiness.
Implementing testing procedures and oversee the QA process.
Troubleshooting quality issues and modifying test procedures
Conducting analysis checks on products specifications
Responding to requests from internal teams and QA Leads
Document test procedures to ensure repeatability and compliance with standards.
Execute manual campaigns and hotfix tests.
Document software defects, monitor the progress in a timely manner, escalate aging and priority defects.
Present test coverage matrix (Link test requirements to test cases)

Skills:
Proven work experience as a Quality Assurance Tester or QA Lead
Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes
Experience in writing clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases.
Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing
Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.
High-level analytical skills / Critical thinker
Advanced written and verbal communication skills
Detail oriented
Tool knowledge: Jira, TestRail, Confluence considered advantageous.
Web and Mobile software architecture knowledge
Studio game testing experience considered advantageous.
Familiarity with Rest API basics is considered beneficial.
Leadership experience is a plus.
ISTQB Certified

Soft Skills:
English proficiency
Avid communicator
Organised, proactive, and result driven.
End User Empathy and Understanding of Business Strategy
Adaptability

Education: Bachelors degree or equivalent required
Mode Of Interview: (Participation in any 1 face-to-face discussion is mandatory)
1 Technical Interview
Director Interview
HR Discussion
Keywords: QA Testing, Game Testing, Manual, Automation Testing, Manual Testing

Job Description:
CSA Non-Voice Job Description / Profile

Job Title Customer Service Associate (CSA) Non-Voice

Contact HR Gagan 7348931027

Location -Bengaluru ( Electronic City )
Department-Operations
Channel - Email/Chat
Language - English
Hours of Operation24/7

Overview of Position -The role of the Customer Service Associate (CSA) - Non-Voice, will be responsible for:
Providing support and resolve technical issues via email and other electronic communications
Building credibility and trust with the customer by empathizing with their problem in words
Proactively understanding their needs and responding promptly to resolve their issue
Applying advanced troubleshooting techniques to provide unique solutions to the customers individual needs
Leveraging their experience to provide feedback to the team on how to improve client services
Driving customer communication during critical events


Essential Functions-

An obligation to deliver exceptional customer service
Receive emails and chats to gather and verify required information and do utmost within their power to solve customer problems
Demonstrate empathy and patience to the customer
Demonstrate enthusiasm to be a self-starter who is excited about learning new technologies on a daily basis
Provide information to the client and place appropriate notes in system indicating exactly what action was taken or needs to be taken
Ensure policies and procedures are followed
Maintain thorough knowledge of systems so that information can be researched and proper information is given to customer
Learn and retain a thorough working knowledge of all existing and new process and procedures
Achieve assigned Key Performance Indicators e.g. Call Handle Time, Quality, CSAT & DSAT
Attend Team Meetings/additional training sessions as scheduled
Performs other duties as assigned


Critical Skills-

Above average verbal and written communication skills - ability to speak accurately, using proper grammar, and good enunciation
Ability to listen attentively and to use information provided by clients to tailor responses and actions to meet the clients specific needs
Ability to work in a fast-paced, hectic, changing environment
Ability to organize and follow-up multiple tasks/details with accuracy and timeliness
Ability to operate a personal computer
Ability to adhere to all organizational policies and procedures
Ability to work a variety of shifts including days, afternoons, evenings, weekends and holidays
Ability to perform basic mathematical functions
Ability to effectively interact with employees at all levels of the organization and work with a variety of people from diverse backgrounds


Educational/Work Experience and Requirements-

Must successfully pass a background check
High school diploma or equivalent required
Must have at least six months customer service experience or equivalent
Experience in the gaming/tech support industry is a plus
Perks and benefits

An attractive compensation package with performance-based incentives
Incredible learning and growth opportunities
Outstanding rewards and recognition program & employee engagement activities
Free Food and Transport while working on-site
Medical Insurance


IntouchCX | intouchcx.com

Job Description:
Key Responsibility:

a. Product Ownership

- Product lifecycle management from concept to launch of the feature(s) across all products/product lines.

- Create, execute, and own product roadmap for the application

- Improve the overall application workflow, and optimize conversions across the funnel.

Job Description:
Location : remote
Type : Part time


The Opportunity
We are looking for a Game Analyst & Tester to be an integral part of our dynamic team. In this role, you will test, analyze, and forge partnerships to deliver the most exciting and immersive gaming experiences to our users.


What You'll Do
Building a deep working knowledge of the games listed on our platform
Test and analyze games currently listed on our platform to ensure optimum performance and user experience.
Perform market research to identify emerging games and trends that align with our platform's objectives.
Test game compatibility with the Kayros wallet, identifying any issues or areas for improvement.
Establish contact with game studios to forge valuable partnerships, ensuring a continuous influx of high-quality games.
Provide detailed reports and feedback on game performance, user experience, and potential partnerships.


Required skills
Passionate gamer with a deep understanding of various game genres and platforms.
Previous experience in game testing or a related field would be a plus.
Knowledge of web3 and blockchain technology, particularly in relation to gaming would be a plus.
Good communication skills to effectively negotiate partnerships and articulate feedback.
Proactive and self-motivated
Good analytical skills with the ability to assess games from a user perspective and provide actionable insights.


What We Offer
The opportunity to be part of an innovative gaming platform shaping the future of web3 games.
Collaborative, fun, and flexible work environment.
Opportunities for professional development and growth.
Keywords: Game Testing, Games, Gaming

Job Title: Hiring For International Gaming Process (Backend Process)
Job Description:
Job Description

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with different teams around the world to create learning experiences that are unforgettable and strongly support the ramp up and growth of our new members.
Deliver training materials through a combination of presentations and facilitated activities
Be proactive on sharing best practice and learning but also asking for help when needed.
Manage follow up sessions for agents who need it.
Be accountable and responsible for the work you have to do.
Proactively collaborate with the training team within both Telus and Riot worldwide.
Be an advocate for your learners. Ensure the learning experiences provided to them meet a high quality level and be involved in their delivery.
Be able to perform un-biased needs assessment and design activities or projects to tackle them.
Design and support evaluation models that will help stakeholders understand the impact and success of the learning sessions provided.
Capture new agent training requirements and generally be passionate about the growth and development of agents and of the site as a whole.
Be a strong facilitator and proactively take any chance to develop your skills whenever possible.

Requirements:

Excellent English language skills (C1 & C2 Level)
Strong stage presence when it comes to facilitation and public speaking.
Knowledge on GSuite (Google Docs, Google Slides, Google Sheets, Google Forms)
Passionate about staying up to date with your craft, and understand the different learning theories and models.
Very good communication skills
Ability to do the evaluation and impact checks
Strong recommendation from Leadership and a good performance record
Ability to deliver, iterate and improve.
Good understanding of adult learning theory and methodologies, ability to apply it in your training design and facilitation.
Flexibility and ability to improvise and adapt to new situations.
Experience in designing and facilitating learning initiatives will be considered as an advantage
Knowledge or experience working in Agile would be considered as an advantage.

Perks:-

1. Free Cab Facility (Both sides)
2. Free Life Insurance
3. Medical Benefits

Job Description:
We are looking for a leader who flexes their style between being visionary, results oriented, relationship focused and a centered thinker; with a proven track record in driving end-to-end analytics and an appetite to challenge the status quo. Past experience should include a mastery curve through the following foundational elements -
Managing and reviewing analytics delivery spanning telemetry, data pipelines, investigations, business intelligence, reporting, ML solutions, experiments and long-term strategic initiatives
Working with diverse stakeholders from product, marketing, design and engineering to design a cohesive analytics strategy that not only addresses the immediate business goals, but sets up a consistent pipeline for the future
Recruiting and retaining high performance teams by investing actively in career growth. Mentoring analysts, data scientists and managers on technical skills, strategic thinking, career goals and long-term vision as a part of formal feedback mechanism
Ideate with partner studios, central analytics and engineering to invest in the future of analytics through better tools, platforms, scaled solutions or packaged products for end consumption. Tying these opportunities back to individual career development would be a key strength
Must have:
Bachelors or Master s degree in technical/quantitative field; Masters desirable.
10+ years related work experience in Analytics with large datasets, 5+ years in leading high performing teams of 10+ including: organizational talent planning: hiring, retaining and investing in growth for performance.
Strong business acumen and ability to evangelize an up-to-date awareness of where analytics/data science can be leveraged to provide business value across all levels and disciplines.
Consistent and proven track record as a leader across responsibilities that have scaled in complexity, leading to demonstrated ability to grow analytical capabilities and deliver strong results.
A skilled senior leader able to motivate individuals and groups to tackle complex problems and confidently work on often open-ended challenges that will result in tools and methods that deliver impact
Proven track record in sharing complex results, recommendations and actions in a style that best fits the audience for maximum engagement.
Demonstrated ability to be a partner, identify winning opportunities and determine complex resolutions cross functionally where needed (e.g. engineers, product managers, analysts, business, and marketing functions at all levels).
Strong written and verbal communication skills, that allow collaboration and influencing at all levels and cross-functionally, with the right expectation management
Ideally have:
Enjoys analytics, but has a strong track record in data science methods and a passion for both to keep up with emerging market trends and identify opportunities within the business locally and globally
Experience working in gaming or other technical consumer product facing industries is a bonus
Experience with different programming languages (e.g. SQL/R/Python) and environments such as Snowflake, Redshift or Spark, to enable guiding team discussions to determine best solutions or understand cost/quality when planning priorities with managers
Keywords: business intelligence reporting, Career development, People development, Analytical, Product design, Gaming, Analytics, Product marketing, SQL, Python

Job Description:
We are looking for a highly competent Node.js Backend Developer responsible for managing the higly scalable exchange of data between the server and the players.
Your primary focus will be the development of all serverside logic, definition and maintenance of the multiple databases, thirdparty api integration customisation, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.
You will also be responsible for coordinating the integration of front-end elements built by your co-developers into the game.
Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.
As a Nodejs Game Developer you will be designing code architecture, implementing, debugging and optimising systems to extend the game feature set; ensuring quality code and supporting others with code and design reviews as part of Agile team.
There are many projects in the pipeline; youll be working on complex and interesting engineering problems.
KeySkills
Strong proficiency with JavaScript, Typescript
Proficiency in Object oriented Javascript and deeper understanding of datastructures, algorithms, design patterns.
Knowledge of Node.js and frameworks available for it such as express
Knowhow of routing, dataflow, streaming, RPC, PubSub architecture, Message bus, Event queueing and distributed system based programming concepts.
Understanding the nature of asynchronous programming and its quirks and workarounds
Knowhow of server-side templating languages.
Basic understanding of front-end technologies.
Understanding accessibility and security compliance
User authentication, tokenization and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
Integration of multiple data sources and databases into one system
Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
Understanding differences between multiple delivery platforms, such as mobile vs. browser, and optimizing output to match the specific platform
Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
Desirable to have knowlege on Photon Engine, Vivox
more than 5 years of experience in development, desirable with gaming domain / realtime experience
Keywords: security compliance, Backend, Automation testing, Front end, GIT, Architecture, Debugging, Agile, Gaming, Analytics

Job Description:
Role:
The Store Manager for our esports gaming center chain is responsible for overseeing daily operations, ensuring excellent customer experience, managing staff, maintaining gaming equipment, complying with regulations, optimizing operational processes, and providing insightful reporting for continual business growth and improvement
Responsibilities:
Facility Management
-Equipment Maintenance: Regular inspection and maintenance of gaming hardware, server and peripherals to ensure they are functioning optimally. This includes coordinating with technical support teams or vendors for repairs or replacements.-Cafe Cleanliness: Ensuring that the gaming areas, restrooms, common areas, and other customer-facing spaces are kept clean and tidy. This might involve scheduling regular cleanings and conducting spot-checks.
-Security: Overseeing the security of the facilities. This could involve managing security personnel, monitoring security cameras, and ensuring compliance with safety regulations.
-Utility Management: Overseeing the operation of utilities like electricity, internet, water and HVAC systems to ensure that they are working properly and efficiently.
-Inventory Management: Keeping track of all physical assets within the facility, including gaming equipment, furniture, and supplies.
-Emergency Preparedness: Establishing and enforcing procedures for emergencies such as power outages, fires, or other unexpected events. This includes training staff on these procedures.

Process Management

-Process Documentation: Clearly documenting all processes and regularly updating process manuals. This ensures all staff have access to the latest instructions and can refer to them if needed.
-Process Evaluation: Regularly evaluating the effectiveness and efficiency of all operational processes. This could range from how customers check in and out of the gaming centers to how equipment is maintained.
-Customer Journey Mapping: Studying the journey of customers from the moment they walk in the door to the time they leave. Identifying pain points and areas for improvement to enhance the overall customer experience.
-Feedback Implementation: Actively seeking and incorporating feedback from staff and customers to improve processes.
Keywords: Operations, Communication Skills, Computer Knowledge, Time Management

Job Description:
As a Game UI Artist at PTW , you will play a crucial role in creating visually appealing and user-friendly user interfaces (UI) for video games
Your artistic skills and creative vision will be vital in enhancing the overall gaming experience, ensuring that players can easily navigate menus, access game features, and immerse themselves in the game world
Responsibilities:
UI Design: Create and design intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user interfaces for video games, including menus, HUD elements, icons, buttons, and interactive elements.
Visual Conceptualization: Develop the visual style and theme for the games UI, ensuring it aligns with the overall art direction and narrative of the game.
Graphic Assets: Produce high-quality 2D and 3D graphic assets, such as icons, backgrounds, and animations, that enhance the UIs look and feel.
Wireframing and Prototyping: Create wireframes and prototypes to test and refine UI layouts and functionality, considering player feedback and usability principles.
Consistency: Maintain visual consistency across all UI elements to provide a cohesive and polished user experience.
Collaboration: Collaborate closely with game designers, developers, and artists to ensure that the UI supports and enhances gameplay mechanics and storytelling.
Adaptability: Be prepared to iterate and make adjustments based on player feedback, usability testing, and design changes during the games development cycle.
Resolution and Optimization: Ensure that UI assets are optimized for various platforms and resolutions to maintain performance and visual quality.
Stay Informed: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, new tools, and emerging technologies related to UI/UX design and incorporate them into your work where appropriate.
Documentation: Create and maintain documentation for UI design guidelines, asset organization, and specifications for the development team.


Bachelors degree in graphic design, Digital Art, or a related field (or equivalent industry experience).
Proven experience as a UI Artist in the video game industry, with a strong portfolio showcasing your UI design work.
P
Keywords: Graphics, User interface designing, Illustrator, Maya, Conceptualization, Animation, Adobe, Gaming, Usability testing, game development

Job Description:
Planning and Strategy: The QA team is responsible for creating a comprehensive test plan and strategy that includes a range of testing methodologies , such as Unit testing, Functional testing, and Manual testing.
Testing and Debugging: The QA team conducts a variety of tests on the game to identify and report any bugs, glitches, or errors that may affect the game s performance or user experience. They also collaborate with the development team to fix the issues found.
Compatibility Testing: The QA team ensures that the game is compatible with different platforms, operating systems, and hardware configurations. They test the game on various devices and configurations to make sure it works as intended.
User Experience Testing: The QA team tests the game from the user s perspective to ensure that the gameplay mechanics, graphics, and sound are immersive and enjoyable. They also provide feedback or suggestions on how to improve the user experience.
Documentation and Reporting: The QA team creates and maintains comprehensive documentation on the game s testing process and results i.e. use-cases, test-cases etc. They also provide regular reports to the development team and stakeholders on the game s progress and any issues found.
Qualitative Delivery: Ensure all work meets customer expectations and quality standards. Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle.
Key Performance Areas (KPA):
Planning and Strategy: Ensuring that execution of the Test Plan and Strategy development and implementation
Testing and Debugging: Knowledge of different testing methodologies and approaches to ensure comprehensive testing of the game.
Compatibility Testing: Ensuring compatibility testing planning, execution and reporting
User Experience Testing: Identify the Improvement in User satisfaction
Documentation and Reporting: Keep track of all changes, up to date all documentation day by day.
Quality Assurance: Ensuring that the game meets the required quality standards and is free from defects and bugs.
Collaboration: Working collaboratively with the development team to identify and resolve any issues that arise during testing.
Communication: Communicating effectively with the development team to provide feedback on the quality of the game and any issues that arise during testing.
Time Management: Efficiently managing time and resources to ensure that testing is completed on schedule.
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):
Planning and Strategy: Percentage of the effectiveness of the test plan and strategy in identifying issues
Bug Detection Rate: The number of bugs and defects detected during testing.
Test Coverage: The percentage of the game that has been tested.
Testing Efficiency: The time taken to complete testing and identify bugs.
Compatibility Testing: Percentage of devices and configurations tested
User Satisfaction: Feedback from users on the quality of the game and their overall experience.
Test Case Effectiveness: The percentage of test cases that identify bugs and defects.
Documentation and Reporting: Quality of documentation as evaluated by other team members. Number of documentation-related issues or errors reported by other team members.
Quality Assurance: Percentage of defects found post-release
Required Skills Qualification:
Proven previous experience in testing game applications
Must have knowledge of at least one card game with rules.
Ability to define test cases from functional requirements
Expert in identifying issues in user experience testing
Knowledge of Game Development Life Cycle
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Excellent attention to detail and reporting bugs
Excellent planning, organization, and time management skills
Strong analytical skills and ability to think outside of the box
An aptitude for ongoing learning and the ability to develop skill sets
Professional, positive, and results-oriented approach
Keywords: Graphics, Manual testing, PDF, Functional testing, Debugging, Software development life cycle, Test cases, Unit testing, Testing, game development

Job Description:
Design and create immersive and engaging audio assets, including sound effects, music, and ambient soundscapes, that align with the games artistic vision and enhance the player experience.
Collaborate closely with the development team, including game designers, programmers, and artists, to integrate audio assets seamlessly into the game engine and ensure proper implementation and functionality.
Utilize audio middleware tools, such as FMOD or Wwise, to set up dynamic sound systems, manage audio events, and create interactive audio experiences.
Edit and mix audio assets using industry-standard software, such as Pro Tools or Adobe Audition, to ensure high-quality audio output and optimal balance between different audio elements.
Test and iterate on audio implementation, ensuring that sound effects, music, and voiceovers sync correctly, adapt to gameplay situations, and enhance player feedback.

Must Have
Proficient in audio design techniques and principles, including sound synthesis, recording, editing, and mixing.
Strong knowledge of audio editing software, such as Pro Tools, Reaper, or Adobe Audition, for creating and manipulating audio assets.
Experience with game audio middleware, such as FMOD or Wwise, and its integration within game engines.
Familiarity with scripting and implementing audio systems within game engines like Unity or Unreal Engine.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams and convey audio concepts clearly.
Good to Have
Musical background with a solid understanding of music theory, composition, and music production.
Experience in field recording techniques to capture and edit authentic and unique sound effects for the game.
Knowledge of voiceover production processes, including casting, directing, and editing voice talent.
Familiarity with interactive sound design techniques, such as adaptive music systems, dynamic mixing, and spatial audio.
Understanding of game development processes and workflows, including familiarity with game engines, version control systems, and asset management tools.
Keywords: Version control, Manager Technology, Commerce, Audio editing, Asset management, Adobe, payment solutions, Middleware, Gaming, game development

Do you dream in pixels? Does dissecting a game's every nuance and mechanic awaken a fire in you? If so, it's time to level up and join our ranks! Dive into a vibrant team of gaming prodigies, all working toward the epic quest of amplifying our game data reservoir.

Job Description:
Viziverse is creating a whole new way to experience immersive 3D gaming and the metaverse -- and without a VR headset! We're an exciting new startup founded by an experienced tech entrepreneur with multiple successful exits and degrees from MIT and Harvard Business School.

We are looking for a highly skilled 2D/3D Game Artist to help us create and maintain high-quality 3D models and textures for our upcoming games in Unity. The successful candidate will be responsible for creating game assets that are optimized for mobile devices and can be easily iterated upon to meet our development needs. The candidate must be familiar with Unity and have a strong understanding of game art pipelines, as well as experience with sketching and game design.

IN ORDER TO BE CONSIDERED, YOU MUST APPLY USING THIS MANDATORY DIRECT APPLICATION LINK:
https://viziverse.applytojob.com/apply/5iJkI0g07h/Game-Artist-2D-3D?source=Naukri

What You'll Do:
Create high-quality 3D models and textures that are optimized for low poly environments using Blender(preferably).
Work closely with the development team to create assets that meet project requirements.
Collaborate with teammates to maintain consistency in style and quality across all game assets.
Create texture atlases and implement them into the game engine.
Work within a game engine to implement 3D models and textures.
Optimize assets for performance and size constraints.
Use sketching and other design tools to visualize and communicate game asset ideas to the team.
Keep up-to-date with industry trends and best practices.

Must-Haves:
At least 2 years of professional experience in game art creation and game design.
Strong 3D modeling and texturing skills.
Expertise in creating low poly models and textures.
Experience with creating texture atlases.
Experience with optimizing assets for performance and size constraints.
A strong portfolio showcasing previous work in game art creation and game design.
Strong sketching and other design skills.
Strong knowledge of Unity and game art pipelines.
Ability to work in a collaborative environment.
Strong communication and problem-solving skills.
Familiarity with industry-standard software such as Photoshop, Substance Painter, or similar software

Preferred Qualifications:
A degree in game design, digital art, or a related field.
Experience in creating assets for games.

When:
Full-time

Why join the Viziverse team?
Make a novel platform that is the first to implement live action gaming
Work with an accomplished startup founder to directly impact the industry
Join startup and get an early seat on a rocket ship to something potentially huge!

Ready?
If working on something fun, entrepreneurial, innovative, and industry-changing sounds appealing to you, then lets talk. (And well of course keep it confidential.)

Job Description:
LnW are looking for a Casino Test Engineer who will be responsible for testing development work of casino games. This is a hands on role that will involve working closely with developers and product owners to understand the impact of changes and ensuring these are fully tested and test results are communicated effectively to all stakeholders.
This role would ideally suit someone with previous experience working in a continuous delivery environment with an ability to assess requirements and define test cases to cover both requirements and their regression impact.
Key Tasks
Work with product owners and developers to ensure that requirements are effectively tested
Work with QA leads to ensure new development work is being considered in regression testing and risks are considered and communicated
Preparation and execution of test plans and test scripts
Raise and monitor defects and ensure they are re-tested in a timely manner
Provide estimates and feedback to the QA Lead and Project Manager for project scheduling purposes.
Define and use test reports and templates that are both comprehensive and clear
KNOWLEDGE/SKILLS REQUIRED:
Experience of working in a continuous delivery model
Significant experience within a testing role to include at least 3 years of hands on testing experience
Experience in designing test cases
Experience in Agile using Scrum methodology.
Experience using Test Case Management Tools such as TestRail, HP ALM, Zephyr etc.
Experience in managing defects in a structured way using tools such as JIRA
Experience of working in all different stages of the SW testing life cycle - functional, integration, regression testing
Ability to determine and dictate relevant test types, methods and approaches (e.g. identify where a tool could help with testing; identify when to test boundary conditions)
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Excellent knowledge of test methodologies and development approaches such as Kanban/Waterfall/Agile
Qualified to ISEB/ISTQB Foundation level software testing
Knowledge of automation would be added advantage.
Education: Bachelors degree or equivalent required

Mode Of Interview: (Participation in any 1 face-to-face discussion is mandatory)
1 Technical Interview
Director Interview
HR Discussion
Keywords: Manual Qa, QA Testing, software testing, Game Testing

Job Description:
## This position is based in Bangalore. Remote working is not an option ##
## Only immediate joiners will be considered. ##

izmofx (www.izmofx.com), a division of izmocars, is a leading Interactive Media and Internet Marketing company with a strong presence in the Automotive industry. With Interactive Media studios in Long Beach, CA & Brussels, Europe, we are the world's largest producers of automotive content. We have developed State-of-The-Art technology for CGI and Animations for Automotive and are now creating the next generation of Virtual Reality and WebGL Platforms. We are looking for programmers for our Virtual Reality Platform team.
As the programmer leading next-generation Virtual/Augmented/Mixed Reality development, you know the best tool to achieve the most realistic implementation for lifelike reproduction on a variety of headsets. You stop at nothing to produce a truly interactive and next-generation product for customers and clients, turning their dreams into reality.
You will be developing on a variety of devices, from mobile phone VR/AR/MxR implementation to full-fledged headsets (e.g. Oculus Quest, Hololens, Vive, Magic Leap).

REQUIREMENTS AND RESPONSIBILITIES include the following:
Ability to read, analyze, and interpret client designs into working VR/AR/MxR applications.
Rapid prototyping to quickly determine challenges, and pivoting to overcome those challenges;
Full implementation of the entire experience on defined headsets.
Must be detail oriented this is key. You will ensure your work is accurate and highly detailed, and you can self-QA your work;
Team oriented, but can also self-manage and work autonomously when necessary you must be proactive;
Organizational and time management skills are essential;
Expected to exhibit flexibility to perform additional assignments as required.
Willingness to push yourself beyond the stated capabilities: learning new software; approaches to the delivery pipeline; tackling new projects; turning ideas into functionality;
Being able to deliver in a fast-paced, time-critical, accuracy-driven environment is an absolute requirement.
A love of virtual reality applications and content. You not only like to spend your free time in VR/AR/MxR, but you also want to develop compelling content too.
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS
To be considered for this position, you must meet the following minimum qualifications for the position:
Knowledge & Experience:
3D graphics programming experience with Unity, OpenGL, DirectX, or similar
Bachelors degree in computer science, Engineering, Mathematics, or equivalent experience
4+ years of experience with C/C++/C#/Objective C or Java
Proficiency and capability with Unity 3D development environments, a minimum of 3 years;
For Unity, a Certified Programmer is a prerequisite; Certified Expert Gameplay Programmer is preferred.
Knowledge in image processing techniques;
Understanding of shading, lighting, and texturing;
Engine-level development or rendering development with OpenGL/Direct3D or similar
Basic understanding of 3D pipelines (e.g. Autodesk Maya)
Previous production experience with VR/AR/MxR applications.
Android/iOS experience is a plus.
ADDITIONAL APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS
Programming test will be administered for both C# to ensure knowledge matches with resume;
Portfolio with list of previous VR/AR/MxR work and/or of work in Unity. This can be a list, but preference is given to video portfolios (or demonstrable demos);
Knowledge of the Unreal engine is a plus
Keywords: AR, Unity, OpenGL, 3D graphics programming, VR, 3D pipelines, MxR, Direct3D

Bachelors degree in Marketing, PR, E-marketing Social Media or any other related field

knowledge in performance marketing and campaign analysis.

Job Description:
As a Product Manager, you will play a pivotal role in the development
and success of our games. You will be responsible for defining and executing the product strategy, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, and ensuring the delivery of top-notch gaming experiences.
Your role will encompass both creative and analytical aspects, requiring a deep understanding of the casual gaming market and player behaviour.
Smart and deep thinking, focused and data centric mindset.
Key Responsibilities:
Product Strategy: Develop and communicate a clear product vision and strategy for casual games, aligning with company goals and market trends.
Market Research: Stay up-to-date with the casual gaming industry trends, competitors, and player preferences to identify opportunities and threats.
Game Conceptualization: Work with game designers and developers to conceptualize and define game features, mechanics, and gameplay experiences.
Prioritization: Create and maintain a product roadmap, prioritize features and improvements based on player feedback, data analysis, and business goals.
Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate closely with game designers, artists, developers, and QA teams to ensure the timely and high-quality delivery of games and updates.
Analytics: Utilize analytics tools to gather and analyze player data, providing insights to optimize player engagement, retention, and monetization.
Monetization: Develop and implement monetization strategies, including in-app purchases, ads, and virtual goods, while ensuring a positive player experience.
User Testing: Organize and conduct user testing and focus groups to gather feedback and iterate on game features and designs.
Marketing Support: Collaborate with the marketing team to create effective user acquisition and retention strategies, including app store optimization (ASO) and advertising campaigns.
Performance Tracking: Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and key success metrics (KSMs) to assess the game s performance and make data-driven decisions.
Player Feedback: Act as a bridge between players and the development team, actively listening to player feedback and translating it into actionable improvements.
Live Ops: Drive Live ops of games on the stores
Qualifications:
Bachelors degree in business, marketing, game development, or a related field (Masters degree preferred).
Proven experience as a Product Manager in the casual gaming industry.
Strong analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis tools.
Exceptional communication and leadership skills.
Creativity and a deep passion for casual gaming.
Knowledge of game development processes and tools.
Familiarity with game monetization strategies and trends.
Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and dynamic work environment.
Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
Benefits:
Opportunities for career growth and development.
Collaborative and creative work environment.
Health Insurance.
Daily lunch facility
Keywords: Health insurance, Data analysis, Marketing support, Market research, Gaming, Analytics, Product strategy, Recruitment, game development

Job Description:
Reporting to: Product Manager
Experience Required Minimum 2 Years of Experience
Who do we need?
We are looking for an experienced Project Manager to ensure the timely delivery of the games we release. You will need to understand the requirements of a release, ensure the right resources are aligned at the right time and verify that the release is on track through regular checks. You will need to have an eye for detail, be able to spot dependencies, and be willing to imbibe best practices in delivering creative projects such as games.
What do you need to do? (Role and Responsibilities)
Understand the scope of the release and WHY it is being developed. This is vital to be able to triage and escalate issues effectively.
Work closely with the Product Manager to plan resources and dependencies for each release, delivering a project plan as the outcome.
Work with the Delivery Head and any partner manager to ensure all resources are in sync.
Be actively involved during the production phase and work with the creative, art, development & QC teams, across projects to ensure projects are on track. This involves reviewing progress on a periodic basis, with an actual hands-on review of builds, tracking checklists and updating project timelines.
If you are unable to resolve problems or concerns on your own, escalate them immediately and clearly, with possible options for management to decide on.
Be adept with scheduling tools such as MS Project, SmartSheets, or Trello.
Who could you be? Background and Experience:
Someone with a minimum of 2 years of work experience with experience launching at least 4 mobile apps or games (or updates) in the past 2 years.
You need to love playing games.
Have strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
A background in mobile app development will be very helpful, if not in mobile game development so that you are aware of the teams involved in the game development process.
Familiarity with Android and iOS devices and stores will be an added benefit.
Educational Qualification:
Bachelor s degree from an accredited university, preferably with additional formal qualifications in Project Management
Keywords: MS project, Project management, Workflow, Project planning, Scheduling, JIRA, Project delivery, Android, game development

Job Description:
An ideal candidate is someone who has worked with local advertisers, targeting audiences outside India across the gaming vertical.
  Main Responsibilities
You ll be a part of a dynamic team that works across all strategic ad product initiatives. Your key responsibilities will include:
Develop and manage the strategic relationships with our key agencies and advertisers, both accelerating the existing traditional and digital media business as well as helping unlock completely new client relationships
Consult key advertisers and agencies on how to leverage our partners with the objective of growing their business or delivering business and marketing objectives
Educate advertisers and agencies on our partner products through onsite presentations and one-on-one training
Attend industry events and conferences to generate new business leads
Track revenue performance across the business portfolio, determine and action corrective measures where needed
Ownership over the commercial success, full accountability, and strategic steering of short-term and long-term KPIs
Be creative, to be able to come up with new ideas to improve customer service standards
Core and Functional Skills and Knowledge
You have a Bachelor s degree or higher, preferably in Business Administration, Economics, Social Sciences or similar
You have minimum 5 years of Sales experience, focused on large accounts: creating, maintaining, and enhancing customer relationships
You have experience with clients from the gaming vertical, consumer electronics and BFSI is a plus
You have experience with online advertising, analytics, and social media
You have strong commercial skills (responsible for direct revenue)
You demonstrated the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment
You possess solid project management skills
Ability to manage large customer relationships, and manage through conflict, driving groups to collective business decision
You can efficiently communicate internally and externally with excellent communication skills in English
You are detail-oriented and able to successfully multitask on cross-functional projects
You have a positive attitude with a drive to learn
Benefits
Work in a dynamic team in a fast-paced industry of an international company with multi-cultural teams around the world
Learn from the best and work closely with our partners and learn from them
Work with innovative tech solutions
Manage the most prestigious agencies and brands
Competitive salary and benefits
Keywords: Digital media, Sales, Bfsi, Social media, Ad sales, Customer service, Digital marketing, Gaming, Consumer electronics, Analytics

Job Description:
As a LiveOps Product Manager, you will be responsible for day-to-day operation planning and execution for Capital Games titles. Additionally, you will be responsible for helping plan and execute Lifecycle Operations for players at different stages of their in-game journey. You should be passionate about representing the needs of players and providing a stable, engaging gameplay experience that drives sustainable revenue growth. Successful candidates will be detail-driven, with strong communication and organizational skills and an ability to partner with cross-discipline peers.
How your day would look like:
Plan and execute game Events and Sales within our toolsets and cadence
Coordinate closely with SWGOH LiveOps team
Coordinate release cadence with Live Partners (Art, Design, etc.) to ensure merchandising is fully resourced and on schedule Develop operational plans for new sale tactics
Actively maintain operational documentation and planning
Monitor performance metrics and surface action items to relevant stakeholders
Iterate on execution and balance to improve product performance
Who fits the bill:
Passion for creating and playing great freemium games
Analytical and problem-solving mindset
Detail-oriented and driven to pursue executional excellence
Ability to react and effectively execute in the face of change
Strong communication skills with partners and stakeholders
Fluency in mobile F2P monetization practices, sales, and event types
Strong understanding of Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes (preferred)
Self-motivated team player that brings excitement and enthusiasm to work each day
BS/BA degree; ideally in a quantitative discipline
1 year of experience working on a Live Game, ideally in a Product or Operational role (e.g., QA, CS, Community, etc.)
Keywords: QA, Sales, Analytical, Mobile phones, Packaging, HTML, Merchandising, Operations, Monitoring

Job Description:
All the attributes that we are looking for in an ideal teammate.
Openness - We welcome people from different backgrounds and schools of thought, Terraformers are open to different perspectives in approaching a solution and not just limit their thoughts or ideas to only a specific domain
Conscientiousness - We believe in working together for the larger goal and with complete dedication and not just for personal benefits, however we do not expect terraformers to work to the point of burnout
Humility- Being humble, grateful and respectful are the core traits of terraformers , we do not expect people to agree with every view of the management, feel free to have a different perspective but we always expect it to be put forward with respect
Risk Takers - Terraformers are not afraid of the unknown and are open to new things, not that we encourage extreme risks without weighing the consequences but we are ones who take calculated risks
Autodidacts - Terraformers teach themselves to learn, we do our own research to get solutions, we do not expect you to have a blank slate and figure everything out yourself, we are here to guide you but not handhold and micromanage you
Self-Actualization - Terraformers are on the path of self-actualization, we are not bothered by the noise and distractions around us, we only work towards achieving our full potential. We do not expect you to over-burden yourself and not have fun but we expect you to work to the best of your capabilities

Roles, Responsibilities Expectations:
Research and identify users of the Nbyula marketplace product. This includes users on the demand side, like aspiring international studies students, alumni, international professionals etc
Identify the most efficient and effective channels for reaching out to the users.
Manage and engage the users through a depth understanding of their group behavior and other motivations. Another important aspect of this research is to identify the challenges faced by the users in each segment, group the challenges via apt grouping criteria so that the product team can take those inputs and use them in the product.
Suggest and implement new interaction opportunities for the users, for eg. via gamification, social currency accumulation, community discussions, webinars, etc.
Conduct audio/video interviews and gather material that can be used by the content team to build content helpful for other users.
Direct/review content creatives to be posted to various social media accounts, to ascertain the fitness of the content with the audience segment expectations.
Analyze and publish the results of subjective discussions, objective surveys, or data points alluding to user behavior or challenges.
Work with the in-house or external audio/video teams to effectively capture audio/video content through user interviews.
Manage all the various tasks efficiently and effectively using the tools and technology offered by the company. This includes project management, conversation management, data analysis, document sharing, and collaboration tools, scheduling and meeting tools, etc.
Ability to persuade and close the loop on sign-up process for potential users on Nbyula platform

Experience with user/client onboarding and engagement
Pro in searching and collating information through online tools
Spoken and written English proficiency
Extremely numbers and objectives-driven person who can deliver set monthly/quarterly targets

Highly conversation driven
Ability to manage hundreds of conversations (Online/Chat/Telephonic)

High-energy and passion

Job Description: One must have familiarity with affiliate marketing networks and search engine marketing; proven record in negotiation and management of online media campaigns; knowledge in ad- serving technologies, experience in campaign management; excellent time management and project management skills; strong organizational, planning, problem solving, and decision- making skills, and the ability to multi- task, work under pressure and work well independently and in a team setting.
