Job Description:
We are looking for a specialized Game Developer who can translate a game concept into code in a fast-paced environment. From concept to finished product, you will be involved in all aspects of game development, including coding, programming, audio, design, production, and visual arts.
Responsibilities:
Convert requirements into complex, but clean and efficient code.
Build the foundation or engine that the game will run on.
Create prototypes of gameplay concepts and features.
Create timetables and set milestones.
Produce game scripts and storyboards.
Create animated characters and objects.
Qualifications and abilities
Demonstrated work experience in full-lifecycle game development.
Practical experience primarily with C++ or other programming languages is required (Java, C, etc).
API and library expertise is required.
Expert in one or more programming specialties (artificial intelligence, 3D Rendering, 3D animation, physics, multiplayer/networking, or audio)
Keep up with the most recent gaming trends, techniques, best practices, and technologies.
Capability to solve problems in novel and effective ways.
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science or Games Technology
Keywords: C++, 3d rendering, Networking, Coding, Artificial Intelligence, Programming, 3D animation, Gaming, game development

Job Description:
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the game development team to design, develop, and implement high-quality multiplayer games using Unreal Engine.
Utilize your expertise in vector math and linear algebra to create immersive and realistic gaming experiences.
Apply strong object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts, data structures, and algorithms to optimize game performance and enhance player experience.
Demonstrate solid programming skills in C++ or C# to develop and maintain game systems, mechanics, and gameplay features.
Solve complex problems creatively and effectively, ensuring smooth gameplay mechanics, efficient resource management, and optimal game performance.
Work in an agile development environment, following Scrum methodologies to deliver high-quality games within designated timelines.
Collaborate with artists, designers, and other developers to integrate assets, animations, and visual effects into the game engine.
Stay up to date with the latest advancements and best practices in game development, actively participating in knowledge sharing and continuous learning.
Requirements:
Minimum 1 to 4+ years of experience in game development, specifically in Unreal Engine. Candidates proficient in Unity3D and willing to transition to Unreal Engine will also be considered.
Extensive experience working on multiplayer games, understanding the challenges and intricacies involved in developing interactive online gaming experiences.
Strong knowledge of vector math and linear algebra, enabling you to implement advanced game mechanics and physics simulations.
Proficiency in OOP concepts, data structures, and algorithms, ensuring clean and efficient code.
Solid programming skills in C++ or C#, with the ability to write optimized and maintainable code.
Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to think creatively and devise innovative solutions to technical challenges.
Familiarity with agile and Scrum development methodologies, understanding the importance of iterative development, frequent releases, and continuous improvement.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively within a team environment.
Keywords: Game Development, c++, Unity3D, Unreal Engine

Job Description:
Responsibilities:
Provide creative leadership and oversight for games developed on Mobile platforms.
Lead the game production including building roadmaps, handling resourcing across teams, managing priorities, and achieving key product metrics.
Drive operations for live games, working closely with product, design, art, engineering marketing teams to deliver a high-quality player experience.
Work closely with your game team partners to identify improvements in existing processes and/or to craft new processes to efficiently produce high-quality work on time and on budget. You will also manage and drive these process changes across your team or across the organization.
Create concepts and pitch game ideas; evangelize these concepts to the studio and generate excitement and enthusiasm among the teams.
Foster a collaborative and successful working partnership with our company, external IP holders, and 3rd party development studios around the world.

Bachelor of Arts/Bachelor of Science or equivalent.

Understands current game design concepts, prototyping, Agile/Scrum, non-linear storytelling, core loops, USP, etc.
Experience in social/viral marketing; understands game analytics.

Knowledge of other game platforms and current trends.
Excellent organizational and interpersonal skills.

Job Description:
As a Senior Game Designer, you will use your creativity and talent to build awesome player experiences. You will be responsible for designing and implementing innovative game design mechanics for our exciting games or get the chance to work on a brand-new IP. Support our proficient team with your knowledge and experience in building something big. Develop outstanding new game features for free-to-play games; played by thousands of users across the world.
  RESPONSIBILITIES
Work with management to set and fine-tune the vision for the game
Come up with suitable game mechanics that fall in line with the game??s vision
Use a strong quantitative background to balance multiple variables in a new feature design
Model complex game systems in the context of existing constraints or completely free
Create and maintain design documentation
Iterate designs to create a great gameplay experience
Communicate with the game team to make them understand the design and the overall vision
Proactively find problems within the gameplay and come up with solutions
Mentor and train less experienced designers to help them level up.

  REQUIREMENTS
8+ years professional experience in Game Design and success designing systems for mobile or PC-based online games with engaged player communities.
Shipped more than three successful f2p games
Can clearly articulate your ability to design systems for online multi-player games
Proven experience in the balancing of a successful game on browser or mobile
Comfortable with Adobe products and current game engines is a plus
The first experience in scripting or programming is a plus

Job Description:
A Game Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and implementing video games for various platforms
They collaborate with a team of artists, designers, and programmers to bring game concepts to life
Game Developers utilize their creativity, technical skills, and knowledge of game design principles to create engaging and immersive gaming experiences
Here is a general job description for a Game Developer:
Responsibilities:
Game Development: Design, develop, and implement video games for various platforms, such as consoles, computers, mobile devices, or virtual reality (VR) systems
Collaborate with the team to conceptualize game ideas, storylines, characters, levels, and gameplay mechanics
Programming: Write efficient, clean, and maintainable code for game systems, including gameplay mechanics, user interfaces, artificial intelligence (AI), physics simulations, networking, and audio
Utilize programming languages and game engines such as C++, C#, or Unity
Game Mechanics and Systems: Implement and balance game mechanics, including player controls, character movement, combat systems, puzzles, quests, and progression systems
Ensure a smooth and enjoyable gameplay experience for players
Game Assets Integration: Integrate and optimize game assets created by artists and designers, such as 3D models, textures, animations, sound effects, and music
Collaborate closely with the art and design teams to ensure assets are properly implemented and meet technical requirements
Keywords: 3D, C++, Networking, Artificial Intelligence, Programming, Conceptualization, Gaming, game development

Job Description: Game Designer Game designers perform a number of tasks as a part of the design process. They design user interfaces, create storylines and characters, and role-play mechanics and gameplay prototypes. Game designers collaborate with artists to fine tune the visual style for games. They map out missions, puzzles, and other challenges for players to face during game play. While most game designers work in gaming studios, some work at advertising and design firms, web design firms, multimedia companies, mobile technology firms, and software development firms. They may hold titles such as lead designer, game developer, game designer, interactive designer, lead mobile game designer, lead game developer, senior game designer, and many others.

Job Description:
A Game Designer is responsible for conceiving, planning, and creating interactive and engaging gameplay experiences for video games
They play a crucial role in the development process, collaborating with various teams, including programmers, artists, writers, and producers, to bring the game concept to life
Game Designers must possess a passion for gaming, a deep understanding of player psychology, and a creative mindset to design captivating and immersive game worlds
Key Responsibilities:
Game Conceptualization: Collaborate with the game development team to brainstorm and conceptualize new game ideas
Create high-level design documents outlining the game's core mechanics, objectives, and overall gameplay experience
Level and System Design: Develop detailed level designs, gameplay systems, and mechanics that ensure a smooth and engaging player experience
Create prototypes and iterate on gameplay mechanics to achieve the desired fun factor and balance
Storytelling and Narrative Design: Craft compelling narratives and design story-driven elements that fit seamlessly into the gameplay
Work with writers and narrative designers to create a cohesive and immersive storytelling experience
Game Mechanics and Rules: Define the game's rules, mechanics, and player progression systems
Ensure that the gameplay is well-balanced, challenging, and rewarding to players
User Experience (UX) Design: Focus on providing players with an intuitive and enjoyable user experience
Test and optimize game mechanics to enhance usability and accessibility
Game Testing and Feedback: Conduct playtests and gather feedback from testers to identify areas of improvement and iterate on game designs accordingly
Game Economy and Monetization: Collaborate with the development and business teams to design in-game economies and monetization strategies, ensuring a balanced and fair experience for players
Documentation: Prepare detailed design documentation for the development team, including design documents, flowcharts, and wireframes
Industry Trends: Stay up-to-date with industry trends, player preferences, and emerging technologies to incorporate innovative features into game designs
Required Skills and Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Game Design, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
Strong passion for video games and a deep understanding of various game genres and platforms
Proficiency in game design tools such as Unity, Unreal Engine, or other relevant software
Solid understanding of player psychology, engagement mechanics, and game design principles
Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
Ability to think creatively and problem-solve to design unique and innovative gameplay experiences
Experience in creating and balancing game mechanics, systems, and levels
Knowledge of storytelling and narrative design in games
Familiarity with game development pipelines and processes
Adaptability and willingness to embrace iterative design and feedback-driven development
Keywords: Photoshop

Job Description:
Game Developer

We are looking for highly motivated individuals with pleasant personalities and good organizational skills to work as an Game developer. At least one Game on the Android/ iOS Marketplace is a must.

Must be willing to work on- site in our Rajnandgaon, Chhattisgarh office.

Must be able to understand all aspects of a typical business. We have all varieties of clients and need strong business skills.

Duties / Responsibilities include the following:

+ Development of cross plateform mobile games.

+ Deal with clients data, feeds and designs.

+ Co- operation with other development team members (e.g. Project manager, Web programmers, graphic designers, and authors, quality assurance) in the production of a finished product.

+ Ability to work on project without detailed instructions; taking the initiative with this job is important.

+ On- going maintenance of existing projects.

Qualifications:

Excellent knowledge of the Different Tools (Game Engine like Cocos2d- x or Unity3d)

Knowledge of C++ and OOPS Concept

Knowledge of Gaming Concept like Particle, SpriteSheets and Animation is a Must.

Knowledge of Plugins is a plus but not mandatory

Coding standards, organizational programming skills and good commenting practices is important
Keywords: C++, development, OOPS, Programming, mobile, ios, tools, Android, quality, PDF, Manager Quality Assurance, Coding, web, cocos2d, Animation, Gaming

Job Description:
As a Lead Game Programmer, you would be responsible for leading and managing a team of game programmers in the development of video games
Your role would involve overseeing the technical aspects of game development, guiding the programming team, and ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality games
Here are some key responsibilities and tasks associated with the role of a Lead Game Programmer
Technical Leadership: Providing technical leadership and guidance to the programming team throughout the game development process
This involves setting technical standards, best practices, and coding conventions to ensure consistency and efficiency in programming tasks
Team Management: Managing and mentoring a team of game programmers
This includes assigning tasks, monitoring progress, providing feedback and support, and promoting a collaborative and positive work environment
You would be responsible for the professional development and career growth of team members
Game Architecture and Design: Collaborating with the game design and art teams to define the overall game architecture and design
This involves analyzing requirements, identifying technical solutions, and making decisions on programming frameworks, tools, and technologies to be used in the game development process
Game Programming: Leading the development of complex game systems and features
This includes coding and implementing core gameplay mechanics, artificial intelligence (AI), physics, graphics rendering, networking, and other game-related functionalities
You would ensure that the code is efficient, maintainable, and scalable
Keywords: Graphics, Team management, Networking, Coding, Artificial Intelligence, Programming, Technical leadership, Management, Monitoring, game development

Job Description:
The Game Designer determines the structure of a game, which includes its rules, objectives, systems and features
You will be responsible to communicate these game elements to various Production team members and provide the direction needed to deliver the intended user experience
You will conceive the game's overall user experience and interaction scenarios to design user journeys, as well as user interfaces
You will be leading a team to deliver creative outcomes in a challenging project environment, as well as aligning expectations and outcomes with multiple teams
You will be mainly involved with creative ideation, provides guidance to your team
Responsibilities
Managing all creative aspects of the game from pitching ideas to rapid prototyping, pre-production onto test markets, launch, and beyond.
Creating well-documented designs and fun gameplay features for a breakthrough game.Work closely with narrative design to ensure the story is carried out well throughout each level.
Collaborating closely and ensuring alignment with programmers, artists, and developers.
Iterating, play-testing, and analyzing user feedback and social metrics to adjust gameplay and design to continuously push the boundaries of the games design and feature set.
Stay up to date with the latest player trends and incorporate these where applicable.
Qualifications
You must have prior experience as a Game Designer as well as a strong portfolio of sample projects.
You possess a deep and comprehensive knowledge of the games industry and game design (learning curve, directing the player, difficulty levels, balancing, pacing, motivation reward cycle, accessibility).
You are passionate about playing games across multiple genres.
You have excellent communication skills and can clearly articulate your ideas, designs, and suggestions.
You are a strong team player who can collaborate effectively with different stakeholders.

Job Description:
XRDigitech is seeking a creative and talented Game Designer to join our game development team

Collaborate with the creative team to conceptualize and develop innovative and engaging game ideas for XR plaforms, incorporating virtual reality, augmented reality, and mixed reality elements.
Design and prototype core gameplay mechanics, including player interactions, controls, AI behavior, game physics, and other game systems.
Create captivating and well-balanced level designs, considering spatial layout, pacing, player progression, and overall game flow.
Work with writers and narrative designers to integrate storytelling elements and create immersive narratives that align with gameplay objectives.
Ensure a seamless and intuitive user experience through effective UX design, user interface (UI) layout, and visual communication.
Continuously playtest and iterate on game elements to achieve optimal gameplay balance, challenge, and fun factor.
Create detailed design documents, game design specifications, and other supporting materials to effectively communicate design ideas to the development team.
Collaborate closely with developers, artists, audio designers, and QA testers throughout the development cycle to bring the game vision to life..
Analyze player feedback and playtesting data to make data-driven design decisions and refine the game design iteratively.
Desired Candidate Profile
A genuine passion for video games and XR technologies, with a deep understanding of what makes games enjoyable and engaging..
Strong creative thinking skills and the ability to come up with unique and captivating game concepts and mechanics.
Familiarity with game development engines and tools such as Unity or Unreal Engine is preferred.
Excellent communication skills to effectively convey game design ideas and concepts to the development team.
Ability to adapt to changing project requirements and provide design solutions that align with project goals.
Analytical and problem-solving abilities to address design challenges and iteratively improve the gameplay experience..
A collaborative mindset with the ability to work effectively within a multidisciplinary team.

Job Description:
As a Senior Product Manager, you will be a key member of our team tasked with growing our user base and expanding our audience
If you enjoy, strategically planning, developing and executing integrated marketing programs across several platforms (ie: Facebook, Chartboost, and more that will generate the demand, growth and subsequent acquisition of users across our entire game portfolio, you ll love this job

Requirements
What s required of you:
  Grow our mobile user base and drive traffic through paid advertising
Work with multiple advertising channels
  Provide analytical insight into mobile trends and strategize adjustments to increase our audience
  Uncover creative and non-traditional means to capitalize on untapped sources of traffic
  Synthesize external and internal data along with team feedback to develop coherent roadmaps and test plans for growing our player audience
Build and expand relationships with external partners, publishers and traffic sources
  Manage ongoing optimization of the acquisition funnel including A/B and multivariate testing
Work effectively across multiple internal teams (product, creative, engineering, etc.) to deliver successful end-to-end campaign definition, development and execution
  Measure campaign effectiveness, return on marketing spend, performance and campaign ROI
  Identify new partner, platform, and optimization opportunities to drive campaign performance
  Develop test plans, measure performance, and make recommendations based on testing.
  Partner with International and Localization teams to support International advertising as appropriate

Qualifications and Skills Required:
  Intuitive grasp of data and strong with Excel
  Genuine interest in social, gaming, analytics and advertising a must.
Analytical and data-focused with experience in mobile analytics, optimization and A/B testing
  Proactive, energetic self-starter who thrives on getting things done
  Exceptional communications skills: written, verbal as well as presentation abilities
  SQL and/or Programming Experience a plus.
Keywords: Marketing programs, Integrated marketing, Analytical, Product portfolio, Programming, Gaming, Advertising, Analytics, SQL, Testing

Job Description:
The Content Moderation/Moderator team focuses on reviewing photos, images, videos, and text-based content and decide as to whether the reviewed content violates our policies and terms of service. They review content which may be sensitive in nature. They can do things like moderate or delete messages, as well as invite, ban, or suspend people who violate the rules.
In this role, you are required to solve routine problems, largely through experience and knowledge, as well as per general guidelines.
Ability to remain neutral and review work as defined by policies and procedures, keeping personal bias aside.
You will be given detailed instructions on all tasks that need to be carried out and the decisions that you make will impact your work.
You will be working closely with project team members to effectively deliver on the requirements.
You will be a part of a team of moderators responsible for the predetermined, targeted scope of work.
You would review and investigate graphic, audio, and text content for violation of policies and guidelines. (For example - slurs, cuss words, adult content, etc.)
Manage and moderate our Discord channel, ensuring a positive and engaging community experience.
Develop and implement a marketing strategy to promote our game in various online channels, including social media, gaming forums, and gaming communities.
Collaborate with influencers and content creators to promote our game.
Plan and organize esports competitions, including creating tournament schedules, managing registration, and handling logistics.
Provide support to players during tournaments and other events.
Gather and analyse feedback from the community to inform game development and marketing decisions.
Participate in team meetings and contribute ideas to improve the game and the overall user experience.


Excellent written communication skills in English
Familiarity with eSports games
Must be a big fan of eSports in general Knowledge of Discord and Social Media platforms would be beneficial.

Job Description:
We are looking for an android wizard to join our technology team at our Hyderabad office. This profile demands passion for Android development and is filled with zeal. This is an exciting opportunity for Android enthusiasts who believe that code is poetry. Experience coupled with insights is someone whom we are looking for.

You have to be eager to learn new technologies & take ownership of workstreams, operate without close supervision, and work across the startup environment.

Roles and Responsibilities, technically speaking:
1. You will be involved in the end-to-end development of Android apps for our Gaming Platform with extensive hands-on Kotlin.
2. Design, build and maintain high-performance, reusable and reliable Kotlin code.
3. Identify and correct bottlenecks and bugs.
4. Brainstorming and engaging with the team to bring wowlicious ideas.

Things you must have:
1. Experience in Android SDK, Kotlin (must must-have!), Socket.io, and MVMM architecture.
2. Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
3. You should be result-oriented as we have a fast-paced environment with unlimited opportunities to learn and contribute.
4. Experimenting with new technologies to increase the "WOW" factor of our apps for our users.

What are you in for?
1. Highly interactive, fun-loving start-up, leading, exploring, brainstorming type environment.
2. Enhancing your knowledge of overall technology.
3. We don't waste time on processes and are very innovative and open to new thoughts.
Keywords: Kotlin, MVMM architecture, Socket.io, troubleshooting, Android SDK

Job Description:
Our product managers bring innovative, world-changing games and apps to market, with eyes focused squarely on the future, and work closely with creative and prolific engineers to help design and develop new products.
They are responsible for guiding apps from conception to launch, focusing specifically on analyzing consumer behavior, and generate profitable revenue streams for a global mobile audience across 180 countries.
As part of the Product Management team, you bridge technical and business worlds and then zoom out to lead matrix teams such as Development, Marketing and Data Scientists, to name a few.
As a Product Manager, you can be a part of shaping the next billion-dollar game.
The product Manager will take care of the whole product lifecycle starting from product conceptualization, creation of product roadmap strategy, incorporate best practices in products, managing product launches continuous improvements.
Concept and design innovative product feature aimed at improving customer acquisition, retention and monetization.
Dissect and understand core game loops, monetization features, and game mechanics as well as the metrics to which they are tied (acquisition, retention and monetization).
Work closely with engineers to understand and efficiently leverage game databases.
Work with designers to create specifications for features and optimize existing promotions/features.
Coordinate with production and marketing to implement and launch new game monetization features.
Analyze data and make recommendations on new features to help acquire, retain, and monetize our users.
Work with Business Intelligence on big data projects aimed at setting up a structure for new games.
Analyze metrics and user feedback in real-time to derive insights on user trends and behaviour. Measure the success of your product features after release and optimize their performance through rapid, data-driven iteration.
Align the overall product roadmap for a game with the current business needs.
Requirement:
Bachelor s Degree or MBA from Top University.
Strong Passion for games and gaming self-direction, drive and leadership.
Strong analytical capabilities in Excel, with attention to detail.
Experience in Product Management roles in online games, social media or consumer internet companies, is desirable.
Strong verbal and written Communication Skills.
Knowledge of SQL would be an added advantage.
Keywords: Product management, Customer acquisition, Analytical, Social media, product life cycle, Business intelligence, big data, Gaming, Product conceptualization, SQL

Job Description:
As a Product Manager Intern, your role will involve working closely with the product management team to assist in various aspects of product development and management. Here are the typical roles and responsibilities you might have as a Product Manager Intern:
Market Research: Conduct research to understand market trends, customer needs, and competitive landscape. Gather insights through surveys, interviews, and data analysis to contribute to product strategy.
Requirements Gathering: Assist in gathering and documenting product requirements by collaborating with cross-functional teams, including design, engineering, and marketing. Help define user stories, features, and functionalities.
Product Development: Support the product team in coordinating the development process, including prioritizing features, defining timelines, and ensuring smooth communication between teams.
User Experience (UX): Work with designers and user experience professionals to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces. Provide input on user flows, wireframes, and design mockups.
Data Analysis: Analyze user data and feedback to identify areas for improvement and potential new features. Use tools like Google Analytics or other data analysis tools to derive insights.
Project Management: Assist in managing the product roadmap and timelines. Help track progress, monitor deadlines, and address any issues that may arise during the development process.
Testing and Quality Assurance: Participate in product testing and quality assurance efforts. Identify and report bugs, usability issues, and other concerns during the testing phase.
Communication: Maintain open communication channels between different teams, stakeholders, and departments. Keep everyone informed about the products progress and any changes.
Documentation: Contribute to product documentation, including user guides, release notes, and internal documentation. Ensure that all relevant parties have access to accurate and up-to-date information.
Competitor Analysis: Monitor the activities of competitors and provide insights on their products, features, and strategies. This information can help inform your own product development decisions.
Customer Support: Collaborate with the customer support team to understand common user issues and feedback. Use this information to make improvements to the product and enhance the user experience.
Strategic Input: Offer creative ideas and insights during brainstorming sessions and strategy discussions. Your fresh perspective as an intern can lead to innovative solutions.
Learning and Development: Take advantage of the internship as a learning opportunity. Attend meetings, workshops, and training sessions to enhance your understanding of product management practices.
Adaptation and Flexibility: Be adaptable to changes in project priorities, requirements, and timelines. Learn how to handle unexpected challenges that can arise during product development.
Ethical Considerations: Be aware of ethical considerations related to user privacy, data security, and other relevant areas. Ensure that the product aligns with ethical standards and regulations.
Keywords: Product management, Data analysis, Manager Quality Assurance, Google Analytics, Intern, data security, Project management, Market research, Customer support, Internship

Job Description:
Position Overview:

The Product Support Associate will be part of the Customer Support and Services team which uses, top-of-the-line CRM tools like Sales force and other applications like Go-To-Assist / Go-To-Meeting for remote desktop sharing. The application support specialist in Replicon is not only a Support professional, but also a researcher, a tester and a consultant to both customers and product management. Job Description:
Role Overview
The Technical Artist (TA) acts as a bridge between the artists and programmers working on a game. They ensure art assets can be easily integrated into a game without sacrificing the overall artistic vision or exceeding the technical limits of the chosen platform. The Technical Artist works as part of the art team and coordinates closely with the lead artists and the art director, as well as with the lead programmers.
The main areas of responsibility for Technical Artists include setting up and maintaining the art production workflow and making decisions about which art packages and tools a studio should use. Technical Artists are also charged with investigating new techniques and implementing them within the team. The job often includes an instructional element, with the Technical Artist sharing their knowledge with other artists via training and mentoring sessions.
The Technical Artist typically works one step removed from the direct creation of game art assets, setting up the systems of production as well as solving problems as they arise. It s crucial for the Technical Artist to keep upto-date in changes in technology, both in terms of mobile hardware, art packages, and new techniques. The Technical Artist is expected to be able to create custom tools to improve the efficiency of their team. This is usually carried out using the scripting languages included in the main modeling and animation packages.

Responsibilities:
Report to the Incubation Lead
Prepare assets for export from Maya and import into UE4, ensuring they work within technical constraints
Collaborate with engineering to implement technical art features
Identify and implement art pipeline optimizations
Implement technical benchmarks for various art features (mesh rendering, vfx, LODs)
Generalist approach to work on various art related work like vfx, animations, materials, optimizations
What skills does EA look for
Technical Artists for EA will have experience involving both art and programming. A Technical Artist can come from either background, though most tend to have been artists who have specialized in a particular area of art production.
They should have a detailed knowledge of at least one industry-standard art package. The use of scripting languages is required, as is an understanding of the limitations of mobile hardware. Some Technical Artists come to games after holding a similar position in the film or special effects industries, where the experience of high-end rendering techniques or complex animation are useful skills.
The role of Technical Artist is a specialized one. Candidates must be able to show technical proficiency in areas such as lighting and rendering, texturing, and graphics related programming languages such as shaders. They should also have extensive knowledge of art packages ranging from modeling to texturing and special effects and be able to customize them to be as streamlined as possible for specific projects.
Most Technical Artists will have a degree in a relevant visual art or technical subject; however, the most important prerequisite for the role is experience working with art tools and game hardware on a wide range of projects.



Skills and Experience:
3 years of professional experience in games production on at least one shipped game title, preferably a shooter
Advanced knowledge of Maya and familiarity with modeling and texturing
Keywords: Graphics, C++, Texturing, Maya, Animation, Workflow, HTML, Gaming, Android, game development

Job Description:
Job Title: Sales Associate
Company Name: StoxHero Games Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
Location: Remote
Job Type: Full-Time
Experience Level: 0 to 3 years
Salary: 3.6 LPA (Fixed + Variable)
Industry Segment Stock Market/ Investment Banking (Finance)

About StoxHero:
StoxHero is a dynamic and innovative online trading platform committed to empowering individuals with the knowledge and tools they need to succeed in the stock market. Our platform offers a risk-free environment for learning and an exciting opportunity to earn real profits through various programs. We are on a mission to make trading accessible to everyone, and we're looking for passionate Sales Associates to join our team and help us achieve this goal.

Job Description:
As a Sales Associate at StoxHero, you will play a crucial role in educating our platform users about the benefits of our paid products and converting leads into sales. You will work in a target-driven environment, and your primary responsibilities will include:

Responsibilities:
1. Managing and prioritizing leads generated by the system.
2. Conducting outbound calls to users to explain the advantages and features of StoxHero's paid products.
3. Understanding users' needs and tailoring product offerings to meet those needs effectively.
4. Building and maintaining strong, long-lasting customer relationships.
5. Achieving and exceeding weekly and monthly sales targets.
6. Keeping accurate records of leads and their status in our CRM system.
7. Providing feedback to the team on user preferences, objections, and market trends.
8. Collaborating with the marketing team to optimize lead generation strategies.
9. Staying up-to-date with industry trends and competitors' offerings.

Qualifications:
1. Any graduate (Sales or Marketing specialization is a plus).
2. Previous sales experience is advantageous but not mandatory; we welcome both freshers and those with up to 3 years of experience.
3. Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
4. Results-oriented with a competitive spirit.
5. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
6. Excellent organizational and time-management skills.
7. Proficiency in using CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite.
8. A passion for finance, trading, or investing is a bonus.
Keywords: Communication Skills, Target Achievement, Negotiation, Customer Service, Networking, Continuous Improvement, Problem Solving, Convincing Power, Product Knowledge, Verbal Communication, Counselling, Leadership Skills, Teamwork

Job Description:
As a Slingshot analytics team member, you will help guide business intelligence. Reporting to the Analytics Manager, you will use data to gain valuable insights into player behavior and their interactions with our games and features.
Responsibilities:
Share, present, and promote relevant insights discovered through analytics efforts to improve product feature design and user experience.
Blend analytical rigour with product knowledge to accomplish deep dives and provide relevant recommendations for product teams.
Use different analysis techniques and model trends in our data to predict how new content, features, and campaigns will affect the economy, performance, and player experience.
Use exploratory data analysis techniques to identify meaningful relationships, patterns, or trends from complex data sets and validate your results.
Develop player clusters based on behavioral patterns, which will be used to customize features and content and improve the player experience.
Translate problems into structured analyses or data products that create applicable insights that maximize value.
Partner with engineers and feature owners to design and set up robust telemetry for Pogo that enables high-quality analysis.
Build data pipelines to cater to different data needs of your team and allow them with self-service capabilities using ETL techniques and Airflow scheduling.
Basic Qualifications:
4+ years experience in a product analytics role using data to help guide decisions in a consumer products-oriented industry - gaming, social networks, or entertainment.
3+ years of hands-on experience in data mining, machine learning, or statistical modeling
Experience with tools such as Tableau, Power-BI, Looker.
SQL skills, including experience querying complex datasets on a platform such as Redshift.
Experience with R or Python.
Keywords: Data analysis, Analytical, Machine learning, Wellness, Scheduling, Data mining, Gaming, Analytics, SQL, Python

Job Title: Senior Product Manager - Tech Enablement, Central Tech
Job Description:
As a Senior Product Manager for Central Technology, you will be responsible for leading Product to design, develop, and maintain Zyngas platform portfolio, which accelerates game development and streamlines live operations. The role will initially focus on building the social (Chat, Guilds, and Leaderboards) and Compliance (data privacy and region-based) product suite owned by the Tech Enablement team with Central Technology. However, as you grow in the role, you will likely own additional products and services.
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
Responsible for the full product lifecycle including product strategy, competitive analysis, requirements gathering, feature prioritization, spec writing, roadmap management, and stakeholder alignment.
Define how we will measure the success and efficiency of products and services
Apply qualitative consumer insights and quantitative data to advise product decisions and business cases.
Define our product vision by understanding our players needs. Partner closely with Product and Engineering leaders on game teams to build feedback loops for continuous improvements and identify patterns of need across Zynga and our wider player base.
Evangelize our offerings. Get commitments from internal customers and achieve roadmap alignment. Articulate the value of each service in our portfolio and help our customer teams understand how we can help solve their problems
Identify & deconstruct competitive offerings in the market, formulate insights, and use them to inform future roadmap direction.
Responsible for a large central technology product and/or multiple products.
Collaborate closely with other technical leaders in Central Technology and across disciplines and global locations to drive best practices and positive team culture.
DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
4+ years of product management experience in social tech, games, mobile or consumer web applications
Strong project management and ability to present work to executive staff
Sound product judgment, ability to formulate product strategy and present clear measurable objectives that will lead to achieving our business goals.
Ability to balance player, partner, and business interests while considering technical integration tradeoffs.
Ability to create wire-frames and mock-ups, write product specifications, and white papers
Some experience with data analytics and SQL preferred
Outstanding written/oral and organizational skills
A driven self-starter with attention to detail and a dedicated team player
Familiarity with Data Privacy / Compliance / Regulatory requirements a plus
Experience in start-up, consumer tech, or consulting is strongly preferred
BA/BS degree; MBA or Computer Science preferred
Keywords: Compliance, Competitive analysis, Focus, product life cycle, Manager Technology, data privacy, Management, Product strategy, game development

Responsible for the full product/game lifecycle, from writing specifications, working across multi-disciplinary teams: design, art, and engineering to launch core features within our existing and new games!
Exhibit sound product discernment, ability to formulate product strategy and present clear measurable objectives that will lead to achieving our business goals.
Expected to provide valuable input into business cases based on in-depth data analysis and demonstrate how that analysis impacts key product metrics.
Run prioritization and trade-offs among customer experience, technical constraints and business drivers.

You be a self-starter, a teammate and driven

Job Description:
As a Unity Game Developer at Fabzen, you will be responsible for implementing game functionality and translating design ideas, concepts, and requirements into a functional and engaging game
Your responsibilities also include the evaluation of code and the performance of the applications and software produced

Responsibilities:
Plan, design and implement high-quality game features, and work as part of the wider studio team.
Transform design specifications into functional game assets.
Establish an effective strategy and development pipeline.
Quickly create and iterate on prototypes showcasing new designs and interaction patterns.
Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code.
Ensure the best performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications and games.
Identify process and application bottlenecks and implement solutions in a timely manner.
Take ownership of the entire features and components of the game lifecycle and lead the product design and code elements.
Collaborate with other members of the team to deliver large and complex features on time and to a high standard.
Be part of the development process and contribute improvements and suggestions, driving the quality of the code throughout the entire production cycle.
Mentor other developers in the team and help maintain code, product, and process quality.
Partner with Art, Design and Production teams to ensure schedules and goals meet business and project needs.
Conduct code reviews and be part of the hiring process for future colleagues.
Bring meaningful contributions to our product and the entire team.

5+ years of experience with Unity 3D/Content Development.
Strong 3D math skills.
Strong C# object-oriented programming and scripting language skills.
Experience working with game assets. (meshes, animations, materials, etc.)
Experience profiling and optimising games and render performance. (GPU and CPU)
Experience working on a physics-based game project, and source control systems such as Git in a multi-developer team environment.
Understanding of UX design process and experience working with UX design team and/or development team.
Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field.

Job Description:
As a UI/UX Artist Mobile Games , you will be working on the overall user experience of the game in all aspects and phases of production, you propose solutions to translate game design requirements into usable and memorable graphical user interfaces
What do you need to do(Role and Responsibilities)
You will work closely with the Product Managers and Game Designers to create clean, clutterfree, usercentric, trendy and easy to understand user interfaces (UI) for mobile games.
You need to be dedicated to researching and playing hundreds of mobile games to understand best practices in the Industry.
Work on the UI design (Flows, Menus and HUDs) as per requirements.
Explore and create high fidelity mockups and then the individual graphical elements needed for mobile screens, including iconography.
Create wireframes or modify existing screen flows based on design specifications or feedback.
Apply and maintain a consistent look and feel throughout the UI.
Ability to make design decisions and take on design problems independently, present and sell design concepts.

You should have a background in graphic design/interaction design/HCI related areas. You should have at least 4-5 years of experience in mobile games/apps.
At least shipped 5 apps/games as an UI/UX Artist.
You are proficient with prototyping tools such as Axure, Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator or other software for creating flowcharts, wireframes and Final UI Design mock-ups.
Hands-on experience or knowledge of Unity 3D is a plus.
Strong foundational graphic design skills (colour theory, composition, typography etc).
Possess an excellent understanding of visual design principles, style guidelines, design processes, and creative workflow.
Bring art to life while improving the UX with visuals.
Excellent communication skills and high attention to detail.
Ability to give and receive constructive criticism and critique with a focus on improving quality
Team player with a great attitude & love for mobile games
Educational Qualifications:
Bachelor s degree in graphic arts, interaction design, or equivalent industry experience in the design field.

We are looking for a talented unity developer to join our design team. As a unity developer, you will be responsible for planning and implementing game functionality, building the game code, identifying bottlenecks, and ensuring the quality of the finished product. You may also be required to build patches and install game updates.

Establishing strategy and development pipelines.
Planning and implementing game functionality.
Transforming design ideas into functional games.

Job Description:
We are hiring a Senior Analyst to support Mako Studios based in EA Hyderabad. You will partner with key stakeholders in our game studios and report to the NA Mobile Analytics Manager, working across multiple disciplines including design, UX, and game PMs to understand foundational insights needs, and implement a plan to not just shape the future of the franchise but to guide both the games and studio to success.
What a Senior Analyst will do on our team:
Partner with our global data counterparts to set up robust telemetry for our mobile games, and to ensure the studio team is equipped with data for live operations.
Work with game Product Managers to analyze the impact of features and live services within the game and provide recommendations in a clear, understandable, and applicable way to affect future iterations.
Model trends in our data using different analysis techniques to predict the ways in which new content and campaigns will affect the economy, its performance, and our players.
Promote a data-informed culture within the studio, and influence product decisions through the lens of data.
Bring advanced analytics techniques (e.g. prescriptive and predictive) to solve challenges in achieving our business goals.
Experience Background
3+ years of experience doing complex quantitative analysis to help guide decisions, preferably in a consumer products-oriented industry (e.g. gaming, entertainment, e-commerce)
Proficiency with SQL
1+ years experience with using R and/or Python in an industry setting
Experience with data visualization applications (e.g. Looker, Tableau)
Experience with experimental design and applied statistics in an industry setting
Experience in mobile or free to play games strongly preferred
Keywords: Product Analyst, Analyst, Mobile phones, Packaging, HTML, data visualization, Gaming, SQL, Python, game development

Job Description:
Growth Associate observes how users experience their pain points concerning the area in which the business operates and how they interact with the product to alleviate their problems, guide the users in a manner they can use the product in a much more optimal fashion, and provide this data and inputs to the product team to incorporate. By tracking usage patterns, identifying trends, and making inferences about users preferences, needs, and behaviors, they help the users most out of the products and they make informed recommendations for product managers and other guardians of the product.
They should get in touch with the users on the Nbyula platform through online or in-person mode if need be, and with respect to Nbyula market place figure out ways wherein demand-side users can be matched with the supply-side service providers on the platform. This is a full-time terraformer position, meaning that you hit the ground running and quickly absorb the functional domain skills, business and market domain knowledge and above all Nbyula s core organizational values!

Roles, Responsibilities Expectations:
Research and identify users of the Nbyula marketplace product. This includes users on the demand side, like aspiring international studies students, alumni, international professionals etc
Identify the most efficient and effective channels for reaching out to the users.
Manage and engage the users through a depth understanding of their group behavior and other motivations. Another important aspect of this research is to identify the challenges faced by the users in each segment, group the challenges via apt grouping criteria so that the product team can take those inputs and use them in the product.
Suggest and implement new interaction opportunities for the users, for eg. via gamification, social currency accumulation, community discussions, webinars, etc.
Conduct audio/video interviews and gather material that can be used by the content team to build content helpful for other users.
Direct/review content creatives to be posted to various social media accounts, to ascertain the fitness of the content with the audience segment expectations.
Analyze and publish the results of subjective discussions, objective surveys, or data points alluding to user behavior or challenges.
Work with the in-house or external audio/video teams to effectively capture audio/video content through user interviews.
Formulate a thesis on what works the best for the users and implement and share the outcomes with them
Manage all the various tasks efficiently and effectively using the tools and technology offered by the company. This includes project management, conversation management, data analysis, document sharing, and collaboration tools, scheduling and meeting tools, etc.
Ability to persuade and close the loop on sign-up process for potential users on Nbyula platform

Qualifications Skills:
0-4 years of experience in B2B/B2C sales domain
Experience with user/client onboarding and engagement
Pro in searching and collating information through online tools
Spoken and written English proficiency
Extremely numbers and objectives-driven person who can deliver set monthly/quarterly targets
Should be present and active on social media platforms (LinkedIn / Instagram / Facebook / Twitter , etc)
Highly conversation driven
Ability to manage hundreds of conversations (Online/Chat/Telephonic)
Effective communication skills
Strong organizational and interpersonal skills
High convincing and persuasive skills
High-energy and passion

Who is an ideal match for being a terraformer at Nbyula
All the attributes that we are looking for in an ideal teammate.
Openness- We welcome people from different backgrounds and schools of thought, Terraformers are open to different perspectives in approaching a solution and not just limit their thoughts or ideas to only a specific domain
Conscientiousness- We believe in working together for the larger goal and with complete dedication and not just for personal benefits, however we do not expect terraformers to work to the point of burnout
Humility- Being humble, grateful and respectful are the core traits of terraformers, we do not expect people to agree with every view of the management, feel free to have a different perspective but we always expect it to be put forward with respect
Risk Takers- Terraformers are not afraid of the unknown and are open to new things, not that we encourage extreme risks without weighing the consequences but we are ones who take calculated risks
Autodidacts- Terraformers teach themselves to learn, we do our own research to get solutions, we do not expect you to have a blank slate and figure everything out yourself, we are here to guide you but not handhold and micromanage you
Self-Actualization- Terraformers are on the path of self-actualization, we are not bothered by the noise and distractions around us, we only work towards achieving our full potential. We do not expect you to over-burden yourself and not have fun but we expect you to work to the best of your capabilities
Keywords: Automation, Data analysis, Project management, Analytical, Social media, German, Scheduling, Gaming, Operations

Job Description:
As a Product analyst intern, youll use your quantitative skill set and business acumen to improve the product and learning experience for users on Scaler
You will collaborate closely with product managers, designers, engineers, and operations teams
What youll do
Develop data-driven business insights and narratives to identify opportunities, generate new hypotheses, and define product strategies through a deep understanding of the data, our customers
Analyze experiments to measure the impact of new product features
Use the Product Analytics tool to dig for insights around current product usage by users and
to identify opportunities for impact
Help Product Managers, Operations, and Support to identify the scope of the opportunity
driven by data
Basic O ualifications
1 par experience using data analytics
Basic SO L and Excel expertise, Initial python understanding
Detail-oriented, with the ability to work both independently and collaboratively
Preferred O ualifications
Prior experience as a Product analyst intern
Strong storytelling to distill interesting and useful insights into a compelling, concise data story
Passionate self-starter with a strong work ethic
Why Scaler
Empowering role: This role is very similar to running your startup in the space. High ownership environment.
Distinctive team: Our team is an inspiration powerhouse built with the best of Facebook, Google, Twitter, McKinsey, BCG, Sequoia Capital, Bain Capital and Hotstar to name a few
Unicorn trajectory: Unlike 99% of startups, we believe in sustainable growth. No wonder, we are profitable and on course to be a unicorn in the next 24-36 months
Marquee investors: Our investors are marquee firms such as Sequoia Capital (Investors in Google, Apple, and Cisco) and Tiger Global (a major investor in Flipkart). We are also backed by the Singapore govt along with other strategic angel investors
Culture of a caring meritocracy with great perks: A caring meritocracy built by inspirational leaders; free food, health insurance and an ultra-chic office space
Market leading compensation: If we like you, we will make sure you like our offer :)
Keywords: Product Analyst, Power house, Health insurance, Basic, Usage, Excel, Intern, Data analytics, cisco, Python

Job Description:
Role Overview
We are hiring a Product Analyst to support Mako Studios based in EA Hyderabad. You will partner with key stakeholders in our game studios and report to the NA Mobile Analytics Manager, working across multiple disciplines including design, UX, and game PMs to understand foundational insights needs, and implement a plan to not just shape the future of the franchise but to guide both the games and studio to success.
What a Product Analyst will do on our team:
Partner with our global data counterparts to set up robust telemetry for our mobile games, and to ensure the studio team is equipped with data for live operations.
Work with game Product Managers to analyze the impact of features and live services within the game and provide recommendations in a clear, understandable, and applicable way to affect future iterations.
Model trends in our data using different analysis techniques to predict the ways in which new content and campaigns will affect the economy, its performance, and our players.
Promote a data-informed culture within the studio, and influence product decisions through the lens of data.
Bring advanced analytics techniques (e.g. prescriptive and predictive) to solve challenges in achieving our business goals.
Experience Background
1+ years of experience doing complex quantitative analysis to help guide decisions, preferably in a consumer products-oriented industry (e.g. gaming, entertainment, e-commerce)
Proficiency with SQL
1+ years experience with using R and/or Python in an industry or academic setting
Familiarity with data visualization applications (e.g. Looker, Tableau)
Experience with experimental design and applied statistics in an industry or academic setting
Experience in mobile or free to play games strongly preferred
Keywords: Product Analyst, Mobile phones, Packaging, HTML, data visualization, Gaming, SQL, Python, game development

Job Description:
We are currently looking for a highly motivated and experienced Senior Search Engineer / Architect with experience in designing, developing and optimizing search solutions (using technology like Elasticsearch or Vespa) to join our team. Experience with vector-based search, and NLP technologies is a plus. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimizing domain-specific search solutions that drive meaningful engagement and results for our users. You will be working closely with our engineering and product teams to ensure seamless integration of search functionality into our products.

In this role, you will need to:
Design, develop, and optimize search solutions using Vespa, leveraging its advanced features to deliver best-in-class search experiences for our users
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design, and develop search solutions that address the unique needs of each user
Provide technical and architectural leadership and be a primary contact for architecture pertaining to search
Communicate and coordinate activities with other teams such as QA, BA, and infrastructure
Continuously monitor and analyze search performance, identifying areas for improvement and implementing necessary changes to optimize search relevancy and ranking
Stay up to date with the latest developments in the search domain and contribute to the integration of new techniques and technologies into our search platform
Assist in the development of testing frameworks and methodologies to ensure the quality and performance of search solutions
If required, during your initial months, you will receive appropriate mentorship from Vespa experts to develop technology-related know-how

You Should Apply If You Possess:
Bachelors or masters degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field
5+ years of experience in search engine development, with a strong focus on search and analytics technology, like Elasticsearch or Vespa
Deep understanding of search algorithms, ranking, and relevancy optimization
Proficiency in Python/Java or other programming languages commonly used in search engineering
Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and distributed systems
Experience with machine learning techniques and their application to search and recommendation systems
Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

It will be good to have:
Experience with search technologies, such as Solr, ElasticSearch or Vespa
Familiarity with natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) techniques
Experience with both text and vector-based search in Elasticsearch (or other systems)
Experience with learning-to-rank models
Experience working with large-scale, high-availability search systems
Basic understanding of DataOps that will assist in loading data into the indexes
Keywords: Analytical, Machine learning, Data structures, Natural language processing, Information technology, Gaming, Distribution system, Analytics, Python

Job Description:
What's BankSathi?
BankSathi is a tech-enabled platform and a one-stop destination for customers of Pan India to choose from an array of options offered by the leading financial institutions.
Our mission is to orchestrate a robust network of advisors and pave the way for an effortless journey to financial services. We intend to reshape the Indian Fintech market with Digital Bharat and become the largest technology based distributor of financial products.
We are a family of over 15+ lakh happy advisors and 35 lakh customers - thriving every day.
Who's backing us?

With a backing from large financial institutes and marquee angel investors such as Kotak, Hem securities, Lets venture, WFC We Founder Circle, Sunil Singhania (Abakkus Invest), Kunal Shah (CRED, Freecharge), Varun Alagh (Mamaearth), CP Toshniwal (Future Group, CFO), Kailash Biyani (Omega Capital), Mukul Rastogi (ClassPlus), Achal Miital (Liquiloans, RentoMojo), Anand Maliwal (Inditrade), Chandan Garg (Innovana)

Job Description:
We re EA the world s largest video game publisher. You re probably familiar with many of our titles Madden, FIFA, The Sims, Need for Speed, Dead Space, Battlefield and Star Wars, to name a few. But maybe you don t know how we re committed to creating games for every platform from social to mobile to console to give our consumers that anytime, anywhere access they demand. What does that mean for you It means more opportunities to unleash your creative genius, be inspired by those around you and ignite your path in any direction you choose.
As EA s first label dedicated to purely digital games, EA Mobile creates games for mobile devices, social networks and online environments that deliver seamless play anytime, anywhere, on any device. Connecting a market of more than one billion core and mass - casual gamers worldwide, EA Mobile delivers engaging, accessible, high quality games to people of all skill levels and interests.
The EA Mobile portfolio encompasses some of the most recognizable entertainment brands in the world, including titles such as The Simpsons, Tetris Blitz, SCRABBLE, MONOPOLY, Plants vs Zombies 2, Real Racing 3, Dungeon Keeper as well as online games destination Pogo.com.
The Hyderabad office represents one of EA Mobile s largest development organizations with more than 700 passionate mobile game experts involved in game development, testing, production and distribution. The game development studio is a team within this organization that is committed to building and running live services for some of EA s top games.
Our vision is to be EA Mobile s center of excellence for Live Services and help grow the footprint of casual games in the market. Here are the values we truly believe in:
Collaboration Great things are not done by an individual but by a team of highly motivated folks
The role
As a Development Manager (DM), you ll primarily drive planning and execution on a cross - functional development team to build and ship new content, features and games.
This is a leadership role that involves a high level of interaction with team members, peers, and product leadership. DM s focus on outcomes, solving problems, and making things work (or work better). You ll develop, maintain, and drive the project schedule from start to finish, while making sure the path is clear of obstacles for your team.
You ll be accountable for leading the team to meet milestones and quality targets, creating and improving processes, coordinating with support departments across the company, tracking and resolving issues, monitoring development KPIs and seeking out and ing knowledge to improve the organization.
As a Development Manager, your responsibilities include:
Act as Scrum Master for a cross - functional development team(s)
Drive development execution from concept to live
Create project schedules that maximize feature quality and scope within resource, financial, and development partner constraints
Anticipate bottlenecks and risks, provide management escalation, project prioritization, make tradeoffs, balance the business needs versus technical constraints, and drive the process forward
Own the project schedule and communicate any divergence from the plan
Report status at regular intervals, escalate urgent issues in a timely manner
Hold the team accountable to its commitments
Working with discipline leaders, evaluate individual performance and potential of team members, provide appropriate recognition and constructive feedback
Educate the team on best practices, processes, and standards as needed
Inspire and motivate team(s) through personal example
Being part of the team:
Manage stakeholder communication and requirements
Form close working relationships with team and discipline leads
Solve problems, balance priorities, and find creative solutions that achieve results
If you re interested in this role, you ll need these skills or experiences:
4 years project management or team leadership experience (preferably game development)
Solid foundation in project management methodologies and tools
Demonstrable knowledge of software development life cycles
Excellent analytical and problem - solving skills
Effective communication skills across all levels of an organization
Game development experience (casual gaming or mobile gaming preferred)
Familiarity with EA s mobile products Project management certifications or training
Company Profile
Electronic Arts Inc. is a leading global interactive entertainment software company. EA delivers games, content and online services for Internet - connected consoles, personal computers, mobile phones and tablets.
EEOText EA is an equal opportunity employer. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. EA also makes workplace accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities as required by applicable law.

Keywords: Training, Project management, Analytical, Process improvement, Mobile phones, HTML, Scrum, Gaming, Monitoring, game development

Job Description:
As a Product Manager for our upcoming mobile battle royale game, you will play a crucial role in driving the product strategy and ensuring the games successful launch
You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including game designers, engineers, artists, and marketers, to define the games vision, features, and monetization strategies
Your responsibilities will include conducting market research, analyzing player preferences, defining the product roadmap, and coordinating the development process from concept to launch
The ideal candidate is passionate about mobile gaming, has a deep understanding of the battle royale genre, and possesses the skills necessary to manage a complex and evolving project
Responsibilities :
Define the product roadmap, prioritize features, and coordinate with development teams to ensure timely and successful implementation
Conduct market research, analyze player preferences, and identify key trends and opportunities to inform product decisions
Collaborate with game designers, engineers, artists, and marketers to develop the product vision, features, and monetization strategies for the upcoming mobile battle royale game
Gather and analyze user feedback, conduct playtesting sessions, and iterate on the games design to optimize the player experience
Coordinate with stakeholders to ensure alignment on project goals, timelines, and deliverables
Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitive landscape to inform product strategy and maintain a competitive advantage
Monitor key performance metrics and utilize data-driven insights to drive decision-making and optimize the games performance
Provide leadership and guidance to the development team throughout the product lifecycle
Work closely with the marketing team to develop effective user acquisition and engagement strategies for the games launch
Experience Skills required :
Bachelors degree in a relevant field, such as Game Design, Computer Science, or Business Administration
Atleast 3+ years of experience as a Product Manager in the mobile gaming industry, with a strong focus on game development, with proven track record of managing successful game projects from concept to launch
Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and insights to drive product decisions.
Deep understanding of the battle royale genre and its core mechanics, as well as trends and player preferences within the genre, is a plus
Excellent project management and organizational skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
Passion for gaming and a deep understanding of player motivations and preferences
Experience with Agile development methodologies and tools is preferred
Keywords: Analytical skills, Business administration, Interpersonal skills, Project management, Agile development, Market research, Gaming, Product strategy, game development

Job Description:
As an Engineering Manager at PTW, As an Engineering Manager, you will be responsible for managing a team of engineers, overseeing the development of gaming projects, and ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality games on time
Your in-depth knowledge of Unreal Engine and strong leadership abilities will be essential in driving the technical success of our games
Desired Qualities:
Engineer at heart: Likes to dive deep, have the big picture and at the same time pay attention to details, able to review architectures and provide suggestions, brainstorm about the technologies, and guide the team on technical matters
Coach & Mentor: Understand the strengths and weaknesses of each team member and provide opportunities for the team to learn and grow.
Obsession for Quality: Always strive to improve the quality of the systems and strive to provide a better player experience.
Lead Inclusively & Develop Others - Create a belonging culture, pay attention to the diversity of thoughts and psychological safety, help others to achieve career fulfillment and success, and build a high-performing team through meaningful conversations.
Problem solver: Identify the problems be it in the product or people and propose the solutions for the problems.
Responsibilities:
Team Leadership:
Manage and lead a team of engineers, providing guidance, mentorship, and support to ensure their professional growth.
Set clear performance objectives, provide regular feedback, and conduct performance evaluations.
Foster a collaborative and inclusive team culture that encourages innovation, creativity, and excellence.
Project Management:
Oversee the development lifecycle of gaming projects, from concept to release, ensuring adherence to project timelines, quality standards, and budget constraints.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including artists, designers, and QA, to align project goals and drive efficient development processes.
Identify and mitigate project risks, develop contingency plans, and ensure effective communication of project status and updates to stakeholders.
Technical Expertise:
Demonstrate expert-level knowledge of Unreal Engine and its tools, frameworks, and best practices.
Provide technical guidance and support to the development team, assisting with complex problem-solving, code reviews, and optimization.
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in game development, Unreal Engine features, and industry best practices.
Process Improvement:
Identify areas for process improvement, efficiency gains, and quality enhancements within the development pipeline.
Drive the implementation of best practices, coding standards, and tools to optimize development workflows.
Continuously evaluate and recommend new technologies, tools, and techniques to enhance productivity and game performance.
Collaboration and Communication:
Foster effective collaboration and communication across teams, ensuring a shared understanding of project objectives, priorities, and dependencies.
Act as a liaison between the engineering team and other stakeholders, including product managers, artists, and designers, to facilitate smooth project execution.
Communicate technical concepts and requirements clearly and concisely to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.


Bachelors degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Proven experience of 8+ years in game development, with a focus on Unreal Engine.

Job Description:
We are looking for an android wizard to join our technology team at our Hyderabad office. This profile demands passion for Android development and is filled with zeal. You have to be eager to learn new technologies & take ownership of workstreams, operate without close supervision, and work across the startup environment.

1. You will be involved in the end-to-end development of Android apps for our Gaming Platform with extensive hands-on Kotlin.
2. Design, build and maintain high-performance, reusable and reliable Kotlin code.
3. Identify and correct bottlenecks and bugs.
4. Brainstorming and engaging with the team to bring wowlicious ideas.

4. Experimenting with new technologies to increase the "WOW" factor of our apps for our users.

What are you in for?
1. Highly interactive, fun-loving start-up, leading, exploring, brainstorming type environment.
2. Enhancing your knowledge of overall technology.
3. We don't waste time on processes and are very innovative and open to new thoughts.

Job Title: Senior Product Manager - Tech Enablement, Central Tech
Job Description:
As a Senior Product Manager for Central Technology, you will be responsible for leading Product to design, develop, and maintain Zyngas platform portfolio, which accelerates game development and streamlines live operations. The role will initially focus on building the social (Chat, Guilds, and Leaderboards) and Compliance (data privacy and region-based) product suite owned by the Tech Enablement team with Central Technology. However, as you grow in the role, you will likely own additional products and services.
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:
Responsible for the full product lifecycle including product strategy, competitive analysis, requirements gathering, feature prioritization, spec writing, roadmap management, and stakeholder alignment.
Define how we will measure the success and efficiency of products and services
Apply qualitative consumer insights and quantitative data to advise product decisions and business cases.
Define our product vision by understanding our players needs. Partner closely with Product and Engineering leaders on game teams to build feedback loops for continuous improvements and identify patterns of need across Zynga and our wider player base.
Evangelize our offerings. Get commitments from internal customers and achieve roadmap alignment. Articulate the value of each service in our portfolio and help our customer teams understand how we can help solve their problems
Identify & deconstruct competitive offerings in the market, formulate insights, and use them to inform future roadmap direction.
Responsible for a large central technology product and/or multiple products.
Collaborate closely with other technical leaders in Central Technology and across disciplines and global locations to drive best practices and positive team culture.
DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:
4+ years of product management experience in social tech, games, mobile or consumer web applications
Strong project management and ability to present work to executive staff
Sound product judgment, ability to formulate product strategy and present clear measurable objectives that will lead to achieving our business goals.
Ability to balance player, partner, and business interests while considering technical integration tradeoffs.
Ability to create wire-frames and mock-ups, write product specifications, and white papers
Some experience with data analytics and SQL preferred
Outstanding written/oral and organizational skills
A driven self-starter with attention to detail and a dedicated team player
Familiarity with Data Privacy / Compliance / Regulatory requirements a plus
Experience in start-up, consumer tech, or consulting is strongly preferred
BA/BS degree; MBA or Computer Science preferred
