Job Description:
As a Unity Game Developer at Fabzen, you will be responsible for implementing game functionality and translating design ideas, concepts, and requirements into a functional and engaging game
Your responsibilities also include the evaluation of code and the performance of the applications and software produced
You will identify and correct any problems in order to optimise the products performance and will ensure that programs are designed to operate effectively and consistently no matter what system they are accessed through
Responsibilities:
Plan, design and implement high-quality game features, and work as part of the wider studio team.
Transform design specifications into functional game assets.
Establish an effective strategy and development pipeline.
Quickly create and iterate on prototypes showcasing new designs and interaction patterns.
Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code.
Ensure the best performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications and games.
Identify process and application bottlenecks and implement solutions in a timely manner.
Take ownership of the entire features and components of the game lifecycle and lead the product design and code elements.
Collaborate with other members of the team to deliver large and complex features on time and to a high standard.
Be part of the development process and contribute improvements and suggestions, driving the quality of the code throughout the entire production cycle.
Mentor other developers in the team and help maintain code, product, and process quality.
Partner with Art, Design and Production teams to ensure schedules and goals meet business and project needs.
Conduct code reviews and be part of the hiring process for future colleagues.
Bring meaningful contributions to our product and the entire team.
Requirements:
5+ years of experience with Unity 3D/Content Development.
Strong 3D math skills.
Strong C# object-oriented programming and scripting language skills.
Experience working with game assets. (meshes, animations, materials, etc.)

Job Description:
As a UI/UX Artist Mobile Games , you will be working on the overall user experience of the game in all aspects and phases of production, you propose solutions to translate game design requirements into usable and memorable graphical user interfaces
What do you need to do(Role and Responsibilities)
You will work closely with the Product Managers and Game Designers to create clean, clutterfree, usercentric, trendy and easy to understand user interfaces (UI) for mobile games.
You need to be dedicated to researching and playing hundreds of mobile games to understand best practices in the Industry.
Work on the UI design (Flows, Menus and HUDs) as per requirements.
Explore and create high fidelity mockups and then the individual graphical elements needed for mobile screens, including iconography.
Create wireframes or modify existing screen flows based on design specifications or feedback.
Apply and maintain a consistent look and feel throughout the UI.
Ability to make design decisions and take on design problems independently, present and sell design concepts.


Who could you be? Background and Experience:
You should have a background in graphic design/interaction design/HCI related areas. You should have at least 4-5 years of experience in mobile games/apps.
At least shipped 5 apps/games as an UI/UX Artist.
You are proficient with prototyping tools such as Axure, Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator or other software for creating flowcharts, wireframes and Final UI Design mock-ups.
Hands-on experience or knowledge of Unity 3D is a plus.
Strong foundational graphic design skills (colour theory, composition, typography etc).
Possess an excellent understanding of visual design principles, style guidelines, design processes, and creative workflow.
Bring art to life while improving the UX with visuals.
Excellent communication skills and high attention to detail.
Ability to give and receive constructive criticism and critique with a focus on improving quality
Team player with a great attitude & love for mobile games
Educational Qualifications:
Bachelor s degree in graphic arts, interaction design, or equivalent industry experience in the design field.
Keywords: Graphic designing, User interface designing, Illustrator, Interaction design, Intellectual property, Workflow, Photoshop, Adobe, axure, Visual Design

Background in collaborative work within integrated product teams, emphasizing Development and QA collaboration

Job Description:
We are hiring a Senior Analyst to support Mako Studios based in EA Hyderabad. You will partner with key stakeholders in our game studios and report to the NA Mobile Analytics Manager, working across multiple disciplines including design, UX, and game PMs to understand foundational insights needs, and implement a plan to not just shape the future of the franchise but to guide both the games and studio to success.
What a Senior Analyst will do on our team:
Partner with our global data counterparts to set up robust telemetry for our mobile games, and to ensure the studio team is equipped with data for live operations.
Work with game Product Managers to analyze the impact of features and live services within the game and provide recommendations in a clear, understandable, and applicable way to affect future iterations.
Model trends in our data using different analysis techniques to predict the ways in which new content and campaigns will affect the economy, its performance, and our players.
Promote a data-informed culture within the studio, and influence product decisions through the lens of data.
Bring advanced analytics techniques (e.g. prescriptive and predictive) to solve challenges in achieving our business goals.
Experience Background
3+ years of experience doing complex quantitative analysis to help guide decisions, preferably in a consumer products-oriented industry (e.g. gaming, entertainment, e-commerce)
Proficiency with SQL
1+ years experience with using R and/or Python in an industry setting
Experience with data visualization applications (e.g. Looker, Tableau)
Experience with experimental design and applied statistics in an industry setting
Experience in mobile or free to play games strongly preferred
Keywords: Product Analyst, Analyst, Mobile phones, Packaging, HTML, data visualization, Gaming, SQL, Python, game development

Job Description:
Growth Associate observes how users experience their pain points concerning the area in which the business operates and how they interact with the product to alleviate their problems, guide the users in a manner they can use the product in a much more optimal fashion, and provide this data and inputs to the product team to incorporate. By tracking usage patterns, identifying trends, and making inferences about users preferences, needs, and behaviors, they help the users most out of the products and they make informed recommendations for product managers and other guardians of the product.
They should get in touch with the users on the Nbyula platform through online or in-person mode if need be, and with respect to Nbyula market place figure out ways wherein demand-side users can be matched with the supply-side service providers on the platform. This is a full-time terraformer position, meaning that you hit the ground running and quickly absorb the functional domain skills, business and market domain knowledge and above all Nbyula s core organizational values!

Roles, Responsibilities Expectations:
Research and identify users of the Nbyula marketplace product. This includes users on the demand side, like aspiring international studies students, alumni, international professionals etc
Identify the most efficient and effective channels for reaching out to the users.
Manage and engage the users through a depth understanding of their group behavior and other motivations. Another important aspect of this research is to identify the challenges faced by the users in each segment, group the challenges via apt grouping criteria so that the product team can take those inputs and use them in the product.
Suggest and implement new interaction opportunities for the users, for eg. via gamification, social currency accumulation, community discussions, webinars, etc.
Conduct audio/video interviews and gather material that can be used by the content team to build content helpful for other users.
Direct/review content creatives to be posted to various social media accounts, to ascertain the fitness of the content with the audience segment expectations.
Analyze and publish the results of subjective discussions, objective surveys, or data points alluding to user behavior or challenges.
Work with the in-house or external audio/video teams to effectively capture audio/video content through user interviews.
Formulate a thesis on what works the best for the users and implement and share the outcomes with them
Manage all the various tasks efficiently and effectively using the tools and technology offered by the company. This includes project management, conversation management, data analysis, document sharing, and collaboration tools, scheduling and meeting tools, etc.
Ability to persuade and close the loop on sign-up process for potential users on Nbyula platform

Qualifications Skills:
0-4 years of experience in B2B/B2C sales domain
Experience with user/client onboarding and engagement
Pro in searching and collating information through online tools
Spoken and written English proficiency
Extremely numbers and objectives-driven person who can deliver set monthly/quarterly targets
Should be present and active on social media platforms (LinkedIn / Instagram / Facebook / Twitter , etc)
Highly conversation driven
Ability to manage hundreds of conversations (Online/Chat/Telephonic)
Effective communication skills
Strong organizational and interpersonal skills
High convincing and persuasive skills
High-energy and passion

Who is an ideal match for being a terraformer at Nbyula
All the attributes that we are looking for in an ideal teammate.
Openness- We welcome people from different backgrounds and schools of thought, Terraformers are open to different perspectives in approaching a solution and not just limit their thoughts or ideas to only a specific domain
Conscientiousness- We believe in working together for the larger goal and with complete dedication and not just for personal benefits, however we do not expect terraformers to work to the point of burnout
Humility- Being humble, grateful and respectful are the core traits of terraformers, we do not expect people to agree with every view of the management, feel free to have a different perspective but we always expect it to be put forward with respect
Risk Takers- Terraformers are not afraid of the unknown and are open to new things, not that we encourage extreme risks without weighing the consequences but we are ones who take calculated risks
Autodidacts- Terraformers teach themselves to learn, we do our own research to get solutions, we do not expect you to have a blank slate and figure everything out yourself, we are here to guide you but not handhold and micromanage you
Self-Actualization- Terraformers are on the path of self-actualization, we are not bothered by the noise and distractions around us, we only work towards achieving our full potential. We do not expect you to over-burden yourself and not have fun but we expect you to work to the best of your capabilities
Keywords: Automation, Data analysis, Project management, Analytical, Social media, German, Scheduling, Gaming, Operations

Job Description:
Outreach Associate (Supply Side) is an exciting role that blends various aspects of research, analysis, engagement, and user interaction management. This requires leveraging communication skills, networking skills, and the ability to connect, empathize, and dig deeper into the hopes and dreams of a broad audience category. This is a full-time terraformer position, meaning that you hit the ground running and quickly absorb the functional domain skills, business and market domain knowledge and above all Nbyula s core organizational values!

Who is an ideal match for being a Terraformer at Nbyula
All the attributes that we are looking for in an ideal teammate.
Openness - We welcome people from different backgrounds and schools of thought, Terraformers are open to different perspectives in approaching a solution and not just limit their thoughts or ideas to only a specific domain
Conscientiousness - We believe in working together for the larger goal and with complete dedication and not just for personal benefits, however we do not expect terraformers to work to the point of burnout
Humility- Being humble, grateful and respectful are the core traits of terraformers , we do not expect people to agree with every view of the management, feel free to have a different perspective but we always expect it to be put forward with respect
Risk Takers - Terraformers are not afraid of the unknown and are open to new things, not that we encourage extreme risks without weighing the consequences but we are ones who take calculated risks
Autodidacts - Terraformers teach themselves to learn, we do our own research to get solutions, we do not expect you to have a blank slate and figure everything out yourself, we are here to guide you but not handhold and micromanage you
Self-Actualization - Terraformers are on the path of self-actualization, we are not bothered by the noise and distractions around us, we only work towards achieving our full potential. We do not expect you to over-burden yourself and not have fun but we expect you to work to the best of your capabilities

Roles, Responsibilities Expectations:
Research and identify users of the Nbyula marketplace product. This includes users on the supply side, like service providers offering services like language training, entrance exam training, student financial aid providers, Visa and Immigration service providers, student accommodation providers, SOP editors/writers, etc
Identify the most efficient and effective channels for reaching out to the users.
Manage and engage the users through a depth understanding of their group behavior and other motivations. Another important aspect of this research is to identify the challenges faced by the users in each segment, group the challenges via apt grouping criteria so that the product team can take those inputs and use them in the product.
Suggest and implement new interaction opportunities for the users, for eg. via gamification, social currency accumulation, community discussions, webinars, etc.
Conduct audio/video interviews and gather material that can be used by the content team to build content helpful for other users.
Direct/review content creatives to be posted to various social media accounts, to ascertain the fitness of the content with the audience segment expectations.
Analyze and publish the results of subjective discussions, objective surveys, or data points alluding to user behavior or challenges.
Work with the in-house or external audio/video teams to effectively capture audio/video content through user interviews.
Manage all the various tasks efficiently and effectively using the tools and technology offered by the company. This includes project management, conversation management, data analysis, document sharing, and collaboration tools, scheduling and meeting tools, etc.
Ability to persuade and close the loop on sign-up process for potential users on Nbyula platform

Qualifications Skills:
0-4 years of experience in B2B sales domain
Experience with user/client onboarding and engagement
Pro in searching and collating information through online tools
Spoken and written English proficiency
Extremely numbers and objectives-driven person who can deliver set monthly/quarterly targets
Should be present and active on social media platforms (LinkedIn / Instagram / Facebook / Twitter , etc)
Highly conversation driven
Ability to manage hundreds of conversations (Online/Chat/Telephonic)
Effective communication skills
Strong organizational and interpersonal skills
High convincing and persuasive skills
High-energy and passion
Keywords: Data analysis, Automation, Networking, Project management, Analytical, Social media, German, Scheduling, Gaming, Operations

Job Description:
Role Overview
We are hiring a Product Analyst to support Mako Studios based in EA Hyderabad. You will partner with key stakeholders in our game studios and report to the NA Mobile Analytics Manager, working across multiple disciplines including design, UX, and game PMs to understand foundational insights needs, and implement a plan to not just shape the future of the franchise but to guide both the games and studio to success.
What a Product Analyst will do on our team:
Partner with our global data counterparts to set up robust telemetry for our mobile games, and to ensure the studio team is equipped with data for live operations.
Work with game Product Managers to analyze the impact of features and live services within the game and provide recommendations in a clear, understandable, and applicable way to affect future iterations.
Model trends in our data using different analysis techniques to predict the ways in which new content and campaigns will affect the economy, its performance, and our players.
Promote a data-informed culture within the studio, and influence product decisions through the lens of data.
Bring advanced analytics techniques (e.g. prescriptive and predictive) to solve challenges in achieving our business goals.
Experience Background
1+ years of experience doing complex quantitative analysis to help guide decisions, preferably in a consumer products-oriented industry (e.g. gaming, entertainment, e-commerce)
Proficiency with SQL
1+ years experience with using R and/or Python in an industry or academic setting
Familiarity with data visualization applications (e.g. Looker, Tableau)
Experience with experimental design and applied statistics in an industry or academic setting
Experience in mobile or free to play games strongly preferred
Keywords: Product Analyst, Mobile phones, Packaging, HTML, data visualization, Gaming, SQL, Python, game development

Job Description:
We are currently looking for a highly motivated and experienced Senior Search Engineer / Architect with experience in designing, developing and optimizing search solutions (using technology like Elasticsearch or Vespa) to join our team. Experience with vector-based search, and NLP technologies is a plus. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and optimizing domain-specific search solutions that drive meaningful engagement and results for our users. You will be working closely with our engineering and product teams to ensure seamless integration of search functionality into our products.

In this role, you will need to:
Design, develop, and optimize search solutions using Vespa, leveraging its advanced features to deliver best-in-class search experiences for our users
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design, and develop search solutions that address the unique needs of each user
Provide technical and architectural leadership and be a primary contact for architecture pertaining to search
Communicate and coordinate activities with other teams such as QA, BA, and infrastructure
Continuously monitor and analyze search performance, identifying areas for improvement and implementing necessary changes to optimize search relevancy and ranking
Stay up to date with the latest developments in the search domain and contribute to the integration of new techniques and technologies into our search platform
Assist in the development of testing frameworks and methodologies to ensure the quality and performance of search solutions
If required, during your initial months, you will receive appropriate mentorship from Vespa experts to develop technology-related know-how

You Should Apply If You Possess:
Bachelors or masters degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field
5+ years of experience in search engine development, with a strong focus on search and analytics technology, like Elasticsearch or Vespa
Deep understanding of search algorithms, ranking, and relevancy optimization
Proficiency in Python/Java or other programming languages commonly used in search engineering
Strong knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and distributed systems
Experience with machine learning techniques and their application to search and recommendation systems
Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

It will be good to have:
Experience with search technologies, such as Solr, ElasticSearch or Vespa
Familiarity with natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) techniques
Experience with both text and vector-based search in Elasticsearch (or other systems)
Experience with learning-to-rank models
Experience working with large-scale, high-availability search systems
Basic understanding of DataOps that will assist in loading data into the indexes
Keywords: Analytical, Machine learning, Data structures, Natural language processing, Information technology, Gaming, Distribution system, Analytics, Python

Job Description:
What's BankSathi?
BankSathi is a tech-enabled platform and a one-stop destination for customers of Pan India to choose from an array of options offered by the leading financial institutions.
Our mission is to orchestrate a robust network of advisors and pave the way for an effortless journey to financial services. We intend to reshape the Indian Fintech market with Digital Bharat and become the largest technology based distributor of financial products.
We are a family of over 15+ lakh happy advisors and 35 lakh customers - thriving every day.
Who's backing us?

With a backing from large financial institutes and marquee angel investors such as Kotak, Hem securities, Lets venture, WFC We Founder Circle, Sunil Singhania (Abakkus Invest), Kunal Shah (CRED, Freecharge), Varun Alagh (Mamaearth), CP Toshniwal (Future Group, CFO), Kailash Biyani (Omega Capital), Mukul Rastogi (ClassPlus), Achal Miital (Liquiloans, RentoMojo), Anand Maliwal (Inditrade), Chandan Garg (Innovana)

We are looking for a QA Tester to assess software quality through manual and automated testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches.
In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills. If you are also competent in executing test cases and are passionate about quality, wed like to meet you.
Ultimately, you will ensure that our products, applications and systems work correctly.

Key Responsibilities:
Product Development:
Assist in the planning and development of new products and features based on market research, competitive analysis, and customer feedback.
Work closely with the design and engineering teams to ensure timely delivery of product enhancements and features.

Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends to ensure the product remains competitive.

Support in prioritizing product features and backlog based on business and customer impact.

Work with the finance and operations teams to develop pricing strategies and inventory plans.
Documentation & Reporting:
Help in preparing and updating product documentation, training materials, and user manuals.
Assist in monitoring, tracking, and reporting product performance using key performance metrics.
Product Launch:
Assist in coordinating product launches and go-to-market strategies with sales, marketing, and public relations teams.

Job Description:
We re EA the world s largest video game publisher. You re probably familiar with many of our titles Madden, FIFA, The Sims, Need for Speed, Dead Space, Battlefield and Star Wars, to name a few. But maybe you don t know how we re committed to creating games for every platform from social to mobile to console to give our consumers that anytime, anywhere access they demand. What does that mean for you It means more opportunities to unleash your creative genius, be inspired by those around you and ignite your path in any direction you choose.
As EA s first label dedicated to purely digital games, EA Mobile creates games for mobile devices, social networks and online environments that deliver seamless play anytime, anywhere, on any device. Connecting a market of more than one billion core and mass - casual gamers worldwide, EA Mobile delivers engaging, accessible, high quality games to people of all skill levels and interests.
The EA Mobile portfolio encompasses some of the most recognizable entertainment brands in the world, including titles such as The Simpsons, Tetris Blitz, SCRABBLE, MONOPOLY, Plants vs Zombies 2, Real Racing 3, Dungeon Keeper as well as online games destination Pogo.com.
The Hyderabad office represents one of EA Mobile s largest development organizations with more than 700 passionate mobile game experts involved in game development, testing, production and distribution. The game development studio is a team within this organization that is committed to building and running live services for some of EA s top games.
Our vision is to be EA Mobile s center of excellence for Live Services and help grow the footprint of casual games in the market. Here are the values we truly believe in:
Collaboration Great things are not done by an individual but by a team of highly motivated folks
The role
As a Development Manager (DM), you ll primarily drive planning and execution on a cross - functional development team to build and ship new content, features and games.
This is a leadership role that involves a high level of interaction with team members, peers, and product leadership. DM s focus on outcomes, solving problems, and making things work (or work better). You ll develop, maintain, and drive the project schedule from start to finish, while making sure the path is clear of obstacles for your team.
You ll be accountable for leading the team to meet milestones and quality targets, creating and improving processes, coordinating with support departments across the company, tracking and resolving issues, monitoring development KPIs and seeking out and ing knowledge to improve the organization.
As a Development Manager, your responsibilities include:
Act as Scrum Master for a cross - functional development team(s)
Drive development execution from concept to live
Create project schedules that maximize feature quality and scope within resource, financial, and development partner constraints
Anticipate bottlenecks and risks, provide management escalation, project prioritization, make tradeoffs, balance the business needs versus technical constraints, and drive the process forward
Own the project schedule and communicate any divergence from the plan
Report status at regular intervals, escalate urgent issues in a timely manner
Hold the team accountable to its commitments
Working with discipline leaders, evaluate individual performance and potential of team members, provide appropriate recognition and constructive feedback
Educate the team on best practices, processes, and standards as needed
Inspire and motivate team(s) through personal example
Being part of the team:
Manage stakeholder communication and requirements
Form close working relationships with team and discipline leads
Solve problems, balance priorities, and find creative solutions that achieve results
If you re interested in this role, you ll need these skills or experiences:
4 years project management or team leadership experience (preferably game development)
Solid foundation in project management methodologies and tools
Demonstrable knowledge of software development life cycles
Excellent analytical and problem - solving skills
Effective communication skills across all levels of an organization
Game development experience (casual gaming or mobile gaming preferred)
Familiarity with EA s mobile products Project management certifications or training
Company Profile
Electronic Arts Inc. is a leading global interactive entertainment software company. EA delivers games, content and online services for Internet - connected consoles, personal computers, mobile phones and tablets.

All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. EA also makes workplace accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities as required by applicable law.

Keywords: Training, Project management, Analytical, Process improvement, Mobile phones, HTML, Scrum, Gaming, Monitoring, game development

Job Description:
As a Product Manager for our upcoming mobile battle royale game, you will play a crucial role in driving the product strategy and ensuring the games successful launch
You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including game designers, engineers, artists, and marketers, to define the games vision, features, and monetization strategies
Your responsibilities will include conducting market research, analyzing player preferences, defining the product roadmap, and coordinating the development process from concept to launch
The ideal candidate is passionate about mobile gaming, has a deep understanding of the battle royale genre, and possesses the skills necessary to manage a complex and evolving project
Responsibilities :
Define the product roadmap, prioritize features, and coordinate with development teams to ensure timely and successful implementation
Conduct market research, analyze player preferences, and identify key trends and opportunities to inform product decisions
Collaborate with game designers, engineers, artists, and marketers to develop the product vision, features, and monetization strategies for the upcoming mobile battle royale game
Gather and analyze user feedback, conduct playtesting sessions, and iterate on the games design to optimize the player experience
Coordinate with stakeholders to ensure alignment on project goals, timelines, and deliverables
Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitive landscape to inform product strategy and maintain a competitive advantage
Monitor key performance metrics and utilize data-driven insights to drive decision-making and optimize the games performance
Provide leadership and guidance to the development team throughout the product lifecycle
Work closely with the marketing team to develop effective user acquisition and engagement strategies for the games launch
Experience Skills required :
Bachelors degree in a relevant field, such as Game Design, Computer Science, or Business Administration
Atleast 3+ years of experience as a Product Manager in the mobile gaming industry, with a strong focus on game development, with proven track record of managing successful game projects from concept to launch
Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and insights to drive product decisions.
Deep understanding of the battle royale genre and its core mechanics, as well as trends and player preferences within the genre, is a plus
Excellent project management and organizational skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
Passion for gaming and a deep understanding of player motivations and preferences
Experience with Agile development methodologies and tools is preferred
Keywords: Analytical skills, Business administration, Interpersonal skills, Project management, Agile development, Market research, Gaming, Product strategy, game development

Job Description:
As an Engineering Manager at PTW, As an Engineering Manager, you will be responsible for managing a team of engineers, overseeing the development of gaming projects, and ensuring the successful delivery of high-quality games on time
Your in-depth knowledge of Unreal Engine and strong leadership abilities will be essential in driving the technical success of our games
Desired Qualities:
Engineer at heart: Likes to dive deep, have the big picture and at the same time pay attention to details, able to review architectures and provide suggestions, brainstorm about the technologies, and guide the team on technical matters
Coach & Mentor: Understand the strengths and weaknesses of each team member and provide opportunities for the team to learn and grow.
Obsession for Quality: Always strive to improve the quality of the systems and strive to provide a better player experience.
Lead Inclusively & Develop Others - Create a belonging culture, pay attention to the diversity of thoughts and psychological safety, help others to achieve career fulfillment and success, and build a high-performing team through meaningful conversations.
Problem solver: Identify the problems be it in the product or people and propose the solutions for the problems.
Responsibilities:
Team Leadership:
Manage and lead a team of engineers, providing guidance, mentorship, and support to ensure their professional growth.
Set clear performance objectives, provide regular feedback, and conduct performance evaluations.
Foster a collaborative and inclusive team culture that encourages innovation, creativity, and excellence.
Project Management:
Oversee the development lifecycle of gaming projects, from concept to release, ensuring adherence to project timelines, quality standards, and budget constraints.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including artists, designers, and QA, to align project goals and drive efficient development processes.
Identify and mitigate project risks, develop contingency plans, and ensure effective communication of project status and updates to stakeholders.
Technical Expertise:
Demonstrate expert-level knowledge of Unreal Engine and its tools, frameworks, and best practices.
Provide technical guidance and support to the development team, assisting with complex problem-solving, code reviews, and optimization.
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in game development, Unreal Engine features, and industry best practices.
Process Improvement:
Identify areas for process improvement, efficiency gains, and quality enhancements within the development pipeline.
Drive the implementation of best practices, coding standards, and tools to optimize development workflows.
Continuously evaluate and recommend new technologies, tools, and techniques to enhance productivity and game performance.
Collaboration and Communication:
Foster effective collaboration and communication across teams, ensuring a shared understanding of project objectives, priorities, and dependencies.
Act as a liaison between the engineering team and other stakeholders, including product managers, artists, and designers, to facilitate smooth project execution.
Communicate technical concepts and requirements clearly and concisely to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.


Bachelors degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
Proven experience of 8+ years in game development, with a focus on Unreal Engine.

Keywords: QA, PTW, Networking, Coding, Project management, Process improvement, Agile, Gaming, game development

As part of the Product Management team, you bridge technical and business worlds and then zoom out to lead matrix teams such as Development, Marketing and Data Scientists, to name a few.
As a Product Manager, you can be a part of shaping the next billion-dollar game.
The product Manager will take care of the whole product lifecycle starting from product conceptualization, creation of product roadmap strategy, incorporate best practices in products, managing product launches continuous improvements.

The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of technology and the ability to quickly learn new technologies
You should possess excellent written and verbal communication skills, along with the ability to work cross-functionally with multiple teams and stakeholders
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills are also a must, as is the ability to manage multiple projects and priorities in a fast-paced environment

Passion for technology

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Job Description:
As a Product Manager Intern, your role will involve working closely with the product management team to assist in various aspects of product development and management. Here are the typical roles and responsibilities you might have as a Product Manager Intern:
Market Research: Conduct research to understand market trends, customer needs, and competitive landscape. Gather insights through surveys, interviews, and data analysis to contribute to product strategy.
Requirements Gathering: Assist in gathering and documenting product requirements by collaborating with cross-functional teams, including design, engineering, and marketing. Help define user stories, features, and functionalities.
Product Development: Support the product team in coordinating the development process, including prioritizing features, defining timelines, and ensuring smooth communication between teams.
User Experience (UX): Work with designers and user experience professionals to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces. Provide input on user flows, wireframes, and design mockups.
Data Analysis: Analyze user data and feedback to identify areas for improvement and potential new features. Use tools like Google Analytics or other data analysis tools to derive insights.
Project Management: Assist in managing the product roadmap and timelines. Help track progress, monitor deadlines, and address any issues that may arise during the development process.
Testing and Quality Assurance: Participate in product testing and quality assurance efforts. Identify and report bugs, usability issues, and other concerns during the testing phase.
Communication: Maintain open communication channels between different teams, stakeholders, and departments. Keep everyone informed about the products progress and any changes.
Documentation: Contribute to product documentation, including user guides, release notes, and internal documentation. Ensure that all relevant parties have access to accurate and up-to-date information.
Competitor Analysis: Monitor the activities of competitors and provide insights on their products, features, and strategies. This information can help inform your own product development decisions.
Customer Support: Collaborate with the customer support team to understand common user issues and feedback. Use this information to make improvements to the product and enhance the user experience.
Strategic Input: Offer creative ideas and insights during brainstorming sessions and strategy discussions. Your fresh perspective as an intern can lead to innovative solutions.
Learning and Development: Take advantage of the internship as a learning opportunity. Attend meetings, workshops, and training sessions to enhance your understanding of product management practices.
Adaptation and Flexibility: Be adaptable to changes in project priorities, requirements, and timelines. Learn how to handle unexpected challenges that can arise during product development.
Ethical Considerations: Be aware of ethical considerations related to user privacy, data security, and other relevant areas. Ensure that the product aligns with ethical standards and regulations.
Keywords: Product management, Data analysis, Manager Quality Assurance, Google Analytics, Intern, data security, Project management, Market research, Customer support, Internship

Job Description:
Position Overview:

The Product Support Associate will be part of the Customer Support and Services team which uses, top-of-the-line CRM tools like Sales force and other applications like Go-To-Assist / Go-To-Meeting for remote desktop sharing. The application support specialist in Replicon is not only a Support professional, but also a researcher, a tester and a consultant to both customers and product management. In this role you will be working with customers from all over the world including countries like Nigeria, South Africa and Antarctica resolving Level 1 customer issues, escalating critical issues to Tier 2 team, reaching solutions that are mutually beneficial to customers and Replicon.

Key Responsibilities:
Provide pleasant and professional customer service and technical support to current and potential customers of Replicons product suite and related environment via telephone, FTP, remote dial-up connections and email
Applying technology in multiple ways to configure the product and helping the customer implement Replicons products
Solid understanding of products limits and suggesting ways of improving the product.
Qualifications:
Any Bachelor's Degree
At least 6 months to 3 years of experience in software application support and/or infrastructure support
Should have good knowledge in Trouble shooting preferably IT application support.
Excellent written and oral communication skills
Demonstrated superior customer service skills
Ability to adapt to new technology and work on the same.
Open to work in a 24/7 support environment.
Keywords: Product management, Application support, FTP, Remote desktop, Customer support, Customer service, Support Associate, Technical support, Product support, CRM

Job Description:
As a Producer I you are responsible for establishing and executing on the vision of game titles, to EA s exacting quality standards. Oversee the entire lifecycle of the game from concept to launch and post launch Live Services, with a strong desire to research and communicate game market trends, patterns, and customer requirements. Youll need to understand how to help self-organizing teams accomplish great things, and drive communication so that we can reach past what any of us can do on our own. Youll bring innovative ideas about organization, production, and about the future of interactive entertainment. You have relevant experience in game development, production management and leadership.

Responsibilities:
Champion the vision of the game which respects the creative director s vision and Product Manager s business expertise and be accountable for the quality targets and the results achieved.
Provide clear context to the team for how the features fit into the larger game, how they fit into the marketplace, and how it serves and delights our fans.
Help team prioritize highest business value features and set quality targets.
Be the Voice of the players for the area of ownership, articulate clearly their expectations to the team and provide actionable items.
Sell the value of your game across EA and our industry, including interviews meetings with the press, partner companies, EA executives, etc.
Serve as a coach and mentor to junior producers, assisting them in the resolution of complex problems and growing their skills and knowledge.
Support the Studio leadership to cultivate a strong development organization: grow talent, make timely decisions, inspire and create a motivating workplace.

Who fits the bill:
8+ years experience as a Producer within the video game industry, managing large internal teams within the video game industry (Software Engineers, Artists, Designers, Audio Specialists, Senior Project Managers, Associate Producers etc.).
Ability to know what types of products will sell and what wont sell and be able to assess the feasibility of producing a new product Knowledge of Mobile + Freemium is critical.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills Ability to represent the product in Exec level conversations
Successful track record in the development of high-profile entertainment and software products.
Strong knowledge of the software/game market and platforms; assertive and motivated team player.
Experience in an Agile development environment.
Strong technical background a plus
Keywords: Communication Skills, Product Management, Production, Html, Mobile Phones, Creative Director, Game Development, Game Design, Verbal Communication

Job Description:
Role Overview
The Technical Artist (TA) acts as a bridge between the artists and programmers working on a game. They ensure art assets can be easily integrated into a game without sacrificing the overall artistic vision or exceeding the technical limits of the chosen platform. The Technical Artist works as part of the art team and coordinates closely with the lead artists and the art director, as well as with the lead programmers.
The main areas of responsibility for Technical Artists include setting up and maintaining the art production workflow and making decisions about which art packages and tools a studio should use. Technical Artists are also charged with investigating new techniques and implementing them within the team. The job often includes an instructional element, with the Technical Artist sharing their knowledge with other artists via training and mentoring sessions.
The Technical Artist typically works one step removed from the direct creation of game art assets, setting up the systems of production as well as solving problems as they arise. It s crucial for the Technical Artist to keep upto-date in changes in technology, both in terms of mobile hardware, art packages, and new techniques. The Technical Artist is expected to be able to create custom tools to improve the efficiency of their team. This is usually carried out using the scripting languages included in the main modeling and animation packages.

Responsibilities:
Report to the Incubation Lead
Prepare assets for export from Maya and import into UE4, ensuring they work within technical constraints
Collaborate with engineering to implement technical art features
Identify and implement art pipeline optimizations
Implement technical benchmarks for various art features (mesh rendering, vfx, LODs)
Generalist approach to work on various art related work like vfx, animations, materials, optimizations
What skills does EA look for
Technical Artists for EA will have experience involving both art and programming. A Technical Artist can come from either background, though most tend to have been artists who have specialized in a particular area of art production.
They should have a detailed knowledge of at least one industry-standard art package. The use of scripting languages is required, as is an understanding of the limitations of mobile hardware. Some Technical Artists come to games after holding a similar position in the film or special effects industries, where the experience of high-end rendering techniques or complex animation are useful skills.
The role of Technical Artist is a specialized one. Candidates must be able to show technical proficiency in areas such as lighting and rendering, texturing, and graphics related programming languages such as shaders. They should also have extensive knowledge of art packages ranging from modeling to texturing and special effects and be able to customize them to be as streamlined as possible for specific projects.
Most Technical Artists will have a degree in a relevant visual art or technical subject; however, the most important prerequisite for the role is experience working with art tools and game hardware on a wide range of projects.



Skills and Experience:
3 years of professional experience in games production on at least one shipped game title, preferably a shooter
Advanced knowledge of Maya and familiarity with modeling and texturing
Keywords: Graphics, C++, Texturing, Maya, Animation, Workflow, HTML, Gaming, Android, game development

Job Description:
We are looking to hire dynamic Assistant Product Manager ( APM ) to join our Marketplace and Business Intelligence Vertical. You will join the product team and manage the product life cycle.

IndiaMART.com is India's largest B2B platform which is powering millions of SMEs across the country. We are looking to hire dynamic professionals to join our Product Teams as Assistant Product Managers to solve unique product challenges for a platform that hosts 100 million plus visitors. Fast-track your career by working with best product teams that use state-of-the-art technology to achieve business goals.

Roles and Responsibilities
Drive integrations with payments gateways, tech service providers, financial institutions to enable digital lending or payments solution to stakeholders.
Actively engage with internal and external stakeholders to drive better funnel efficiencies
Responsible for new initiatives, funnel management, management reporting and operations
Derive data/matrix led PG switching across various Pay modes and manage success drivers
Identify, negotiate and go live of lending and payments solution including BNPL products, No Cost EMI options, term loans, credit cards etc.
Gathering feedback and requirements from relevant stakeholders
Collaborate with technology, treasury, and operations team to ensure quick launches and smooth operations
Design, measure and monitor key metrices indicating the growth and health of the product
Carry out periodic market research and competition analysis including their client acquisition strategies, product positioning, pricing and communication strategy

Desired Candidate Profile
Product knowledge of all aspects of digital journey management in fintech vertical including process, compliance, recon and reporting process, success drivers etc
Exposure to digital lending or payment systems
Working knowledge of SQL would be added advantage

Career Growth & Learning Opportunities
At IndiaMART we provide each employee with multiple career growth and learning opportunities. A couple of our flagship initiatives are:
I-LEAD (Leadership Experience & Development Programme): I-LEAD is a 3 Year program aimed at preparing new joiners in Management (MTs) & Technology roles for a leadership positions in their respective area of expertise. Over a period of 3 years, this program will offer a variety of learning experiences tailored to the individual's needs and organizational goals. The program will have two tracks, I-LEAD Management, and I-LEAD Technology. The learning interventions will include on-job training, instructor-led training, and many options to enroll in structured courses. Members in this program will get a 10% bonus raise (over & above Annual Appraisal) once each of their joining anniversaries occurs while they are enrolled in this program.
I-LEAP: IndiaMART Learning and Education Assist Program is an initiative from IndiaMART that offers a unique opportunity for employees to enhance their skills by enrolling in educational programs of their choice and getting the reimbursement of the same from the company on successful completion.

Educational Qualification Criteria:10th &12th - 85% and above B.Tech. (CS/IT only) + Full time MBA: 60% and above

Location: Corporate office at Noida-135

Selection Process:
Technical interview rounds
HR interview round
Keywords: product management, lending solutions, fintech, digital loan, sql, Product Positioning, lending loan, market research

Job Description:
Procurement Accounting Analyst "Reimagine the possibilities" at Johnson and Johnson Global Finance! We live this motto every day by creating game-changing business solutions for the world's largest and most broadly-based healthcare company. As a member of our Global Finance team, you will have best-in-class access to a network of financial professionals located in over 60 countries. This new network will help you build on your current skills and explore opportunities to grow your career in J&J.
At J&J Global Finance, we value ideas for innovation and improvement and are committed to diversity and inclusion. Together we will reimagine business processes to become more effective, more efficient, and improve customer experience. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer.
This role will be part of the Global Services Finance team in the Procurement Accounting process area. The Global Services Finance organization provides best-in-class, cost-effective financial services, and compliance - in a J&J way - to our Operating Companies around the world.
The Procurement Accounting team is responsible for the complete and accurate accounting for all the payable process flows, including but not limited to Prepayments, GRIR, and AP balance sheet accounts. Key Responsibilities:
Be compliant with applicable laws and regulations, and follow guidelines in the J&J Credo
Maintain Operational Excellence
Responsible for implementing accounting and daily operations for the Procurement Accounting process area.
Timely closing & execution of financial periods as per closing calendar and in accordance with SLA commitments, fully observing Compliance, Internal Audit & SOX requirements.
Accountable for completeness, accuracy, and validity of the actuals reported within process/entity scope.
Deep expertise, fully knowledgeable of the Worldwide Procedures and compliance requirements for respective areas.
Regular focus on Balance Sheet reconciliations to minimize open items.
On-the-job training for new team members / BPO partners.
Support auditors and legal authorities with the execution of required activities.
Understand, enforce to, and implement per worldwide policies and procedures. Identify compliance risks and recommend solutions.
Ensure strong internal controls are in place, in order to achieve "adequate" internal and external audit ratings.
3. Talent Management - None Stated
4. Be a Trusted Business Partner
Implement global Strategy & Solutions in line with taxonomy.
Support Process Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) and Operational Key Contacts (OKCs) to ensure cross sector, cross-region, and cross-process alignment, ensuring good documentation is maintained and consistency of a global approach.
5. Create Game-Changing Innovation
Generate ideas, fosters, and implement a continuous improvement attitude, identifying and pursuing process efficiency opportunities.
Implement operational improvements, generating ideas and implements in line with global standards.
Qualifications
Education
A minimum of a bachelor's level degree or equivalent is required, preferably in accounting, finance, or related business subject area.
CPA, CMA, MBA, and/or other financial certifications are preferred.
Required
At least 0-2 years of professional experience is required.
Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to interact with employees at all levels.
Be open to new ideas, rapid change, and embracing new technologies.
Strong Analytical Skills
Preferred
Experience in a Shared Service Centre of a multinational corporation or BPO.
Experience in a Procurement, Accounts Payable, Invoice Processing, Payments and GRIR reconciliation of a large multi-state company.
Ability to handle ambiguity and fluid situations, demonstrating a pragmatic approach.
Successfully manage multiple priorities, be very organized and work efficiently to tight deadlines.
Proven US GAAP accounting knowledge.
Digital/ intelligent automation capabilities.
Other
This position will require up to 0-5% % international travel.
Proficient in ERP systems (SAP preferred) and MS Office in particular Excel.
Candidates may be asked to work shifts to align with global assignments in Americas / EMEA / Asia.
Lead/Participate in other Regional/Global/Cross-functional duties as assigned.
Fluent English, other language skills desirable.

Job Description:
We are looking for a talented unity developer to join our design team. As a unity developer, you will be responsible for planning and implementing game functionality, building the game code, identifying bottlenecks, and ensuring the quality of the finished product. You may also be required to build patches and install game updates.
To ensure success as a unity developer, you should have extensive experience working with Unity and Unity3D software, excellent coding skills, and a good eye for detail. A top-class Unity developer can visualize, design, and code games that speak directly to the target market.
Responsibility
Meeting with the design team to discuss gaming ideas and specifications.
Establishing strategy and development pipelines.
Planning and implementing game functionality.
Transforming design ideas into functional games.
Designing and building game codes.
Identifying and fixing code errors and game bottlenecks.
Testing game functionality and theme dynamics.
Ensuring products conform to high industry standards.
Designing and building game patches and upgrades.
PREFERRED SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor s degree in computer science, computer engineering, or a similar field.
Previous experience working as a unity or Unity3D developer.
In-depth knowledge of unity and Unity3D software.
Knowledge of 3D development and integrated game physics.
Experience with console and mobile game development.
Good communication skills.
Experience with memory and space optimization.
Knowledge of scripting, animation, session management, and textures.
Good troubleshooting skills.
Excellent attention to detail.
Keywords: Coding, Animation, E-commerce, Budgeting, New product development, Troubleshooting, Gaming, Logistics, game development

Job Description:
EA Sports Mobile is looking for an Ad Tech Product Manager. You will be responsible for directing the development of our ad tech products and platform features at scale. In this centralized role, you are expected to ensure ad tech reliability and optimize ad delivery.
Responsibilities:
Ads business Insight: The ability to understand the problems and issues our games and business wants to solve, and then defining the right data, analysis or interpretation to lead to the right recommendations and decisions
Monitor core KPIs in real-time to diagnose triage issues with ad delivery
Work with our 3rd party partners to develop new technical solutions to help evolve our ad monetization business
Translate business needs to technical requirements and AB- tests, then work with development teams to ensure correct implementation and tracking
Develop an analysis strategy and perform analysis of complex scenarios and AB- tests, both systematically and on a one- off basis.
Help us overcome technical hurdles to bring new, innovative ad products to market at scale
Player behavior: Understanding the players motivation is key to design valuable tests and interpret results
SQL: The ability to write complex SQL queries to analyze our databases
Analytical coding: Using tools such as R, Python (and also Excel) for analytical purposes
Qualifications:
You have worked extensively (3-4+ years) as a Product Manager in Mobile Advertising domain.
Expertise in analyzing requirements, creating roadmaps for technical products to maximize advertising revenues.
Experience in mobile gaming is a plus.
Proven expertise in writing and executing complex SQL Queries, working with large databases (telemetry) to figure out actionable insights, ability to get your hands dirty with R and/or Python, Tableau, and Excel as needed to analyze and report out metrics.
Ability to navigate through complex dashboards of ad services providers such as Google, Facebook, Ironsource, etc. to figure out the right focus areas for the team.
Effective Communicator who can tailor communication to a diverse, internal, and external audience.
Great team player who likes working with a diverse set of individuals across disciplines
Keywords: SQL queries, Data analysis, Excel, Coding, Analytical, HTML, Gaming, Advertising, Python

Experience working with engineering teams and thirdparty technology partners
Software engineering experience a plus
Experience with social features in games is a plus

Job Description:
We re looking for Analytics Manager with strategic thinking who can lead a team of data analysts to join our Central Analytics team. It s a fast-paced, high-adrenaline job, with plenty to learn. If you enjoy crunching numbers, are never satisfied with the products around you, and have always wanted to make things better than the best, you ll love this job.
Requirements
What you will get
You will own the central Analytics dashboards and central Data Lake across PlaySimple (games, growth, monetization)
You will get to work closely with Product Managers, Data Scientists and Data Engineers on high-value strategic projects across user acquisition, engagement and monetization
You will get to develop strategies for effective data analysis, statistical modeling and reporting
You will get to analyze large data sets using world class infrastructure.
You will get to lead and develop a team of data analysts

Qualifications and Skills Required
Proven ability to work in a fast-paced environment, and to meet changing deadlines and priorities on multiple simultaneous projects.
6-8 years of experience in Analytics working with multiple large datasets
Strong Data Manipulation skills on large datasets in SQL / Python / Tableau
Strong understanding of Probability, Statistics, A/B Testing
SQL Mastery : 3+ years of experience optimizing SQLs for complex queries over large tables in an analytical database like Redshift, BigQuery, Spark, etc.
Dashboard design : 3+ years of experience designing dashboards in BI Tools like Tableau, PowerBI, Superset, etc.
Data Manipulation, Automation and Visualization in R / Python
Experience in mentoring junior analysts on technical skills
Basic knowledge of Machine Learning
Keywords: Automation, Data analysis, tableau, data manipulation, Analytical, Machine learning, Gaming, Analytics, SQL, Python

Job Description:
Your main objective will be finding, categorizing and documenting sources for a number of data points sourced from various primary sources
Enforce quality control by checking your colleagues work and validating it to ensure a high accuracy level. Errors are accepted, but should be very rare.
Help build a knowledge base by providing feedback on existing research methodologies and how they reflect the real world
Ensure the data is entered correctly and in the expected format
Note any discrepancies, non-conforming data, or other issues and escalate it if necessary
Coordinate with the Data Manager to deliver data sets within a set schedule
Skill Experience
This role is most suited to those who have had real life exposure to businesses and the challenges they face. Although desirable, experience in a research role isn t a must, however experience working in a business environment is crucial.
Examples of suitable business experience include, but are not limited to; dealing with HR issues by using business tools, scheduling an SDLC, preparing a marketing plan for a business, or providing live customer support at a technical level - any roles similar to these then we want to hear from you.
Armed with that experience, we will turn you into full-time, professional researchers who will form the backbone of our key processes in our ongoing goals of impartially helping and advising small businesses on crucial SMB issues.
We are looking to build a large team of researchers who are able to work proactively and in an agile manner and can provide a meticulous working style, with a sharp "eagle eye"for details and spotting errors.The perfect candidate will be a great communicator, confident to communicate effectively with varying audiences and seniority.
We need people who are not afraid to ask questions when needed and are proactive and willing to help their colleagues provide us with the best data and build knowledge.
You will be expected to proactively seek out ways to complete tasks more effectively and efficiently. Providing solutions to management on how this can be improved for both you individually, and the wider Data Research Team.
You will be able to demonstrate the ability to manage your own time effectively to ensure the required production requests are completed in a timely manner.
Desirable Skills Experience
Experience working with Excel/Google Sheets and are comfortable working with spreadsheets for extended periods of time.
Perks:
Day off on the 3rd Friday of every month (one long weekend each month)
Monthly Wellness Reimbursement Program to promote health well-being
Paid paternity and maternity leaves
Fully stocked pantry
Gaming area with table tennis, pool, and carom tables
Amphitheater for screening sports events, movies, and town hall
Keywords: Data research, Marketing planning, Agile, SMB, Customer support, Scheduling, Manager Quality Control, Gaming, SDLC

Efficiently plan work and ensure that all relevant information regarding the task is collected and is readily available before commencing work.
Create tasks with zero defects and in the most efficient manner, and as per plan.
Diligently follow organizational best practices and mandated processes.
Ensure that they communicate questions, challenges, work status and new learnings to Leads, PMs and project team members appropriately and on time.
Contribute to the success of the project by performing own role well, and proactively helping other team members.
Responsibilities:
Study the task specifications and client brief thoroughly before initiating estimation or commencing work on tasks. Understand the information provided and highlight to the Lead any missing or contradictory information.
Provide a list of queries to the Lead to seek clarification on the task allocated. Ensure that maximum clarity is achieved regarding the specifications, art direction and approach for a task before commencing work on it.
Work closely with the Lead to arrive at appropriate effort estimates for tasks.
Ensure that there is no ambiguity or confusion regarding any aspect (specifications, timelines etc.) of the task in hand. Should not make any unwarranted assumptions. Should red flag to the Lead/sub-Lead any confusion or ambiguity.
Before commencing work on the task, ensure that there is clear identification of the approach to be taken to create the task as well as daily work completion targets and the same have been discussed with the Lead/sub-Lead before finalization.
Collect adequate and appropriate references before commencing work.
Create animations from scratch OR cleanup and process high quality 3d motion capture data.
If required, carry out any post-production processes that may be required. This could include activities such as making animations game-engine ready and checking them in the engine.
Provide daily update of task status to Lead/sub-Lead.
Proactively solve artistic and technical problems encountered while working on a task. Discuss such solutions with Lead/sub-Lead before implementing them. Red-flag unsolved problems in a timely manner.
Maintain and improve own productivity by completing work within the time allocated. This includes art tasks taken to completion or to a predetermined point where it is to be handed over to a polishing artist.
Adopt organization mandated Best Practices and Work Processes while working on a task.
Deliver high quality work with zero QC errors and resulting in minimal iteration. Diligently check task against checklist to ensure that the task complies with all specifications.
Requirements
Skills, Knowledge and Experience:
Skilled at using industry standard software such as Maya, 3D Studio Max Motion Builder etc.
Skilled at cleaning up and processing high quality Mocap data.
Proficient in creating human and creature animations
Knowledge of traditional animation fundamentals
Good knowledge of game art creation pipeline
1 to 5 years of experience as a game animator.
Keywords: Art, Production, Animation, Cleaning, 3D Studio Max, Game Development

Job Description:
Summary
Push Boundaries, Deliver Innovation and Change the World! In this role you will be given an opportunity to work on the next generation technology that will be part of future AMD Microprocessors powering Gaming Consoles, Servers and Personal Computers as well as Graphics Cards and VR sets. This team also is responsible for the Design and Verification of several critical as well as the integration to other subsystems and SoC. The Design and Design Verification groups within this team are also responsible for developing a balanced architecture between power consumption and performance, delivering high complexity RTL code and creating advanced testbenches using cutting edge verification techniques.
Job Duties
Collaborate with design team to understand and define verification requirements for high-speed, low power digital circuit designs from definition to implementation. Own or be involved in all aspects of the functional verification from initial test planning, test creation and debug. to coverage and sign-off closure, while providing technical leadership to the team.
Own verification of high speed, low power digital designs at IP and System level using both coverage driven constraint random and directed testing techniques as well as formal verification. Implement test benches and components such as test and sequence libraries, monitors, models and BFMs by applying objected oriented programming verification techniques following UVM methodology.
Required Skills
Advanced knowledge of ASIC Design flow and state of the art verification flow
Proficient with Verilog, System Verilog and UVM
Familiarity with industry standard high-speed protocols such as USB and PCIE is a plus
Strong analytical and problem solving skills with pronounced attention to detail
Capable of independently driving tasks and activities to completion in an organized and timely manner with excellent quality
EDUCATION:
Major in EE, CS or related, Master Degree with 5 7+ years or Bachelor with 7 - 9+ years working experiences
Keywords: Graphics, formal verification, USB, SOC, Analytical, System verilog, PCIE, Silicon, Gaming, UVM

Job Description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
Implementing RTL to GDS2 flow
Handling Floor-plan, Physical Implementation of Power-plan, Synthesis, Placement, CTS, Timing Closure, Routing, Extraction, Physical Verification (DRC LVS), Crosstalk Analysis, EM/IR
Handling different PNR tools - Synopsys ICC2, ICC, Design Compiler, PrimeTime, StarRC, Mentor Graphics Calibre, Apache Redhawk
PREFERRED EXPERIENCE:
16+ years of professional experience in physical design, preferably with high performance designs.
Experience in automated synthesis and timing driven place and route of RTL blocks for high speed datapath and control logic applications.
Experience in automated design flows for clock tree synthesis, clock and power gating techniques, scan stitching, design optimization for improved timing/power/area, and design cycle time reduction.

Given the impact across the company, and the executive visibility for this role, we seek for a candidate with the right mix of technical and organizational; with the goal of enabling Cloud Gaming, Machine Learning, Supercomputing, HPC VDI services in best-in class deployments.
The Person:
The right candidate will have ample SW Program Management experience, combined with Requirements Analyst acumen. We seek for technical experience with device drivers, firmware, computer standards (ie PCIE) and test methodologies. We seek for someone who is comfortable communicating at executive level and building consensus across multiple organizations.

Create project plans for tool development and manage execution
Identify opportunities for synergy within existing toolset
Drives security reviews, Open-Source filing where applicable, and releases the tool to internal and external customers
Represents Data Center tools on GPU, CPU projects, aligning dependencies and schedules between projects, confirming commitments
Communicates to executive team on regular status updates
REQUIREMENTS:
Minimum 7 years proven Project Management experience in dynamic and competitive industry, driving complex projects with multiple interdependencies
Minimum 5 years experience in requirements analyst role
Desirable 5 years experience in hardware/software industry with exposure to Device Drivers, Firmware, SOC product development and/or Data Center Operations.
Desirable 5 year experience in Agile / Scrum or similar methodologies
Excellent verbal and written communication skills to handle all levels of interaction, including executive level
Horizontal leadership/Matrix management experience
Flexible working schedule to manage global (specific Asia and North America) program execution team
EDUCATION:
Computer Engineering, Computer Science or Electrical Engineering Bachelor Degree
or related
PMP certification is a bonus

Job Description:
As QA Development Manager, you manage the QA plan from end to end for a product or major service/feature
You will scope strategizing for the QA business on the project, functionality testing planning, execution, and reporting on one or more projects under management
You will be involved in process improvement plans and improve on efficiency and level of quality while keeping a partnership with all partners
You will also be the user of data and Indicators and bring it into practice
What you'll do
Manage the planning, execution, and reporting processes of the QA team.
Complete testing for projects and comprehensive bug tracking and reporting.
Measure on quality assurance metrics. Use metrics to anticipate issues affecting the health or quality of the game, and to some extent, the team.
Identify risks and take necessary actions to address them or raise concerns to the management team.
Work with other teams (Game Development, Compliance, Certification) and the project owner to ensure the teams are working as efficiently as possible.
Monitor and evaluate team members performance and take corrective actions as and when needed.
Help manage the capacity plan; scheduling and tracking; and change requests.
Communicate issues, concerns, and successes to partners.
You will report to the QV Development Director.
What you will need to be successful :
6+ years of experience in Quality Assurance including 2 or more years in project management.
2+ years of experience in people management.
Experience with project management and bug tracking tools (e.g. Jira) in an agile environment.
An understanding of game development, interdisciplinary dependencies and associated development risks is a plus
Experience working within a collaborative team environment
Keywords: Manager Quality Assurance, Project management, Process improvement, Finance, Agile, Packaging, Scheduling, JIRA, game development

Job Description:
The Technical Product Support Specialist position has responsibility for analysis and resolution of customer submitted trouble tickets. The Support Specialist works to resolve tickets as they are assigned by the Customer Support Managers using all available tools, including User Guides, training materials, FAQ s, special documentation, searches of internal ticket systems for same, similar, or related incidents and issues, etc.
The support specialist s primary responsibility is to resolve customer tickets in compliance with established service level agreements and in accordance with established Ticket Management procedures. Tickets may be researched through the product GUI, through back-end queries, and by investigating application configuration. Reference may be made to all available documentation, as well as to searches within the relevant ticket or issue systems. As tickets are worked the PSAs provide appropriate response to the client, escalating to the next level if a ticket is beyond their capabilities due to knowledge or conflicting priorities. As tickets are resolved, the PSAs provide meaningful resolution for future reference.
Roles and Responsibilities:
Works to resolve assigned tickets
Politely interacts directly with end users
Documents ticket resolution for future reference
Searches available documentation to resolve tickets
Investigates application and system configuration
Performs simple database queries to research issues
Escalates tickets to the appropriate team lead
Conforms to the daily, weekly and monthly reporting requirements
Education requirement:
Bachelor of Computer Science or equivalent experience
Experience range:
2+ years experience performing end user support preferred
Preferred knowledge of the telecom interconnect business and/or knowledge of SQL
Technical/ functional skills required:
Comfortable using Windows applications including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint
Soft skills required:
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Strong telephone and interpersonal contact skills required
Keywords: Computer science, Telecom, Service level, Ticketing, End User Support, Customer support, Product Support Analyst, Windows, Product support, SQL

Job Description:
Are you a driven and passionate individual looking to jumpstart your career in product management? dox2U is seeking a Product Manager Intern to join our dynamic team and gain hands-on experience in the fast-paced world of SAAS product development

- Product Development: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and QA engineers, to define product features and specifications and ensure that product features meet business requirements and user expectations.

- Product Definition: Translate business requirements into clear and concise product specifications, user stories, and acceptance criteria.

- Requirements Gathering: Collaborate with stakeholders to elicit, document, and prioritize business requirements, ensuring a deep understanding of client needs.

- Create and maintain product documentation, including user guides, feature specifications, and release notes.

- Work closely with development and quality assurance teams to ensure that product features meet business requirements and user expectations.

- Gather and analyze user feedback, conduct user surveys, and assist in user testing to improve product usability and functionality.

- Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in product management.


Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or a related field

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

- Detail-oriented and organized.

- Self-motivated with a strong desire to learn and contribute.

- Familiarity with SAAS products and a basic understanding of product management concepts is a plus.
