Job Description:
We are looking for talented UI Designers Intern who exhibits user empathy, big picture focus; and has mature design craftsmanship and problem-solving skills, who will work collaboratively with UX researchers, product managers and engineers while driving design from concept to final implementation. Drive product strategy and partner closely with cross-functional teams to define and deliver.

Key Objectives/Responsibilities of this Role:
You will work with fellow designers, research, product, and engineering teams to define and create relevant, intuitive, and beautiful experiences that our customers love. 
You will conceptualize and design original ideas that bring simplicity and ease of use to complex design issues. You are a conceptual thinker as well as a craftsperson. Your design work is clean, focused and inspiring to others. 

Mandatory Skillset & Tools:
Portfolio showcasing your proficiency in translating research insights into great product experiences, reflecting the synthesis of good visual and interaction design principles. 
Work in an Agile environment (with Product Owners, Requirement Managers, Developers) to define requirements and design the solution, depending on the project.
Design simple and effective graphics for web and mobile solutions, producing journey maps, storyboards, mock-ups.
Translate concepts into user flows, wireframes, mock-ups and prototypes that lead to intuitive user experiences.
Design banners, posters, social media posts for campaigns and events
Innovate with evolving customer experience in terms of applying technologies and business models
Ask smart questions, take risks and champion new ideas
Join our Enterprise Operations organization in providing a great visual experience for our range of products.
In this position, you will be challenged to understand business needs as well as users perspectives and put them in a cohesive design which is simple but elegant.
Preferable understanding of Adobe Suite, Figmaor similar tools
Keywords: Wireframing, User Flows, Adobe Suite, Figma, Adobe Xd, Graphic Designing, Visual Design

Job Description:
We are looking for a QA Tester with experience in the Video Game industry to work with our multi talented team to ensure the delivery of high quality products to our customers. 
With a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills, you will ensure that our games, features and systems work as expected and that we deliver bug free content on time. Working together with the rest of the QA team, development department as well as the various stakeholders, you will have the opportunity to understand all the internal dynamics and impact the way we build our product processes.
In this role you will have the opportunity to work with many other disciplines such as design, LiveOps, business intelligence and development engineering, to build and test products that meet the overall business needs. This is a dynamic role with high exposure to many aspects of developing and running a unique game.
If this sounds like you, we would love to meet you and discuss further!

Responsibilities:

Perform manual functional testing across the companys PC, web and mobile platforms (iOS, Android): Dev Testing, LiveOps Production testing, Development testing  functionality and Manual Testing, smoke tests, Unit Testing, regression as well as any additional ad hoc tests both in development, Production and Live Phase. 
Report in real time proactively with stakeholders regarding QA operations with game defects, and Quality concerns from end user perspective including complete steps, identification of root cause, and expected results into communication channels and appropriate bug tracking software along with back to back follow ups until regression phase.
Creating and sending test reports upon completion of test activities and actively involved in planning and solving with stakeholders. 
Follow up on issues with the team to ensure that they are fixed and delivered to end users.
Developing test plans with a strategic selection of test methodologies in advance during the development phase. 
Proactively communicate concerns and risks to Product Teams in a professional manner.
Creation and maintenance of written documentations of knowledge and processes.
Assist in backlog and defect grooming with the Producers and Cross Department Leads.
Owning features and ensuring they are tested thoroughly with assurance to Quality of the product to be shipped globally.

Requirements:

1 - 2 years experience in quality control and assurance of Video Games.
Experience in Coordinating QA operations with Production Team and other Departments. 
Good knowledge of Jira.
Experience in a remote working culture is a must. 
Experienced in at least one bug tracking software and ability to create detailed and efficient documentation.
Fluent in English and a good communicator, both written and spoken.
Proven ability to handle stressful situations, prioritize tasks and meet tight deadlines.
Strong interpersonal skills with high motivation, drive to improve and capacity to learn.
Able to work independently, adjust to last minute changes and understanding of how to prioritize tasks.
Fully functional PC/laptop - Windows with stable Internet connection with minimum 50Mbps.
Android and iOS devices dedicated to QA testing. 

Nice to have:

Experience with mobile, MMO and free to play games.
Competency in MS Office and Google suite.
Knowledge of Game Development Process.
Passion for gaming in various game genres and having played them on various platforms.
ISTQB certification.


Benefits

Remote first company culture.
Flexible work hours to support personal work-life balance.
Weekly remote Embodiment@Work breathing and workout exercises.
Online language classes: English, German, French, Spanish, etc.
Working in a multicultural environment with people from over 31 different countries.
Flat hierarchies with an open-door policy.
Keywords: QA Testing, Game Testing, QA Tools, JIRA

You take pride in your work, and know what it means to take responsibility and deliver quality focused products. You enjoy working in a dynamic and agile environment. You have the knowledge and ability to visualize how things should work, and how to translate this into a functioning solution.

We offer you a chance to join a team of professionals, where we believe that talent feeds talent. All of us have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product. Company Name: Quality Engineering Software Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
Job Description:
The achievers and courageous challenge-crushers we seek, have the following characteristics and skills:
Roles & Responsibilities:
Developing and designing animations projects and applications using Unity.
Collaborating with designers, artists, and other developers to create engaging and immersive experiences.
Leading the development of projects from start to finish, including planning, design, coding, testing, and release.
Writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code that adheres to industry best practices.
Mentoring and training junior developers, providing guidance and feedback to help them improve their skills.
Participating in code reviews and other quality control processes to ensure that projects are delivered on time and meet quality standards.
Staying up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in Unity development, and applying them to new projects.
Creating and maintaining project documentation, including design documents, technical specifications, and user manuals.
Troubleshooting and debugging issues as they arise, and implementing solutions to resolve them.
Optimizing game performance, including frame rates and load times, to ensure a smooth and seamless experience for users.
In summary, a Unity developer is responsible for developing high-quality, engaging animation projects and applications using Unity, and leading the development of projects from start to finish. They must be skilled in writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code, and must be able to work collaboratively with other developers, artists, and designers. They should also be able to mentor and train junior developers, and stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in Unity development.
Required Skills (Technical Competency):
Unity game engine: A Unity developer should have a deep understanding of the Unity game engine, including how to use it to develop games and applications, create game mechanics, and optimize performance.
Programming languages: Unity developers should be proficient in programming languages such as C# and JavaScript, as well as be able to write clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
Game development frameworks: Unity developers should be well-versed in game development frameworks such as Unreal Engine, Phaser, and Construct 2, to name a few.
3D modeling and animation: A Unity developer should have experience in creating 3D models and animations using 3D modeling and animation software like Maya, Blender, and 3ds Max.
User interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design: A Unity developer should have experience in designing UI and UX elements for games and applications, as well as optimizing them for different platforms.
Mobile development: Unity developers should have experience in mobile development and be familiar with the challenges of developing games and applications for mobile devices.
Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR): A Unity developer should have experience in developing AR and VR applications, and be familiar with AR/VR hardware and SDKs.
Version control: Unity developers should be proficient in using version control tools such as Git to manage code and collaborate with other developers.
Debugging and testing: Unity developers should have experience in debugging and testing code to ensure that games and applications are running smoothly and are free from bugs and errors.
Desired Skills:
Multiplayer and networking: Unity developers with advanced skills should be able to develop multiplayer games and applications, implement networking functionality, and optimize server-client architecture for online games.
Artificial Intelligence (AI): Advanced Unity developers should have experience in creating intelligent agents and developing AI algorithms to control game elements such as NPCs and enemy behavior.
Procedural generation: Unity developers with advanced skills may be able to use procedural generation techniques to create content such as levels, terrain, and environments dynamically.
Shader programming: Advanced Unity developers should have experience in writing custom shaders and using advanced lighting and rendering techniques.
Performance optimization: Advanced Unity developers should have experience in optimizing game performance, reducing memory usage, and improving load times.
Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR): Unity developers with advanced skills in VR and AR should be able to create immersive experiences, optimize performance for VR and AR devices, and integrate with hardware such as head-mounted displays and controllers.
Keywords: Computer science, Version control, GIT, Networking, Coding, Debugging, Javascript, Animation, Manager Quality Control, Troubleshooting

Job Description:
This position is for technical Product Manager for Home Charging Connective Charge Station platform.
This role will be responsible for managing Product Team(s) involved in end-to-end delivery and launch and management of the Nextgen Ford Connected Charge Station platform.
Working with cross-functional teams in Electrification Services and Model-e , you will be responble for the end-to-end management delivery of th engthe NextGen platform including but not limited to manaing the Product backlog, Building engineering road map, liaise with cross functional team(s) etc
This will also include support in user testing, design, development and deployment of MVPs using agile product delivery
Focus will be on delivering agreed outcomes measured using Key metrics as defined through our Product and Engineering OKRs
Prior experience of managing a product team
Ability to work with multiple stakeholders spread out globally.
Ability to work independently and take initiative when solving unexpected problems.
Able to manage multiple conflicting priorities.
Good interpersonal & communication skills
Data driven and result oriented
Familiarity with OKR models preferred. Understand measuring outcomes versus outputs.
Preferable to have experience as Product manager for Cloud platform system (manage or build)
Ability to work collaboratively and navigate complex decision making in a rapidly changing environment
Previous success working with an Agile development team.
Background in software development.
Experience with eXtreme Programming
Experience in EV eco system build/manage ( OCPP platform, connected chargers) - nice to have - not mandatory
Understands business and user requirements to prioritize the product backlog and manage risks.
Focus on delivering product value through coordination.
Demonstrate continued drive for process improvements, thinking out of the box to motivate and encourage team members
Work closely with Business Partners to understand their product vision, strategy and roadmap, and break it down into an actionable backlog for the development team
Help Business Partners understand our iterative development approach and focus on delivering a Minimum Viable Product through careful and deliberate prioritization.
Work with the product owner to understand the pain points (if any) and work towards addressing them in a prioritized manner.
Work with the product team to prioritize, plan, and deliver the product.
Ensures the backlog is populated with enough prioritized user stories that are ready to be estimated for the next two iterations.
Communicates openly and frequently with the team by being responsive to in-person prompts.
Verifies that the delivered software product meets desired business outcomes.
Redefines the backlog content to optimize business outcomes based on software product feedback.
Work with product designers (internal and/or external) to ensure timely delivery of designs and assets to the engineering development team.
Advocate for an iterative development approach, working closely with designers to measure success of the solution and inform product improvement
Focus on delivering value to our customers through careful and deliberate prioritization of desired outcomes
Identify success stories and share with the broader product team
Help innovate and iterate on agile PM processes always working to find ways to improve
Keywords: Agile development, Cloud, Agile, Design development, Programming, Advocate, Deployment, Management, Testing

Job Title: Project Manager Required For A Growing IT Company

Job Description:
Job description
Define and lead the overall product vision, scope, requirements, usability of end user facing products built on the Medha Analytics Platform.
In partnership with the data engineering team, functional team, and core business users, prioritize and lead product feature development.
Define, communicate, and analyse success metrics for the products and the product vertical.
Proposes multiple potential solutions for complex or new problems or processes and makes objective recommendations as to which direction should be taken.

Perform with a wide degree of latitude on creative solutions.
Continually assess and integrate internal & external customer feedback and business metrics.

Required Candidate profile
Education:
PGDM from a leading management institute.
B.E. / B.Tech Computer Science or related technical discipline or its equivalent.

Experience:
4 years experience in a technical Product Management team working very closely with analysts, database teams or as an individual.
A minimum of 3 years of experience in the analytics tech stack, ETL/Data Transformation and Data Visualization, Data Science tools.
Hands-on Experience with modelling, data science, data visualization and data governance.

Preferred Qualifications:
Comfortable working with Big Data technologies building and designing products that utilize both real time as well as batch data streams at scale.
Ability to write and validate SQL queries and to ensure data is validated.
Ability to understand ETL structures and concepts.
Ability to understand data visualization structures and concepts.
Demonstrated data driven decision-making capabilities. Strong analytical skills to influence product decisions.
Experience taking direction and input from multiple sources and creating a shared product vision.
Demonstrated ability to work on a diverse scope of projects requiring detailed analysis, creative/practical problem solving, and sound judgement.
Understanding of the technical architecture of complex data products.
Project management of analytics / data intelligence projects.
Strong communication skill.
Keywords: sql queries, analytical, data science, product management, data visualization

Job Description:
As a Token ID Technology Product Engineer, you will technically lead the product live state and the lifecycle offerings engagement, focusing on motivating change thru continuous improvement of the product lines related to application architecture, systems architecture, containerization and process automation.
This role is for a strong technical leader who works with multi-functional teams spanning multiple product and technology subject areas. Successful candidates will be highly adaptable, possess strong interpersonal and organizational skills and effectively run multiple work streams.
This is a hybrid role within Visa's Token ID Technology organization, based in Bangalore and directly collaborating and reporting to the teams Sr. Manager (who is based in Europe).
Hybrid employees can alternate time between both remote and office. Employees in hybrid roles are expected to work from the office 2-3 set days a week, with a general guidepost of being in the office 50% or more of the time based on business needs.
The successful candidate will be:
A member of a team of Technology Product and Production Engineers (within the Production Engineering and Support framework)
A technical person(s) who will dive into Token ID products entirely and will assist in any technical details.
A product technology point of contact for our application services and all the associated configuration items and able to provide or acquire all vital information required for this role and exercises (delegated) authority in leading and coordinating deployment services.
Participate, support the planning phase and lead the Release cycle up to and including Production.
Provide technical leadership with detailed understanding of the solutions configuration and integration.
Drive the implementation by working with globally distributed teams to resolve priorities, plan and schedule new builds and releases.
Drive improvement opportunities collaborators related to product engineering practices, namely, release management, configuration management, release engineering, and security management.
Provide problem resolution support, specific to product related issues, coordinating with engineering teams to resolve symptoms and ensure accurate root cause analysis.
Maintain technical product processes, procedures, quality standards, and status of service delivery for all product related activities. Proposes and drives improvements.
Technically leads project and delivery teams to achieve breakthroughs and objectives, at distributed locations.
Actively collaborate with product and business partners.
Provides product authority level support for internal clients and product owners, implements product configuration and drives technical discussions and suggest solutions (in an on-call rotation roster)
Translate business requirements and solution designs into technical use cases, in order to setup and maintain the product in a live state.
Responsible for ensuring, supporting and, also, coordinating Security Assessments, Pen testing and other Security lanes within the product and release scope: ensure execution, testing and remediation.
Has shared responsibility with Software Engineering Managers in the Product Maintenance, branch management and it's hygiene: JIRA project administration, Release creation, release checklist, release notes, etc
Ensure timely release deliveries and notes, with the vital skills to validate, deploy and solve on-Premise or and on SaaS release issues.
Creates and maintains vital product engineering related documentation.
Acts as the Application Technical Contact (ATC) or as a delegate for Token ID products.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities
Actively participate in release planning, change control, reviews while leading risks thoughtfully and resolving challenges that impact release scope, quality, and schedules.
Lead Qualys and VVMS remediation and patching for protecting Production environment from cyber attacks.
Collaborates with various partner s day in and out for successful release to production.
Facilitate discussion and conflict resolution
Champion developing automation for release management
Collaborating across global business and technology organizations, providing sound analysis and change leadership. Building and maintaining strong internal customer relationships is essential as this position will work with Business Partners, internal staff and system integrators every day to ensure quality assurance is performed in alignment with global initiatives and requirements across the enterprise.
Provide comprehensive consultation to team members regarding long and short range release delivery requirements and recommend innovations which anticipate the future directions of both business and information technology.
Provide governance and technical guidance on software components registered for release vehicles. Need to have detail understanding of web applications, database, and infrastructure and configuration management to provide risk analysis on release provided to product team on business decisions.
Drive implementation of tested product changes, coordinate and plan new product builds and releases.
Technically leads product improvement opportunities with senior partners ensure products environment reliability, resilience and security.
Provides technical resolution support, specific to product issues, identifies, resolves and coordinates partners to determine accurate problem definitions.
Maintains direct knowledge of all product technical processes and the status of vital release activities. Proposes product improvements and innovation.
Develop and maintain a high degree of system knowledge of the products.
Be an agent of change, adopting new and innovative technology.
Basic Qualification

5+ years of relevant work experience with a Bachelor s Degree or at least 2 years of work experience with an Advanced degree (e.g. Masters, MBA, JD, MD) or 0 years of work experience with a PhD, OR 8+ years of relevant work experience.

Preferred Qualifications

Demonstrable experience with a keen focus on program, project and release management and engineering
Experience in Deployment management, both Production and Non-
Production Systems in a multi-site global organization
Excellent presentation and interpersonal skills, including an ability to comprehend and convey sophisticated technical information
Proactive, innovative, collaborative, and driven to achieve results
Understanding of SDLC, agile and waterfall frameworks
Experience with environment build-out, prep, installs, configuration, integration, maintenance and issue solving.
Confidence in working with SCM tools (GIT, JIRA, WIKI, JENKINS)
Understanding of SaaS Operational model concepts: SLI, SLO, SLA, Latency, Disaster Recovery, OpenAPI/Swagger, API Gateway, Retention, Active-Active, Data Protection, Subnets, TLS, SAML, Web Proxy, Failover, Replication, Encryption, DB Schema, CDN, WAF, etc.
Understanding of high-availability networking load-balanced solutions, n-tier application environments and common application protocols
Understanding of cloud designs and potential work-around scenarios to mitigate client impact
Understanding of Microservice architecture
Experience designing, deploying and working with containerized platforms (Kubernetes)
Security Remediation processes (vulnerability assessment and patch management)
Understanding of release management particularly CI/CD pipelines, branching strategies and test automation.
Must have strong understanding & experience in application monitoring techniques and Centralized Log Management tools.
Understanding of (applied) cryptography and exposure to HSM nCipher and/or payShield integrations
Proven track record on risk management decisions balancing a low tolerance for risk with the need to deliver complex business solutions
Good interpersonal and language skills: Fluent in English (written and verbal) to a business level - written and oral, Active listening, seeking to understand other views, communicating at the appropriate level for the audience
Self-motivated, objective and result oriented individual with the ability to handle numerous work streams concurrently. High levels of integrity and business ethics
Strong partner management and personal influencing skills
Nice to have: Understanding of tokenization solutions, online ecommerce, payment processing, or financial systems
Keywords: Manager Quality Assurance, Payment processing, Networking, Risk management, SCM, Continuous improvement, Business solutions, Operations, Information technology, SDLC

Job Description:
As the Senior Product Manager for the Marketplace Configuration team, youll play a key role in building the platform and tools that manage every market and product at Uber globally
These configurations can range from app display to pricing, from earner drop-off restrictions to customer request zones
They determine how an order is fulfilled at Uber and manage the experience for every user in Uber marketplaces
Our customers span Ubers Technology and Operation teams
What the Candidate Will Do
Own the vision, roadmap, and execution of the Marketplace Configuration platform and tools across all of Uber.
Lead cross-functional and full-stack teams of engineering, design, product operations, and program management to deliver delightful product experiences.
Develop a strong understanding of how Uber s markets and products are configured and managed across the entire organization.
Clearly communicate product plans, benefits, and results, as appropriate, to a spectrum of audiences, from internal partners to senior leadership.
Deliver the next generation of technology to effectively and scalably manage one of the largest platforms at Uber.
Basic Qualifications
Minimum five years of product management experience.
Technical depth to effectively collaborate directly with senior platform and product engineering teams.
Stellar design instincts to build workflows and tools that make complicated processes and configurations simple and easy to use.
What the Candidate Will Do
Interpersonal communication skills to manage a wide range of partners and deliver a compelling product vision and strategy to leadership teams.
Developed product roadmaps and work with data science, engineering, and other cross-functional partners to take products from concept to reality.
Experience using data to build an insightful story and make decisions with little guidance
Keywords: Product management, Product engineering, data science, Manager Program Management, Manager Technology, Engineering Design, Management, Spectrum

Job Description:
As Sr Product Manager, you will be part of the VCS Data Solutions which is part of the broader Global Card Products and Platforms team which is responsible for all cardable solutions for businesses and public entities globally, providing payment and value added services to businesses, corporations and governments
In this role, you will be responsible for managing the roadmap of Visa Commercial Solutions Portal and Common Services
The Sr Product Manager will manage and enhance the Portal, which is a gateway for VCS Products and Solutions with self service capabilities to manage company & service subscriptions, identity management, and more
The role will also focus on working with other product managers to contribute to the overall platform strategy and vision
In addition, you will focus on execution of a global roadmap working with other product managers, UX team, Visa Technology, 3rd party partners, Global and Regional teams to deliver functionality to meet issuer and client needs
The role requires analytical, collaborative and technical product skills
In addition, the role is required to have a deep understanding of the VCS Data Solutions platform, ensure change to the platforms are executed on time and budget, and that Issuer and client impacts are understood, communicated, and managed
RESPONSIBILITIES
The Sr. Product Manager s primary responsibility is to manage the VCS Portal and Common Services capabilities that deliver substantial value to Issuers and their clients.
Understands commercial data strategies, priorities, market needs and integrating them into product roadmap.
In this role, the Sr. Product Manager will work closely with business teams, engineering, architects, global cross-functional counterparts to build and iterate VCS Portal and capabilities including but not limited to Self-Registration Portal (SRP), Identity Management, and other integration.
Responsible for managing the product roadmap and writing clear, thorough, and detailed user stories for features and product sets.
Having a can do attitude and work with technology teams to develop use cases and prioritize user stories and epics to ensure work focuses on those with maximum value that aligned with product strategy.
Responsible for conducting User Acceptance Testing to ensure successful business releases.
Hands on data exploration and analyses of large data sets to enable data driven stories and product features


8 or more years of relevant work experience with a Bachelor Degree or at least 5 years of experience with an Advanced Degree (e.g. Masters, MBA, JD, MD) or 2 years of work experience with a PhD
Preferred Qualifications
Keywords: Supply chain, Project management, Analytical, Agile, Scrum, Customer service, Information management, User acceptance testing, Analytics, Identity management

Job Title: Principal Product Manager For Cloud ERP Financials
Job Description:
Oracle Financials Cloud Development
Companies make difficult decisions every day that have profound strategic and financial impact on their business. Oracle Financial Management applications are the tools they use to gather and synthesize financial information from across their entire company, making it possible to answer complex business questions. Join the team as a product manager to influence the vision and execution of this flagship Oracle offering, trusted by thousands of diverse customers from startups, leading social media companies, to large multi-nationals.

Team and Product Description:
The position offers an opportunity to join the Financials Cloud Product Management Team that is focused on developing enterprise level solutions for our customers. Our applications provide receivables, collections, and revenue management solutions used by customers worldwide. We are working on Oracles next-generation solution that will exploit the most innovative technologies and provide challenging development projects from day one. Team members analyze, conceptualize, and articulate ideas with the highest level of competency. We make use of strong intellectual and exceptional interpersonal skills and are adaptable, independent, and self-confident players. We are creative and visionary while staying detail-oriented and aligned with the big picture. Join a division that works on a critical market space for Oracle and that is charting Oracles long-term growth.

Description of the Role:
We are seeking a product manager to work on the next generation of cloud-based, data-driven applications. The successful candidate will play a key role in execution of key initiatives for a set of flagship products within the Financials Cloud suite. (S)he will provide functional specifications for the solutions and take the solutions to the market following an agile, continuous-delivery methodology and a dev-ops mindset. The candidate will represent the products to internal audiences (e.g., product marketing, sales, and other field organizations). Responsibilities for the role include:
Lead discussion with the management to gain insight into product roadmap, project assigned - its background, goal and scope. Ensure management expectations and delivery timelines are clearly understood.
Liaison between Strategy/Customer/Management to understand customer business process and get a complete 360 analysis on the related requirements.
Be creative in solutioning customer problems/requirements. Best solutions are always the simplest. Produce high-quality design documents with comprehensive and detailed solution analysis with focus on all core areas: extensibility, robustness, backward compatibility, supportability, exception handling, performance expectations/benchmarking, upgrade plan for customers, critical technology or product dependencies, product resiliency (self-correction) and flexibility (user self-service feature), and cloud operational considerations: recoverability and restart-ability, opt-in options for the customer. Designs should also include definition of product use cases, wireframes and upstream and downstream impact areas.
Uphold product quality to highest standards. As part of design it is very critical to document testing strategy that identifies the success/acceptance criteria for the project. Ensure that any testware is in line with focus of the enhancement, is tested with real customer use cases/data patterns and influencers.
Ensure the MVP definition is aligned with customer commitment in mind, and management sign off is received.
Collaborate with Dev team member on reviewing any technical solution document to ensure that it is aligned with the finalized solution approach.
Work closely with Information Development team to create launch deliverables such as New Feature Summary, Whats New, and TOI's.
Deliver product functionality training to internal development organizations (e.g., Documentation, Quality Assurance, Demonstration Services, Customer Care, and other development teams), to other LOBs (e.g., Support, Consulting, Oracle University, and Sales) and to external entities such as partners and alliances.

Preferred Qualifications:
Product management, consulting, or implementation experiences in Quote-to-Collect space are preferred.
Financial educational background such as CA, ICWA, and MBA (Finance) is very much desirable. The successful applicant should have in-depth understanding of financial flows and business processes involved in finance management.
Strong analytical skills; strong written and spoken communication skills.
Knowledge of Web technologies, UI components, design patterns, and best practices is preferred.
Ability to thrive in fast-paced environment and learn quickly.
Keywords: Product Strategy, Product Manager, Product Roadmap, Financial Products, Product Life Cycle Management

Job Description:
Youll be working closely with the leadership and the Olympus product team to build the next generation of cloud-agnostic, modern, scalable, platform products that powers Tachyon and other SaaS products that we sell to Enterprises.
  What is the job like?
Ideation
Understanding the vision, mission and the why of Olympus products
Speaking to customers such as SREs, DevOps, developers from Tachyon teams to understand what problems do they face and which problems should be solved
Researching industry trends and products to have a view/understanding of how competitors are building and solving for such problems
Planning
Understand the different enterprise user personas and their problems
Define the goals, scope and use cases for the core feature to be built
Align the stakeholders on the prioritization and more importantly the why of the feature
Write the product notes, PRDs and add the item to your respective product boards
Define the UX experiences and capabilities to be built for various banking personas such as Customer Services, Business Operations etc
Prioritization, Roadmapping & Execution
Own the roadmap for one or more part of the product
Apply the lens of strategy, goals and Olympus purpose to prioritize problems to solve.
Slice the capabilities into smaller rapidly shippable features
Work very closely with Engineering, Operations, Design, Customer Success, Client and Partner teams to get things done.

Communication
Evangelize and communicate the product plan
Influence Engineering Teams and other stakeholders
Who should apply for this role?
You have had past development experience in a technology-first role, love coding but have a passion towards product management. An example persona could be a backend, SRE, DevOps engineer who wants to move into product management
You ve had a past exposure of building & shipping high quality Enterprise or SaaS products with high levels of ownership
Strong Understanding of System Design
An engineering / technical background that will allow you to reason about product trade-offs and make good choices with minimal inputs from engineers. A major in Computer Science is a big plus
Excellent communication (written and verbal), interpersonal skills and stakeholder management
A high-agency, can do positive attitude with a high Emotional Quotient (EQ)
Adapting to complex situations with an aim to achieve business goals
You conceive possibilities, think big picture, but deliver on the details
Plus if you read hacker news/TechCrunch and generally have an opinion about products especially tech-first products
Perks of the Role
Opportunity to understand and assimilate how next generation of cloud-native, modern, banking software is built and powered
Opportunity to work with smart colleagues who work on cutting-edge platform products and learn from them
Opportunity to build a solid foundation in product management for the next 2-3 decades
Opportunity to build an in depth understanding about various payment systems including the chance to understand the most happening payment trends
Keywords: Product management, Computer science, Loans, Change management, Backend, Coding, Agile, System design, Business operations, Banking software

As Operations Manager , you are also responsible for making sure that KPIs are being met consistently

Job Description:
Description: As EA moves towards a player network strategy to make gameplay smarter, better, and more personalised, the infrastructure to support this transformation is increasingly challenging because of complexity and scale.
You will deliver products for game teams that help ensure smooth game development through central platform technology. It will require both the ability to understand and address current customer pain points. We also expect this role to come up with novel solutions to solve problems to arise in the future. The EADP Developer Experience team makes it easy to create, manage, and monitor the entire suite of EADP services and infrastructure and to easily integrate these solutions within all EA games. If you re passionate about working as a program manager to deliver developer experiences that are engaging, delightful, and easy to use to aid building amazing games whilst keeping developers smiling then this is the team for you! In this role, you will provide program/project leadership, anticipate bottlenecks, avoid project risks, make tradeoffs, and balance the needs versus technical constraints as well as communicate broadly across EA.
You will provide program leadership about how scalable services and SDKs will be built and delivered within EADP and ultimately used by Game Studios.
You will translate requirements across feature sets, security, performance, and costs as well as process requirements to improve the dev to production experience into deliverables and influence design and architectural decisions whilst resolving incidents, supporting developers and streamlining communications.
You will work with various teams across EA Digital Platform & Game Studios to identify and drive creative solutions that allow teams to achieve business goals and product deliverables in an easy, efficient, and reliable manner.
You will have a strong software development background, excellent problem solving, project management and communication skills.
Qualifications
Proven Program Management experience in a distributed team environment (8+ years - this is not an entry-level position)
Strong technical understanding of systems, architecture, and user experience
Proven program management experience (design, problem-solving, prioritization, interpersonal)
SDLC experience with Agile and Waterfall
Proven ability to partner internally and externally
Strong communication skills, with the ability to work collaboratively with colleagues at all levels including in incident management and collating feedback
Engage with other teams in the company, build strong relationships with partners, advocate for the team and your products throughout EA, and advocate for your users within the team
Demonstrated ability to work on small, focused teams to complete important milestones under pressure with tight deadlines.
Demonstrated ability to operate proactively with a high level of autonomy and minimal management oversight
Enthusiasm for sharing knowledge and a hunger for learning new techniques
Ability to act as the interface between the product manager and the software development teams. Understand the product and know the right questions and whom to ask.
Ability to oversee the daily progress of the project(s) and release initiatives concerning schedule, scope, and quality
Build and maintain a complete project schedule, make it always visible to management and partners, and bring it through to completion. Provide regular status reporting on progress.
Ability to remove blockers, address incidents and get things done
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills; extremely data-driven with the ability to lead the prioritization process
Experience programming in one or more of the following REST, gRPC, C, C++, or JAVA
Experience across all phases of product development using Agile and Waterfall methodologies Highly
Desirable
Experience with delivering live services
Experience working with ALM solutions (JIRA, Confluence)
A solid foundation in computer science, prior experience as a software developer preferred
B. Tech/M. Tech in Computer Science or a related technical discipline (or equivalent) A passion for gaming
Keywords: Computer science, C++, Project management, Agile, Incident management, HTML, SDK, JIRA, Gaming, SDLC

Job Description:
Unity/3D Developer / Game Developer
Job Location Gurugram Salary Upto 8 LPA Experience : 2 4 Years
We are looking for a specialized Game developer to turn a game idea into code on a fast-moving environment. You will be involved in various aspects of the game s creation from concept to finished product including coding, programming, audio, design, production, and visual arts.
Responsibilities
Translate requirements into complicated but clean and efficient code
Construct the base or the engine on which the game will run
Produce prototypes of gameplay ideas and features
Develop schedules and determine milestones
Generate game scripts and storyboards
Animate characters and objects
Contribute to the design and audio features of the game
Create unit tests and validation procedures to assure quality
Detect identification and resolution and document technical specifications
Polish the game, maintain code, fix bugs and iron out occurring problems
Requirements:
Excellent knowledge of Unity, including experience with scripting, textures, animation, GUI styles, and user session management.
Must have Experienced with multiplayer game server like Photon or SmartFox.
Experience with Realtime multiplayer games.

Job Description:
Overview
EA is looking for a Technical Program Manager III with a strong skill set in scalable platform development, cross-platform SDKs, online services and documentation to help craft amazing developer experiences. Our team of tight-knit program managers collaborates with game teams, industry experts, and world-class technologists, to reimagine how people develop and manage technology services in games. This is an incredible opportunity to enrich the lives of EAs developers, producers, and quality engineers in meaningful ways.
As a Technical Program Manager III, you would be working closely with other program managers, product managers, engineers, scientists, researchers, and business stakeholders to deliver scalable services and a rich SDK product experience that makes our partners smile. You will be expected to deliver cross-platform, highly functional, stable product releases to schedule and world-class quality.
Description:
As EA moves towards a player network strategy to make gameplay smarter, better, and more personalized, the infrastructure to support this transformation is increasingly challenging due to complexity and scale. The focus of this role is to deliver products for game teams that help enable frictionless game development through central platform technology. It will require both the ability to understand and address current customer pain points. We also expect this role to come up with novel solutions to solve problems that will arise in the future. The EADP Developer Experience team makes it easy to create, manage, and monitor the entire suite of EADP services and infrastructure and to easily integrate these solutions within all EA games. If you re passionate about working as a program manager to deliver developer experiences that are engaging, delightful, and easy to use to aid building amazing games whilst keeping developers smiling then this is the team for you!
In this role, you will provide program/project leadership, anticipate bottlenecks, mitigate project risks, make tradeoffs, and balance the business needs versus technical constraints as well as communicate broadly across EA. You will provide program leadership pertaining to how scalable services and SDKs will be built and delivered within EADP and ultimately used by Game Studios. You will translate requirements across feature sets, security, performance, and costs as well as process requirements to optimize the dev to production experience into deliverables and influence design and architectural decisions whilst resolving incidents, supporting developers and streamlining communications.
You will work with various teams across EA Digital Platform Game Studios to identify and drive innovative solutions that enable teams to achieve business goals and product deliverables in an easy, efficient and reliable manner. A successful candidate will have a strong software development background, excellent problem solving, project management and communication skills.
Key Qualifications
Proven Program Management experience in a distributed team environment (8+ years - this is not an entry-level position)
Strong technical understanding of systems, architecture, and user experience
Proven program management experience (design, problem-solving, prioritization, interpersonal)
SDLC experience with Agile and Waterfall
Proven ability to partner internally and externally
Strong communication skills, with the ability to work collaboratively with colleagues at all levels including in incident management and collating feedback
Engage with other teams in the company, build strong relationships with partners, advocate for the team and your products throughout EA, and advocate for your users within the team
Demonstrated ability to work on small, focused teams to complete critical milestones under pressure with tight deadlines.
Demonstrated ability to operate proactively with a high level of autonomy and minimal management oversight
Enthusiasm for sharing knowledge and a hunger for learning new techniques
Ability to act as the interface between the product manager and the software development teams. Understand the product and knows the right questions and whom to ask.
Ability to oversee the day-to-day progress of the project(s) and release initiatives concerning schedule, scope, and quality
Build and maintain a complete project schedule, make it constantly visible to management and key stakeholders, and drive it through to completion. Provide regular status reporting on progress.
Ability to remove blockers, address incidents and get things done
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills; extremely data-driven with the ability to lead the prioritization process
Experience programming in one or more of the following REST, gRPC, C, C++, or JAVA
Experience across all phases of product development utilizing Agile and Waterfall methodologies
Highly desirable
Experience with delivering live services
Experience working with ALM solutions (JIRA, Confluence, etc.)
A solid foundation in computer science, prior experience as a software developer preferred
B. Tech/M. Tech in Computer Science or a related technical discipline (or equivalent)
A passion for gaming
Keywords: Computer science, C++, Project management, Agile, Incident management, HTML, SDK, JIRA, Gaming, SDLC

Job Description:
As the Data Protection Manager, you will play a crucial role in ensuring our companys compliance with data protection laws and regulations
You will be responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive data protection policies, procedures, and strategies to safeguard the privacy and security of our customers personal information
In addition, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including legal, IT, and compliance departments, to ensure a cohesive approach to data protection across the organization
Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain a robust data protection framework in compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and industry best practices.
Design and implement data protection policies, procedures, and guidelines, ensuring they are up to date and reflect current legal requirements.
Conduct privacy impact assessments (PIAs) to identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies.
Collaborate with internal stakeholders to ensure data protection considerations are incorporated into the design and implementation of new systems, processes, and technologies.
Serve as the primary point of contact for data protection inquiries from internal and external stakeholders, including customers, regulators, and business partners.
Monitor and assess the effectiveness of data protection controls and measures, and provide recommendations for improvements as necessary.
Stay up to date with emerging data protection laws, regulations, and industry trends, and communicate their implications to relevant teams within the organization.
Provide training and guidance to employees on data protection policies and procedures, fostering a culture of privacy awareness and compliance.
Manage data breach incidents, including investigating and reporting incidents as required by applicable laws and regulations.
Liaise with external legal counsel and regulatory authorities on data protection matters, as needed.
Qualifications:
Bachelors degree in Law, Business, or a related field; Juris Doctor (JD) degree preferred.
Proven experience in data protection, privacy, or related legal roles, with a strong understanding of data protection laws, such as GDPR, CCPA, and other regional data protection regulations.
Familiarity with industry-specific data protection requirements and best practices.
Strong knowledge of privacy principles and practices, including data minimization, purpose limitation, and consent management.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess complex legal and regulatory issues and provide practical solutions.
Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate and influence stakeholders at all levels of the organization.
Detail-oriented mindset with a commitment to maintaining high standards of accuracy and confidentiality.
Professional certifications in data protection, such as CIPP/E, CIPP/US, CIPM, or similar, are a plus.
Experience in conducting privacy impact assessments and managing data breach incidents is highly desirable.
Proactive and adaptable, with a demonstrated ability to work independently and prioritize multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.
Keywords: BPO, Interpersonal skills, HP data protector, Compliance, Data management, Analytical, Legal, Outsourcing, Gaming

You are expected to be passionate about gaming and have excellent communication skills. You should be an independent self-starter with sound judgment and strong analytical skills.
Responsibilities

1. Contribute on the creative direction of games through development and lifecycle.

2. Construct gameplay systems and features and travel through all stages of development, in alignment with the project vision, by collaborating with concept creators, designers, developers and team leadership.

3. Construct engaging and creative gameplay systems with fun and thrill features that will improve user experience, engagement, and monetization.

4. Identify opportunities to improve and tune gameplay systems.

5. Transform high-level ideas into detailed and well-thought out concepts.

6. Work with different teams to implement design concepts.

7. Complete storyboarding and help the team in the process of creating and executing the same.

8. Take total control/ charge over the creative quality of graphics and animations from the team

9. Analyze key performance indicators, user testing and feedback, recommend design solutions, and modify game concepts accordingly.

10. Ability to create the designs and guide the implementation of game content and/ or systems with an eye for engagement, retention and monetization

11. Ensure the team develops components of the player experience: player movement, environmental interactions, and combat.

12. Be proactive in communicating progress/ resolution of problems, and documenting key shared knowledge

13. Ensure the team crafts and maintains inventive, challenging and fun levels for a casual puzzle game.

14. Provide progress updates to senior leadership and works well under stress, pressure and deadlines.

15. Identify and communicate roadblocks and bottlenecks that may prevent the team from achieving their goals.

16. Motivate and support team to ensure project goals, objectives, milestones, and deliverables are achieved.

Requirements

1. 8+ years of Game Design experience and expertise in creative GUI with products shipped.

2. Clear understanding about game engineering and how to apply creativity over it.

3. Ability to design concepts and games and features from beginning to end.

4. Strong knowledge of the free?to-play market, and its past and current trends.

5. A good eye for data analysis, and the ability to help your team make the best decisions based on what the data indicates.

6. Ability to balance project demands with creative essentials. You demand quality; creativity and fun while still managing project resources and timelines.

7. A strong grasp of systems and/ or content design, with the ability to tackle the wide variety of challenges that working on new and live games may throw at you.

8. Outstanding written and oral communication and presentation skills.

9. Desire and ability to work collaboratively in a group dynamic.

10. Knowledge of and desire to work on puzzle style titles.

11. Passionate about games!

12. Knowledgeable of current industry trends: stays up-to-date on competitive products and best practices for Facebook and mobile device development.
Keywords: Relationship Executive, Strong analytical skills, Games, Sound, Gaming, Business Executive, Creative Lead, WHO

Job Title: Hiring -International Non Voice - Email | Chat Support | IntouchCX |
Job Description:
Job description

CSA Non-Voice Job Description / Profile

Job Title Customer Service Associate (CSA) Non-Voice

Contact HR Kavitha 7899915387

Location -Bengaluru ( Electronic City )
Department-Operations
Channel - Email/Chat
Language - English
Hours of Operation 24/7


Overview of Position -The role of the Customer Service Associate (CSA) - Non-Voice, will be responsible for:
Providing support and resolve technical issues via email and other electronic communications
Building credibility and trust with the customer by empathizing with their problem in words
Proactively understanding their needs and responding promptly to resolve their issue
Applying advanced troubleshooting techniques to provide unique solutions to the customers individual needs
Leveraging their experience to provide feedback to the team on how to improve client services
Driving customer communication during critical events


Essential Functions-

An obligation to deliver exceptional customer service
Receive emails and chats to gather and verify required information and do utmost within their power to solve customer problems
Demonstrate empathy and patience to the customer
Demonstrate enthusiasm to be a self-starter who is excited about learning new technologies on a daily basis
Provide information to the client and place appropriate notes in system indicating exactly what action was taken or needs to be taken
Ensure policies and procedures are followed
Maintain thorough knowledge of systems so that information can be researched and proper information is given to customer
Learn and retain a thorough working knowledge of all existing and new process and procedures
Achieve assigned Key Performance Indicators e.g. Call Handle Time, Quality, CSAT & DSAT
Attend Team Meetings/additional training sessions as scheduled
Performs other duties as assigned


Critical Skills-
Above average verbal and written communication skills - ability to speak accurately, using proper grammar, and good enunciation
Ability to listen attentively and to use information provided by clients to tailor responses and actions to meet the clients specific needs
Ability to work in a fast-paced, hectic, changing environment
Ability to organize and follow-up multiple tasks/details with accuracy and timeliness
Ability to operate a personal computer
Ability to adhere to all organizational policies and procedures
Ability to work a variety of shifts including days, afternoons, evenings, weekends and holidays
Ability to perform basic mathematical functions
Ability to effectively interact with employees at all levels of the organization and work with a variety of people from diverse backgrounds

Educational/Work Experience and Requirements-
Must successfully pass a background check
High school diploma or equivalent required
Must have at least six months customer service experience or equivalent
Experience in the gaming/tech support industry is a plus


Perks and benefits
An attractive compensation package with performance-based incentives
Incredible learning and growth opportunities
Outstanding rewards and recognition program & employee engagement activities
Free Food and Transport while working on-site
Medical Insurance

Job Description:
Delivers control and movement to characters, creatures, objects, scenery and environment displayed within electronic games, websites or software products
Applies knowledge and uses technical process ability in techniques such as rigging and skinning, kinetics and basic cinematography
Collaborates with programmers and artists to balance seamless movements and optimized performance on the target platform
Applies developed skills, knowledge and proficiency in at least one animation package, such as 3D Studio Max, Character Studio or Maya to work product
Job Level Description
Works on short-term assignments that often require the application of independent judgment.
Fully competent, career-level individual contributor.
Education
Bachelors degree in related field.
Responsibilities
3D Modelling and Texturing of assets (props, characters, environments) to be used in various slot machines.
Character animation - hand keyed and mocap systems
Character creation - including a broad understanding of rigging, weighting, and animation using pre-recorded Mocap or manual animation
Work in Blender and Unity to convert high poly models as per project briefs.
Collaborate with the design and development teams to conceptualize and execute creative ideas.
Modification and optimization of existing assets.
Ensure the artistic integrity and visual consistency of all 3D assets produced.
Collaborate with other artists and provide constructive feedback to help elevate the overall quality.
Troubleshoot performance issues and apply best practice optimization techniques.
Experience:
Proven experience as a 3D Artist, with a strong portfolio demonstrating proficiency in creating high-quality 3D assets and environments.
Experience in Blender including, Modelling, Topology, UV Unwrapping, and Material Creation.
Experience with rendering and compositing in Blender.
Strong understanding of lighting, composition, and colour.
Strong artistic and creative abilities, with an eye for detail and a passion for pushing the boundaries of visual storytelling.
Experience baking PBR models from high to low poly.
Experience with Blender preferred, however most 3D software packages are fine.
Independent self-improvement and troubleshooting skills.
Excellent communication
Self-motivated
Team player
Keywords: 3D, 3D modeling, Technical process, Software packages, Texturing, Maya, Animation, 3D Studio Max, Individual Contributor, Gaming

Job Description:
We re looking for a Fullstack developer to own, code & ship features at rocket speed. It s a fast-paced, high-adrenaline job, promising plenty to learn and build. If you re quick to pick up new tech and like a new challenge every day, you ll love this job and we d love to have you!
What s required of you
Strong knowledge of Data Structures, Algorithms, and OOPS Concepts.
Prior experience in a gaming company
Experience with Flutter is a must
Experience working with Android development / IOS development.
Experience with working on server-side technologies, Golang knowledge is a plus
Ability to build a product end-to-end with the help of multiple engineering teams.
What we are looking for
Should have 2+ years of professional experience in mobile application development.
B.Tech/B.E in Computer Science
Experience mentoring a team or interns.
Prior knowledge of Flutter
Good to have experience or exposure in Dart, Golang, Objective-C, Swift, Java and Kotlin
Keywords: Computer science, Mobile application development, C, Product portfolio, Data structures, Swift, ios development, Gaming, Analytics, android development

Job Description:
Play Simple is looking for a dynamic Senior User Experience Designer to join our talented team! The Senior UX Designer is responsible for creating player-centric design solutions that promote ease of use, employ best-in-class game/interaction design, and optimize the user experience universally. This includes all phases of the design process including conceptual design/development, graphics and interface design, Interaction models, prototypes, user/task flows and art production.
Requirements
What is required of you
You will be responsible for working with multiple feature teams and ensuring that UX is implemented to a consistently high standard across each feature. Bachelor s or Master s degree in graphic arts, interaction design, or equivalent industry experience in the design field.
You will be responsible for developing the user experience of game content and features that will be enjoyed by many millions of players and a truly international audience
Experience on leading, staffing, mobilizing and developing a team of UI/UX designers/artists
Expert-level skills in Figma or similar industry-standard prototyping tools. Proficiency in Illustrator/Photoshop is a plus.
Assist in implementing design specifications to shippable quality
  What we are looking for
Possess an excellent understanding of usability principles, style guidelines, design processes, and creative workflow.
Awareness of trends in hardware and operating systems, interface design, interactive design, and competitive software to help identify opportunities for innovation
Develop specifications/guidelines for UI and interactions.
Employ user-centric design practices to deliver world-class interactive game experiences.
Ability to make design decisions and solve design problems independently, present and sell design concepts.
Support design decisions from a practical, UX best practices standpoint.
Interface, and collaborate with key internal client and project stakeholders to ensure the user experience reflects player needs and consistency.
Real passion for gaming, especially mobile. You can reference the best and worst user experiences and apply the lessons to your work.
Familiarity with a range of software you are comfortable with rapid prototyping and iteration of ideas, listening to feedback, and exploring options to make the game stronger.
  Desirable Experience & Skills

Experience creating UX in Console and/or Mobile Games
Experience with Sketch, Figma, Illustrator or similar rapid-prototyping tools
Unity engine experience
Keywords: Graphics, Operating systems, Illustrator, Staffing, Interaction design, Design development, Workflow, Photoshop, Gaming, Analytics

Job Description:
We re looking for a Management Trainee (MT) who can provide key product & business insights that will drive our continued success. The candidate will work directly with the CEO, Founder & Senior Leadership at PlaySimple. It s a fast-paced, high-adrenaline job, with plenty to learn. If you enjoy crunching numbers, love finding opportunities to grow the business, are never satisfied with the products around you, and have always wanted to make things better than the best, you ll love this job.
Requirements
How will you add value to PlaySimple
The MT will work closely with CEO, business & product leaders in the company as a data-driven advisor and partner on strategic issues.
Will work collaboratively with multiple game teams to identify actionable insights in our games to drive efficiency across user acquisition, engagement, retention, and monetization.
Will proactively perform a wide range of analyses to identify trends, issues, and opportunities across games and help us continue to improve gameplay.
Will answer business-related questions through exploratory data analyses and ad-hoc reporting.
The role also involves supporting the PSG management in a broad and exciting range of projects within corporate development, mergers and acquisitions, investor relations, financial reporting, and strategy development as well as day-to-day ad-hoc tasks
What we are looking for
Post-graduate with Management (MBA/PGP or equivalent) degree and engineering background with minimum 2 years of work experience in IT industry. Good skills with a strong grasp of both technical and business perspectives.
Past experience in ability to execute projects, and generate practical results and recommendations is required
Proven ability to work in a fast-paced environment, and to meet changing deadlines and priorities on multiple simultaneous projects, ambitions and result-oriented with high working capacity Candidates with excellent academic background will be given preference
MBA with Consulting background would preferred but not mandatory
SQL/Python skills can be a plus
Excellent aptitude, humble, curious & appetite towards learning, good interpersonal skills & great communication are essential to be a top performer in this role
The candidate should enjoy both working with people and undertaking rigorous analyses.
Enjoy working in both individual and team settings
Keywords: Financial reporting, Management Trainee, Product portfolio, Consulting, Management, Mergers and acquisitions, Gaming, Analytics, SQL, Python

Job Description:
Play Simple is looking for a dynamic Associate User Experience Designer to join our talented team! The Associate User Experience Designer is responsible for creating player-centric design solutions that promote ease of use, employ best-in-class game/interaction design, and optimize the user experience universally. This includes all phases of the design process including conceptual design/development, graphics and interface design, Interaction models, prototypes, user/task flows, and art production.

The Associate User Experience Designer will additionally be responsible for maintaining the visual integrity, interaction methods, brand standards, and consistency for the game and collaborating with engineering for the execution of the design.

What s required of you
Expert-level skills in industry-standard prototyping tools.
Basic understanding of UX principles.
Experience in mobile interface design
Hands-on experience or knowledge of Unity 3D and motion design is a plus.
Excellent written and verbal communication
Passion for gaming
Bachelor s degree in graphic arts, interaction design, or equivalent industry experience in the design field.
What we are looking for
Evaluates designs quickly and creates original high-quality work. Owns features.
Possess excellent understanding of visual design principles, style guidelines, design processes, and creative workflow.
Develop UI, graphic design, and interaction specifications/guidelines.
Employ user-centric design practices to deliver world-class interactive game experiences.
Ability to make design decisions and solve design problems independently, present and sell design concepts.
Support design decisions from a practical, UX best practices standpoint.
Interface, collaborate with key internal client and project stakeholders to ensure the user experience reflects player needs and consistency.
Keywords: Graphics, 3D, Graphic designing, Product portfolio, Interaction design, Design development, Workflow, Gaming, Analytics, Visual Design

Job Description:
We re looking for a Creative writer who has a strong understanding of how the socialmedia ad industry works and can consistently come up with bold and innovativecopy ideas. It s a fast-paced, high-adrenaline job, with plenty to learn. Ifyou believe you can push our brand to the forefront with your ideas, we wouldlike to meet you.
  What s required of you
Know all the social platforms inside out,keep up with popular Internet culture, and churn out catchy and persuasive copythat sells our games
Brainstorm copy ideas with the team andcome up with new strategies and possible angles for ads
Live by the mantra of short and crisp,as readers these days get bored by the second line
Be a stickler for perfect English, with akeen eye for spelling and grammar errors
Thrash out powerful yet easy-to-understand storyboards to explain the ad concepts
Hit the team with brave and originalideas for ad campaigns
Conceptualize content for all socialplatforms, from Facebook to Instagram to Snapchat to Pinterest. Needless tosay, we would expect you to be on top of all the latest technologies and trends
Work with the team to oversee thecampaign/project from concept to execution

What we are looking for
Love for TV and cinema
Thorough knowledge of all social mediaplatforms and proven social media content creation skills (Facebook, Instagram,Twitter, or any other platform)
Excellent collaboration skills and opento feedback and revisions.
Zero fear of deadlines
Make the job of the person next to youeasier
Be that person who everyone always wantsto work with
Have a great sense of humor
Keywords: Networking, Social media, Product portfolio, Associate Creative, Conceptualization, Infrastructure, Gaming, Analytics

Job Description:
As the game s first audience - test for bugs in the software, from complete crashes to minor glitches in the programme. (Create and execute manual and automated test cases for assigned feature)
Communicate issues, risks and test status in a timely and detailed manner
Ability to determine root cause of issues found
You promote open, constructive and collaborative relations with superiors,subordinates and peers to achieve the best results
Testing the games/features for any defects
Come up with systematic test plan and recurring testing checklists
Report defects to the engineering team

What we are looking for

You were involved with such a role at a previous organization, preferably linked to social or mobile gaming platforms.
You can exhibit excellent management skills when it comes to multiple projects or people from different functions.
You have spent time maneuvering across automated scripts to test different scenarios
You are able to independently take initiative to solve problems and QA challenges
You are self-driven to thrill and entertain our players and constantly benchmark quality to delight customers.
You demonstrate experience with continuous improvement initiatives.
Keywords: QA, Quality Analyst, Debugging, Test planning, Bug reporting, Test cases, Continuous improvement, Gaming, Analytics, Testing

Job Description:
This is a leadership role with considerable inputs into the company s overall vision, direction, and sales positioning. In this role, you will be required to source new customers and business contacts, demonstrate the technical features of our products, drive sales, and maintain strong customer relations. You will be responsible for ideating and converting core technology use cases into compelling game studios/developer sales strategies, and leading acquiring and managing game partnerships. Your responsibilities are:
Sourcing potential new customers
Identifying acquisition targets i.e game genres, geographies and user demographics and personas
Incorporating and managing the sales funnel for the company
Demonstrating the technical features and benefits of our products and overseeing integration
Advising customers on technology upgrades and related products
Composing tender documents and customer proposals
Generating purchase orders and sales receipts
Maintaining strong customer relations
Attending gaming conferences and seminars whenever required
About You
To ensure success as a technical sales lead, you should have strong proficiency in communication and knowledge of technical products, a passion for sales. Ultimately, a top-class technical sales lead who drives business by understanding the needs of the game developers and providing them with the right product choices.
Master s degree in business administration or related field is preferable
4+ years of industry experience in sales
Strong knowledge of technical products in the gaming industry
Excellent interpersonal skills
Professional and friendly demeanor
Strong communication skills
Ability to meet sales and commission targets
Experience building business development strategies, and identifying tools trends to drive game revenues and engagement
Experience with tools like: hubspot, salesdash, salesforce (CRM and sales analytics tools)
An understanding of Frontend Game Engines like Unity, Unreal, Godot etc is preferable
CTC
Competitive salary with ESOPs package included
Keywords: Business administration, Technology management, Interpersonal skills, Sales Lead, Sales analytics, Technical sales, Customer relationship, Management, Gaming, Salesforce CRM

Job Description:
Release Planning and Coordination:
* Work closely with product managers, development teams, DevOps team, and quality assurance to plan and schedule software releases.
* Create and maintain release calendars, ensuring alignment with project
timelines and customer expectations.
* Coordinate and communicate release plans to all relevant stakeholders.
Quality Assurance:
* Collaborate with QA teams to define test plans and ensure thorough testing of software components before release.
* Manage and track issues and bugs, ensuring resolution before release.
Deployment and Monitoring:
* Oversee deployment processes, ensuring successful and smooth releases.
* Monitor and track the progress of releases, identifying and mitigating
risks and issues that may arise during deployment.
* Implement and maintain release automation tools and processes to streamline deployments.CR/ER Tracking and Management:
* Manage and document change requests, ensuring that changes are properly evaluated, approved, and tracked.
* Implement change control processes to minimize the impact of changes on
existing systems.
Documentation and Reporting:
*Maintain detailed release documentation, including release notes, known
issues, and deployment procedures.
*Provide regular reports on release status and performance metrics to senior management.
Continuous Improvement:
* Identify opportunities to improve release processes, automation, and
efficiency.
* Lead post-release reviews to capture lessons learned and drive process
enhancements
Qualifications:
* Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Working knowledge of software development lifecycle (SDLC) methodologies, particularly Agile and DevOps.
* Excellent project management skills with the ability to prioritize and
manage multiple releases simultaneously.
Good To Have:
* Proficiency in release automation tools and version control systems.
* Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
* Knowledge of industry best practices in release management.
* Experience with cloud platforms and containerization technologies is a plus.
Keywords: Manager Quality Assurance, Version control, Project management, Agile, Software development life cycle, Continuous improvement, Information technology, Release management, SDLC
